English: Daily
Indonesian: Daily

English: Save the Garden! (Part 1)
Indonesian: Save the Garden! (Part 1)

English: The Garden of Rhisis is dying! Could you help me?
Indonesian: Garden of Rhisis sedang sekarat! Bisakah kamu membantuku?

English: You need 10 Bearer Hearts from Tombstone Bearers to save the Garden of Rhisis.
Indonesian: Kamu membutuhkan 10 Bearer Hearts dari Tombstone Bearers untuk menyelamatkan Garden of Rhisis.

English: Thank you!
Indonesian: Terima kasih!

English: If you change your mind later, please come back to me!
Indonesian: Jika nanti kamu berubah pikiran, tolong kembali padaku!

English: Thank you! You should really talk to Janne.
Indonesian: Terima kasih! Kamu harus berbicara dengan Janne.

English: Come back when you have the Bearer Hearts.
Indonesian: Kembalilah ketika kamu sudah mempunyai Bearer Hearts.

English: Save the Garden! (Part 2)
Indonesian: Save the Garden! (Part 2)

English: You have a message from my sister!
Indonesian: Kamu mempunyai pesan dari adikku!

English: I see. The Garden of Rhisis is dying... Could you inform my sister Kimberley?
Indonesian: Aku mengerti. Garden of Rhisis sedang sekarat... Bisakah kamu memberi tahu adikku Kimberley?

English: The problem with the Garden of Rhisis can wait. I guess...
Indonesian: Masalah dengan Garden of Rhisis bisa menunggu. Kukira...

English: Thank you from bringing me this message. I think you should talk to Marche in Eastern Flarine.
Indonesian: Terima kasih telah membawakanku pesan ini. Aku pikir kamu harus berbicara dengan Marche di Eastern Flarine.

English: You still haven't found Kimberley? She is in Saint City.
Indonesian: Kamu masih belum menemukan Kimberley? Dia berada di Kota Saint.

English: Save the Garden! (Part 3)
Indonesian: Save the Garden! (Part 3)

English: The Saint City sisters say that the Garden of Rhisis is dying.
Indonesian: Para suster Kota Saint mengatakan bahwa Garden of Rhisis sedang sekarat.

English: Could you bring a Live Tea to Ann? You can find it the east of the Leren Mountains.
Indonesian: Bisakah kamu membawakan Live Tea untuk Ann? Kamu dapat menemukannya di sebelah timur Leren Mountains.

English: Thank you! If you help her she will give you an Earring.
Indonesian: Terima kasih! Jika kamu membantunya, dia akan memberimu sebuah Anting.

English: I will save the Garden of Rhisis with this tea! Here is an Earring to thank you.
Indonesian: Aku akan menyelamatkan Garden of Rhisis dengan teh ini! Ini Anting-anting untuk rasa terima kasih.

English: Bring a Live Tea to Ann at Saint City.
Indonesian: Bawa Live Tea ke Ann di Saint City.

English: Find Santa's Socks!
Indonesian: Temukan Santa's Socks!

English: It is a sad Christmas here in Madrigal. Santa Claus has lost all of the stockings that hold the children's presents! We must find the red stockings!
Indonesian: Ini adalah Natal yang menyedihkan di Madrigal. Santa Claus telah kehilangan semua stoking yang menyimpan hadiah untuk anak-anak! Kita harus menemukan stoking merah!

English: A Favor for the Pastor
Indonesian: A Favor for the Pastor

English: The pastor would like me to deliver 20 bouquets! I wonder what the reward will be!
Indonesian: Pendeta ingin aku mengantarkan 20 karangan bunga! Aku ingin tahu apa hadiahnya!

English: Give Back the Love.
Indonesian: Berikan Back the Love.

English: I have to gather 10 pieces of hearts. It's time to hunt some masquerpets.
Indonesian: Aku harus mengumpulkan 10 buah hati. Saatnya berburu topeng.

English: Vagrant Master (Acrobat)
Indonesian: Vagrant Master (Acrobat)

English: So you want to be an Acrobat, huh? You won't regret it! I have a simple test for you before starting the training. Are you ready? …hic!
Indonesian: Jadi kamu ingin menjadi Acrobat, ya? Kamu tidak akan menyesalinya! Aku memiliki tes sederhana untuk kamu sebelum memulai pelatihan. Apakah kamu siap? … hic!

English: Good luck! You'll need it!
Indonesian: Semoga beruntung! Kamu akan membutuhkannya!

English: What are you afraid of? The path to become an Acrobat may be difficult for some, but it's so worth it! Come back if you change your mind, friend.
Indonesian: Apa yang kamu takutkan? Jalan untuk menjadi Acrobat mungkin sulit bagi sebagian orang, tetapi itu sangat berharga! Kembalilah jika kamu berubah pikiran, teman.

English: Well done. You've passed the first test!
Indonesian: Bagus sekali. Kamu telah lulus ujian pertama!

English: I'm still waiting for you to hunt $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ Small Aibatts. If you want to become an Acrobat, you must complete this simple task.
Indonesian: Aku masih menunggumu untuk berburu $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ Small Aibatts. Jika kamu ingin menjadi Acrobat, kamu harus menyelesaikan tugas sederhana ini.

English: You have already chosen to pursue another path. I cannot help you any further. You can still cancel the other job quest in the Quest Window and come back to me.
Indonesian: Kamu telah memilih untuk mengejar jalan lain. Aku tidak dapat membantumu lebih jauh. Kamu masih bisa membatalkan pencarian pekerjaan lain di Quest Window dan kembali kepadaku.

English: For starters, let's go with something easy. I would like you to hunt $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s.
Indonesian: Sebagai permulaan, mari kita lakukan sesuatu yang mudah. Aku ingin kamu berburu $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s.

English: Acrobat Weaponry
Indonesian: Acrobat Weaponry

English: Now it's time for the next step on your path to becoming an Acrobat.
Indonesian: Sekarang saatnya untuk langkah selanjutnya di jalanmu untuk menjadi seorang Acrobat.

English: I want you to return to collect 10 Twinkle Stones from Aibatts in the area, 5 Peakyrinds from Peakyturtles and 1 Slain from Lawolf.
Indonesian: Aku ingin kamu kembali untuk mengumpulkan 10 Twinkle Stones dari Aibatts di area, 5 Peakyrinds dari Peakyturtles dan 1 Slain dari Lawolf.

English: Once you've gathered the Twinkle Stones, bring them to Pyre in the north of Flarine.
Indonesian: Setelah kamu mengumpulkan Twinkle Stones, bawa ke Pyre di utara Flarine.

English: Good luck! You're going to need it!
Indonesian: Semoga beruntung! Kamu akan membutuhkannya!

English: You must like being a Vagrant. It would certainly be a shame if you quit now. I'll be here if you have a change of heart.
Indonesian: Kamu pasti suka menjadi seorang Vagrant. Tentu akan sangat disayangkan jika kamu berhenti sekarang. Aku akan berada di sini jika kamu berubah pikiran.

English: Thank you for the Twinkle Stones, Apprentice. I will cover Acrobat weaponry with you now. Acrobats are able to wield both Bows and Yo-Yos.
Indonesian: Terima kasih untuk Twinkle Stones, Apprentice. Aku akan menutupi persenjataan Acrobat denganmu sekarang. Acrobat dapat menggunakan Bows dan Yo-Yos.

English: Bows are long range weapons that consume arrows for each shot. The strength of the basic shot is determined by how long you wait before releasing the arrow.
Indonesian: Bows adalah senjata jarak jauh yang menggunakan panah untuk setiap tembakan. Kekuatan tembakan dasar ditentukan oleh berapa lama kamu menunggu sebelum melepaskan panah.

English: Yo-Yos are also long range weapons. However, the strength of the basic attack only changes depending on special skills used in conjunction with them.
Indonesian: Yo-Yos juga merupakan senjata jarak jauh. Namun, kekuatan serangan dasar hanya berubah tergantung pada keterampilan khusus yang digunakan bersama dengan mereka.

English: If you met with Hent, then you should probably have something for me, hmm?
Indonesian: Jika kamu bertemu dengan Hent, maka kamu mungkin harus memiliki sesuatu untukku, hmm?

English: Gather 10 Twinkle Stones, 5 Peakyrinds and 1 Slain then deliver them to Acrobat Master Pyre near the Darken City Quest Office.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan 10 Twinkle Stones, 5 Peakyrinds dan 1 Slain lalu kirimkan ke Acrobat Master Pyre di dekat Darken City Quest Office.

English: Acrobat Skills
Indonesian: Acrobat Skills

English: That about does it for Acrobat weaponry.
Indonesian: Itu tentang persenjataan Acrobat.

English: Now for the next step in your journey. I want you to travel to Flaris, and visit the High-Dwarpets. They have important information for you.
Indonesian: Sekarang untuk langkah selanjutnya dalam perjalananmu. Aku ingin kamu melakukan perjalanan ke Flaris, dan mengunjungi High-Dwarpets. Mereka memiliki informasi penting untukmu.

English: The High-Dwarpets can be found north of Flarine. Check your map (M Key) to find your way if you get lost.
Indonesian: High-Dwarpets dapat ditemukan di utara Flarine. Periksa petamu (Tombol M) untuk menemukan jalanmu jika tersesat.

English: Good luck, apprentice.
Indonesian: Semoga berhasil, apprentice.

English: What a shame to waste such potential. Come see me again if you change your mind.
Indonesian: Sayang sekali jika potensi seperti itu disia-siakan. Temui aku lagi jika kamu berubah pikiran.

English: Hmmm, has Pyre instructed you to see me? I see. Very well, I will continue your training. Listen up!
Indonesian: Hmmm, sudahkah Pyre menyuruhmu menemuiku? Aku mengerti. Baiklah, aku akan melanjutkan pelatihan. Dengarkan!

English: Bows consume Magic Points (MP) and yo-yos consume Focus Points (FP). There are 6 special bow abilities and 7 special yo-yo abilities. I shall teach you a common Acrobat ability, Dark Illusion.
Indonesian: Bows mengkonsumsi Magic Points (MP) dan yo-yos mengkonsumsi Focus Points (FP). Ada 6 kemampuan special bows dan 7 kemampuan special yo-yo. Aku akan mengajarimu kemampuan umum Acrobat, Dark Illusion.

English: This ability allows you to vanish from sight. However, keep in mind that any actions performed while under the effects of this ability aside from movement will remove the effect. Take this.
Indonesian: Kemampuan ini memungkinkan kamu untuk menghilang dari pandangan. Namun, perlu diingat bahwa tindakan apa pun yang dilakukan saat berada di bawah pengaruh kemampuan ini selain dari gerakan akan menghilangkan efeknya. Ambil ini.

English: It's interesting that you've come to see me. Did Pyre send you? If he did, you would have something for me.
Indonesian: Sangat menarik bahwa kamu datang menemui saya. Apakah Pyre mengirimmu? Jika dia melakukannya, kamu pasti memiliki sesuatu untukku.

English: Visit High-Dwarpet Tucani in Flaris. He can be found north of Flarine. Check your map (M Key) to find your way if you get lost.
Indonesian: Kunjungi High-Dwarpet Tucani di Flaris. Dia dapat ditemukan di utara Flarine. Periksa petamu (Tombol M) untuk menemukan jalan jika kamu tersesat.

English: An Acrobat's Duty
Indonesian: An Acrobat's Duty

English: You've learned many things since your journey began.
Indonesian: Kamu telah belajar banyak hal sejak perjalananmu dimulai.

English: Now for the next step in your training. There is a creature named Shuraiture in the north of Flarine who is causing some trouble for residents there.
Indonesian: Sekarang untuk langkah selanjutnya dalam pelatihanmu. Ada makhluk bernama Shuraiture di utara Flarine yang menyebabkan masalah bagi penduduk di sana.

English: Shuraiture has been terrorizing some of the locals in Flaris. I want you to go there and put an end to him once and for all. Bring news of your victory to Tailer, the Acrobat Instructor in Flarine.
Indonesian: Shuraiture telah meneror beberapa penduduk lokal di Flaris. Aku ingin kamu pergi ke sana dan memusnahkan dia untuk selamanya. Bawa berita kemenanganmu ke Tailer, Acrobat Instructor di Flarine.

English: Good luck, you'll need it!
Indonesian: Semoga berhasil, kamu akan membutuhkannya!

English: What's the matter? Chicken?
Indonesian: Apa masalahnya? Ayam?

English: Shuraiture is… no more? What great news! Thank you so much! I see that you've also spoken with Tucani. Here is your reward for defeating Shuraiture.
Indonesian: Shuraiture adalah ... tidak lebih? Sungguh berita bagus! Terima kasih banyak! Aku melihat bahwa kamu juga telah berbicara dengan Tucani. Ini hadiahmu karena telah mengalahkan Shuraiture.

English: Acrobats are very versatile. We can fight at long range or in close quarters! We also have a special ability which allows us to pull an enemy target up close.
Indonesian: Acrobats sangat serbaguna. Kita bisa bertarung dalam jarak jauh atau dalam jarak dekat! Kami juga memiliki kemampuan khusus yang memungkinkan kami untuk menarik target musuh dari dekat.

English: You've done well. I sense great potential in you. Congratulations, Acrobat!
Indonesian: Kamu telah melakukannya dengan baik. Aku merasakan potensi besar dalam dirimu. Selamat, Acrobat!

English: Why have you come to see me? Did Tucani send you?
Indonesian: Mengapa kamu datang menemuiku? Apakah Tucani yang mengirimmu?

English: There is a creature named Shuraiture in the north of Flarine. I want you to go there and put an end to him. Bring news of your victory to Tailer the Acrobat Instructor in Flarine.
Indonesian: Ada makhluk bernama Shuraiture di dekat pintu masuk Flarine. Aku ingin kamu pergi ke sana dan memusnahkannya. Bawa berita kemenanganmu ke Tailer Acrobat Instructor di Flarine.

English: Successor of the Hero - Master
Indonesian: Successor of the Hero - Master

English: You think you have what it takes to be a successor of the Jester Hero? We will see…
Indonesian: Kamu pikir apa saja yang diperlukan untuk menjadi penerus Pahlawan Jester? Kita lihat…

English: Fine, I'll humor you. Slay $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s southwest of the Gouthan Mountains. They must be regular $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, not the small or captain variety.
Indonesian: Baiklah, aku akan menghiburmu. Bunuh $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s di barat daya Gouthan Mountains. Mereka harus biasa $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, bukan jenis kecil ataupun kapten.

English: Show me what you can do and I might consider allowing you to continue on the path of the Jester Hero.
Indonesian: Tunjukkan padaku apa yang dapat kamu lakukan dan aku mungkin mempertimbangkan untuk mengizinkanmu melanjutkan jalan Jester Hero.

English: That's too bad because I sense potential in you. You must not be ready for the challenges that lie ahead. Come see me again if you change your mind.
Indonesian: Itu terlalu buruk karena aku merasakan potensi dalam dirimu. Kamu tidak harus siap untuk tantangan yang ada di depan. Temui aku lagi jika kamu berubah pikiran.

English: Not bad, Acrobat. Not bad at all. You may have something to offer. I'll allow your training.
Indonesian: Tidak buruk, Acrobat. Tidak terlalu buruk. Kamu mungkin memiliki sesuatu untuk ditawarkan. Aku akan mengizinkan pelatihanmu.

English: I doubt you have what it takes to be a Jester if you can't even slay 20 Drillers.
Indonesian: Aku ragu kamu memiliki apa saja yang diperlukan untuk menjadi Jester jika bahkan kamu tidak bisa membunuh 20 Drillers.

English: You are already on a different path. You cannot become a successor of the Jester Hero.
Indonesian: Kamu sudah berada di jalan yang berbeda. Kamu tidak bisa menjadi penerus Jester Hero.

English: I'll need to see what you can do before I'll allow your training. Slay $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s southwest of the Gouthan Mountains. They must be regular $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, not the small or captain variety.
Indonesian: Aku perlu melihat apa yang dapat kamu lakukan sebelum aku mengizinkan pelatihanmu. Bunuh $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ di barat daya Gouthan Mountain. Mereka hanyalah $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ biasa, bukan jenis kecil ataupun kapten.

English: Successor of Hero - Ring
Indonesian: Successor of Hero - Ring

English: Here is a Letter of Recommendation. You will need to give this to Radyon, the Jester Wise Man in Flaris.
Indonesian: Ini Letter of Recommendation. Kamu harus memberikan ini ke Radyon, Jester Wise Man di Flaris.

English: Radyon can be found at the Fountain of Dead Person north of the River of Weeping. Before meeting with him, you need to find the ring he lost and return it to him.
Indonesian: Radyon dapat ditemukan di Fountain of Dead Person di utara River of Weeping. Sebelum bertemu dengannya, kamu perlu menemukan cincin yang hilang dan mengembalikannya kepadanya.

English: Far to the south of Saint City, lies the Fantasy Desert. It is believed that a gentleman named Ren is in possession of the ring. Slay Ren and bring the ring to Radyon.
Indonesian: Jauh di selatan Saint City, terletak Fantasy Desert. Diyakini bahwa seorang pria bernama Ren memiliki cincin tersebut. Bunuh Ren dan bawa cincin itu ke Radyon.

English: I hope I'm right about you. Don't let me down!
Indonesian: Aku harap aku menilaimu dengan benar. Jangan mengecewakanku!

English: I guess I was wrong about you. You're not ready to walk the path of the successor of the Jester hero. See me again when you think you're ready.
Indonesian: Kurasa aku salah tentangmu. Kamu belum siap untuk berjalan di jalan sebagai penerus Jester Hero. Temui aku lagi ketika kamu sudah siap.

English: Is that… the ring? My goodness, thank you so much! This ring belongs to the Jester Hero Curenen. Ren has always wanted to acquire this ring, or so the story goes.
Indonesian: Apakah itu… cincin? Ya ampun, terima kasih banyak! Cincin ini milik Jester Hero Curenen. Ren selalu ingin mendapatkan cincin ini, atau begitulah ceritanya.

English: After the war ended, and Curenen passed on, Ren searched for this ring for hundreds of years. He finally discovered it a couple of years ago.
Indonesian: Setelah perang berakhir, dan Curenen meninggal, Ren mencari cincin ini selama ratusan tahun. Dia akhirnya menemukannya beberapa tahun yang lalu.

English: Have you met Lorein? If you did, you should have something for me. Think carefully.
Indonesian: Apakah kamu bertemu dengan Lorein? Jika iya, kamu pasti memiliki sesuatu untukku. Pikirkan baik-baik.

English: Meet with Radyon, the Jester Wise Man at the Fountain of Dead Person in Flaris. First though, slay Ren and get the ring from him. He can be found in the Fantasy Desert south of Saint City.
Indonesian: Temui Radyon, Jester Wise Man di Fountain of Dead Person di Flaris. Pertama, bunuh Ren dan dapatkan cincin itu darinya. Dia dapat ditemukan di Fantasy Desert di selatan Saint City.

English: Successor of Hero - Scroll
Indonesian: Successor of Hero - Scroll

English: My sincerest gratitude once again for finding the ring. However, now I'll need you to take it to Saint City.
Indonesian: Terima kasihku yang tulus sekali lagi karena telah menemukan cincin itu. Namun, sekarang aku membutuhkanmu untuk membawanya ke Saint City.

English: Visit the Pepoview Troupe near the town square and speak with Clackcable. Present him with the ring and he will guide you from there. He may even give you something in return.
Indonesian: Kunjungi Pepoview Troupe di dekat alun-alun kota dan berbicara dengan Clackcable. Hadiahi dia dengan cincin dan dia akan menuntunmu dari sana. Dia bahkan mungkin memberimu sesuatu sebagai balasannya.

English: You possess great potential, young Acrobat. Keep working hard and you will realize your dream.
Indonesian: Kamu memiliki potensi besar, Acrobat muda. Teruslah bekerja keras dan kamu akan mewujudkan impianmu.

English: Foolish Acrobat! Don't you realize your potential? See me again if you change your mind.
Indonesian: Acrobat bodoh! Apakah kamu tidak menyadari potensimu? Temui aku lagi jika kamu berubah pikiran.

English: Thank you so much for finding the ring! We are performing the ancestral ceremony of Curenen. This ring will complete the ritual.
Indonesian: Terima kasih banyak telah menemukan cincinnya! Kami sedang melakukan upacara leluhur Curenen. Cincin ini akan melengkapi ritualnya.

English: Here, you certainly deserve this. It is the Successor Scroll of the Jester Hero.
Indonesian: Di sini, kamu tentu pantas mendapatkan ini. Ini adalah Successor Scroll of the Jester Hero.

English: If you spoke with Radyon, didn't he ask you to bring me something? I'm sorry, I'm very busy and we don't have much more to discuss, I'm afraid.
Indonesian: Jika kamu berbicara dengan Radyon, bukankah dia memintamu untuk membawakanku sesuatu? Maaf, saya sangat sibuk dan tidak banyak yang bisa kita diskusikan, sepertinya.

English: Bring Curenen's ring to Clackcable of the Pepoview Troupe in Saint City.
Indonesian: Bawa cincin Curenen ke Clackcable of the Pepoview Troupe di Saint City.

English: Successor of Hero - Altar
Indonesian: Successor of Hero - Altar

English: This scroll is the right of passage for those seeking to pursue the path of the Jester Hero. Please, take it and seek the Jester Priest in Darkon 3.
Indonesian: Scroll ini adalah hak bagi mereka yang ingin mengejar jalan Jester Hero. Tolong, ambillah dan cari Jester Priest di Darkon 3.

English: The Jester Priest can be found in Magmient in Southern Darkon 3. Present her with the scroll and she will recognize you as a successor to the Jester Hero.
Indonesian: Jester Priest dapat ditemukan di Magmient di Southern Darkon 3. Berikan dia scroll tersebut dan dia akan mengenalimu sebagai penerus Jester Hero.

English: There is one thing you must do before you can speak with the Jester Priest. The Jewels of the Heroes adorn the Altar of Jester. One of these jewels was stolen a few days ago.
Indonesian: Ada satu hal yang harus kamu lakukan sebelum kamu bisa berbicara dengan Jester Priest. Jewels of the Heroes menghiasi Altar Jester. Salah satu permata ini dicuri beberapa hari yang lalu.

English: The jewels protect the soul of the Jester Hero, but they will not work if one of them is missing. The creature, Sisif, was seen near the alter a few days ago…
Indonesian: Permata itu melindungi jiwa Jester Hero, tetapi mereka tidak akan berfungsi jika salah satunya hilang. Makhluk itu, Sisif, terlihat di dekat altar beberapa hari yang lalu…

English: It is believed that this creature has stolen the jewel. Find Sisif and return the jewel to the Jester Priest, Homeit.
Indonesian: Diyakini bahwa makhluk ini telah mencuri permata itu. Temukan Sisif dan kembalikan permata itu ke Jester Priest, Homeit.

English: Good luck, Acrobat!
Indonesian: Semoga berhasil, Acrobat!

English: The jewel must be returned to the Altar of Jester. We need your help, Acrobat. Speak with me again when you are ready.
Indonesian: Permata itu harus dikembalikan ke Altar of Jester. Kami membutuhkan bantuanmu, Acrobat. Bicaralah denganku lagi ketika kamu sudah siap.

English: This is the Seal of Curenen and the Jewel of the Jester Hero. Thank you for returning this most prized artifact, Acrobat.
Indonesian: Ini adalah Seal of Curenen dan Jewel of the Jester Hero. Terima kasih telah mengembalikan artefak paling berharga ini, Acrobat.

English: Now we can protect the Soul of the Hero safely. I am in your debt.
Indonesian: Sekarang kita bisa melindungi Soul of the Hero dengan aman. Aku berhutang padamu.

English: I am waiting for someone who will bring me the Jewel of the Jester Hero. Do you have it?
Indonesian: Aku sedang menunggu seseorang yang akan membawakanku Jewel of the Jester Hero. Apakah kamu memilikinya?

English: Take the Successor Scroll of the Jester Hero, slay Sisif to retrieve the Jewel of the Jester Hero, and bring them both to the Jester Priest, Homeit.
Indonesian: Ambil Successor Scroll of the Jester Hero, bunuh Sisif untuk mengambil Jewel of the Jester Hero, dan bawa keduanya ke Jester Priest, Homeit.

English: Successor of Hero - Guardian
Indonesian: Successor of Hero - Guardian

English: Great job, Acrobat. For the final leg of your journey, you must confront the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$.
Indonesian: Kerja bagus, Acrobat. Untuk babak terakhir perjalananmu, kamu harus menghadapi $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$.

English: The will of the heroes is preserved in the Room of the Guardian in Guardiane. This is where you will find the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$.
Indonesian: Surat wasiat para pahlawan disimpan di Room of the Guardian di Guardiane. Di sinilah kamu akan menemukan $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$.

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ is a soul that protects the will of the heroes. Defeat him, and obtain the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Indonesian: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ adalah jiwa yang melindungi surat wasiat para pahlawan. Kalahkan dia, dan dapatkan $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.

English: Take this. It is a Mark of the Hero. Once you have confronted the Venel Guardian and retrieved the Venel Heart, bring both of these to the Jester Guardian, Heingard.
Indonesian: Ambil ini. Itu adalah Mark of the Hero. Setelah kamu menghadapi Venel Guardian dan mengambil Venel Heart, bawa keduanya ke Jester Guardian, Heingard.

English: I wish you luck, Acrobat.
Indonesian: Semoga berhasil, Acrobat.

English: This is the final test to becoming a successor of the Jester Hero. You can't give up now. Speak with me again when you are ready to continue.
Indonesian: Ini adalah ujian terakhir untuk menjadi penerus Jester Hero. Kamu tidak boleh menyerah sekarang. Bicaralah denganku lagi ketika kamu sudah siap untuk melanjutkan.

English: Congratulations, young Acrobat. I've heard many great things about you. You've completed the final test. You will now become a Successor of the Jester Hero!
Indonesian: Selamat, Acrobat muda. Aku telah mendengar banyak hal hebat tentangmu. Kamu telah menyelesaikan ujian akhir. Kamu sekarang akan menjadi Successor of the Jester Hero!

English: Wise Curenen! This Acrobat wishes to follow your path! Grant them your blessing and courage, Jester Hero!
Indonesian: Wise Curenen! Acrobat ini ingin mengikuti jalanmu! Beri mereka berkat dan keberanianmu, Jester Hero!

English: You have not completed the tasks given to you by the Jester Priest. Return to me when you have done so.
Indonesian: Kamu belum menyelesaikan tugas yang diberikan oleh Jester Priest. Kembalilah padaku ketika kamu sudah selesai.

English: Defeat the Venel Guardian, and deliver the Mark of the Hero and the Venel heart to the Jester Guardian, Heingard, in Guardiane.
Indonesian: Kalahkan Venel Guardian, dan berikan Mark of the Hero dan Venel heart ke Jester Guardian, Heingard, di Guardiane.

English: Successor of Hero - Master
Indonesian: Successor of Hero - Master

English: You think you have what it takes to be a successor of the Ranger Hero? We will see…
Indonesian: Kamu pikir apa saja yang diperlukan untuk menjadi penerus Ranger Hero? Kita lihat…

English: Show me what you can do and I might consider allowing you to continue on the path of the Ranger Hero.
Indonesian: Tunjukkan padaku apa yang dapat kamu lakukan dan aku mungkin akan mempertimbangkan untuk mengizinkanmu melanjutkan perjalanan Ranger Hero.

English: I doubt you have what it takes to be a Ranger if you can't even slay 20 Drillers.
Indonesian: Aku ragu kamu memerlukan apa saja untuk menjadi Ranger jika bahkan kamu tidak bisa membunuh 20 Drillers.

English: You've already chosen a different path. I cannot guide you on the path of the Ranger. You can still cancel the other job quest in the Quest Window and come back to me.
Indonesian: Kamu telah memilih jalan yang berbeda. Aku tidak bisa membimbingmu di perjalanan Ranger. Kamu masih dapat membatalkan pencarian pekerjaan lain di Quest Window dan kembali kepadaku.

English: Successor of Hero - Letter
Indonesian: Successor of Hero - Letter

English: Here is a Letter of Recommendation. You will need to give this to Kimel, the Ranger Wise Man in Flaris.
Indonesian: Ini Letter of Recommendation. Kamu harus memberikan ini ke Kimel, Ranger Wise Man di Flaris.

English: However, first you must retrieve the Letter of Hynan from Rubo, a creature found to be living with Syliacas, east of Darken. Locals caim Rubo has been seen with the letter.
Indonesian: Namun, pertama-tama kamu harus mengambil Letter of Hynan dari Rubo, makhluk yang ditemukan tinggal bersama Syliacas, di sebelah timur Darken. Warga setempat melihat Rubo membawa surat itu.

English: Once you've slain Rubo, bring the Letter of Recommendation and the Letter of Hynan to Sage Kimel at the Fountain of Dead Person in Flaris.
Indonesian: Setelah kamu membunuh Rubo, bawa Letter of Recommendation dan Letter of Hynan ke Sage Kimel di Fountain of Dead Person di Flaris.

English: Good luck to you, Acrobat.
Indonesian: Semoga berhasil, Acrobat.

English: I guess I was wrong about you. You're not ready to walk the path of the successor of the Ranger hero. See me again when you think you're ready.
Indonesian: Kurasa aku salah tentangmu. Kamu belum siap untuk melewati perjalanan penerus Ranger hero. Temui aku lagi ketika kamu sudah siap.

English: Is that… the Letter of Hynan? My goodness, this is wonderful! Thank you so much, Acrobat!
Indonesian: Apakah itu… Letter of Hynan? Ya ampun, ini luar biasa! Terima kasih banyak, Acrobat!

English: Hynan lost this letter during the war. There were rumors that a creature named Rubo was in possession of it. Thank you for retrieving it for me.
Indonesian: Hynan kehilangan surat ini selama perang. Ada rumor bahwa makhluk bernama Rubo memilikinya. Terima kasih telah mengambilkannya untukku.

English: My sincerest gratitude.
Indonesian: Terima kasih banyak.

English: I'm waiting for someone to bring me a letter. There are rumors that a creature named Rubo who lives with the Syliacas east of Darken was last seen with it.
Indonesian: Aku sedang menunggu seseorang untuk membawakanku surat. Ada rumor bahwa makhluk bernama Rubo yang tinggal bersama Syliacas di sebelah timur Darken terakhir kali terlihat bersamanya.

English: You need to speak with Kimel, the Ranger Wise Man at the Fountain of Dead Person in Flaris. First, though, you must retrieve the Letter of hynan from the creature, Rubo, East of Darken.
Indonesian: Kamu perlu berbicara dengan Kimel, Ranger Wise Man di Fountain of Dead Person di Flaris. Namun, pertama-tama, kamu harus mengambil Letter of hynan dari makhluk itu, Rubo, East of Darken.

English: Many thanks for bringing me the Letter of Hynan! I would like you to deliver it to High-Dwarpet Liekyen.
Indonesian: Terima kasih banyak telah membawakan saya Letter of Hynan! Aku ingin kamu mengirimkannya ke High-Dwarpet Liekyen.

English: High-Dwarpet Liekyen can be found near the northwestern edge of town in Darken.
Indonesian: High-Dwarpet Liekyen dapat ditemukan di dekat tepi barat laut kota di Darken.

English: Hello, I am Liekyen. A former steward of the Hynan family. I now administer the keepsakes of the Hynan family. What have you got there?
Indonesian: Halo, aku Liekyen. Mantan pelayan keluarga Hynan. Aku sekarang mengelola kenang-kenangan keluarga Hynan. Apa yang kamu dapat disana?

English: The Letter of Hynan?! This was the last lost keepsake of the Hynan family. How did you… no matter. The important thing is that it has been returned. I have been looking for this for a very long time.
Indonesian: Letter of Hynan?! Ini adalah kenang-kenangan terakhir yang hilang dari keluarga Hynan. Bagaimana kamu ... lupakan saja. Yang penting sudah dikembalikan. Aku telah lama mencari ini.

English: Now all of the keepsakes of the Hynan family are accounted for. Here, take this. This scroll will prove that you are ready to become a successor of the Ranger Hero.
Indonesian: Sekarang semua kenang-kenangan keluarga Hynan dipertanggungjawabkan. Ambil ini. Scroll ini akan membuktikan bahwa kamu siap menjadi penerus Ranger Hero.

English: I'm waiting for someone to deliver a letter to me. Do you have it? No? Then our business is concluded.
Indonesian: Aku sedang menunggu seseorang mengirimkan surat. Apakah kamu memilikinya? Tidak? Kemudian bisnis kita selesai.

English: Take the Letter of Hynan to High-Dwarpet Liekyen in Darken.
Indonesian: Bawa Letter of Hynan ke High-Dwarpet Liekyen di Darken.

English: This scroll is the right of passage for those seeking to pursue the path of the Ranger Hero. Please, take it and seek the Ranger Priest in Darkon 3.
Indonesian: Scroll ini adalah bagian bagi mereka yang ingin mengejar perjalanan Ranger Hero. Tolong, ambil dan cari Ranger Priest di Darkon 3.

English: Rupin, the Ranger Priest, can be found in Aniceknight in northern Darkon 3. Present her with the scroll and she will recognize you as a successor to the Ranger Hero.
Indonesian: Rupin, Ranger Priest, dapat ditemukan di Aniceknight di Darkon 3 utara. Hadiahi dia scroll itu dan dia akan mengenalimu sebagai penerus Ranger Hero.

English: There is one thing you must do before you can speak with the Ranger Priest. Pranksters in the Garden of Rhisis have stolen the 8 books of the History of Heroes.
Indonesian: Ada satu hal yang harus kamu lakukan sebelum kamu bisa berbicara dengan Ranger Priest. Pranksters di Garden of Rhisis telah mencuri 8 buku History of Heroes.

English: These books detail the History of the Heroes and are very sacred us. Go now, to Rhisis, and do what you must to get these books back!
Indonesian: Buku-buku ini merangkum History of the Heroes dan sangat sakral bagi kita. Pergilah sekarang, ke Rhisis, dan lakukan apa yang harus kamu lakukan untuk mendapatkan kembali buku-buku ini!

English: Good luck to you, Acrobat. May the Ranger Hero guide you. Speak with Rupin, the Ranger Priest in Aniceknight, once you've recovered the sacred texts.
Indonesian: Semoga berhasil, Acrobat. Semoga Ranger Hero menuntunmu. Bicaralah dengan Rupin, Ranger Priest di Aniceknight, setelah kamu menemukan sacred text.

English: The books must be returned. We need your help, Acrobat. Speak with me again when you are ready.
Indonesian: Buku-buku itu harus dikembalikan. Kami membutuhkan bantuanmu, Acrobat. Bicaralah denganku lagi ketika kamu sudah siap.

English: What've you got there, Acrobat? A Stamped Scroll, and are those… they are! I can't believe it! The 8 lost books of the History of Heroes!
Indonesian: Apa yang kamu dapatkan di sana, Acrobat? Stamped Scroll, dan apakah itu… mereka! Aku tidak percaya! 8 buku History of Heroes yang hilang!

English: How did you ever… never mind! The important thing is that we have them back! We owe you our sincerest gratitude, young Acrobat!
Indonesian: Pernahkah kamu ... tidak apa-apa! Yang penting adalah kita mendapatkannya kembali! Kami berutang banyak terima kasih, Acrobat muda!

English: I'm waiting for someone who has allegedly found the 8 lost books of the History of Heroes. Is that you? No? Then we have nothing more to discuss.
Indonesian: Aku sedang menunggu seseorang yang diduga telah menemukan 8 buku History of Heroes yang hilang. Apa itu kamu? Tidak? Maka tidak ada lagi yang perlu kita diskusikan.

English: Bring the Stamped Scroll and the 8 lost History of Hero books to Rupim, the Ranger Priest in Aniceknight in Darkon 3.
Indonesian: Bawa Stamped Scroll dan 8 buku History of Hero yang hilang ke Rupim, Ranger Priest di Aniceknight di Darkon 3.

English: Take this. It is a Mark of the Hero. Once you have confronted the Venel Guardian and retrieved the Venel Heart, bring both of these to the Ranger Guardian, Kailreard.
Indonesian: Ambil ini. Itu adalah Mark of the Hero. Setelah kamu menghadapi Venel Guardian dan mengambil Venel Heart, bawa keduanya ke Ranger Guardian, Kailreard.

English: Congratulations, young Acrobat. I've heard many great things about you. You've completed the final test. You will now become a Successor of the Ranger Hero!
Indonesian: Selamat, Acrobat muda. Aku telah mendengar banyak hal hebat tentangmu. Kamu telah menyelesaikan ujian akhir. Kamu sekarang akan menjadi Successor of the Ranger Hero!

English: Wise Hynan! This Acrobat wishes to follow your path! Grant them your blessing and power, Ranger Hero!
Indonesian: Wise Hynan! Acrobat ini ingin mengikuti jalanmu! Berikan mereka berkat dan kekuatanmu, Ranger Hero!

English: Defeat the Venel Guardian, and deliver the Mark of the Hero and the Venel heart to the Ranger Guardian, Kailreard, in Guardiane.
Indonesian: Kalahkan Venel Guardian, dan berikan Mark of the Hero dan Venel heart ke Ranger Guardian, Kailreard, di Guardiane.

English: The best wine, Beaujolais!
Indonesian: Wine terbaik, Beaujolais!

English: Some of the grapes grown in Madrigal are used for wine. Especially the wines which are made from Flaris variety, Saint variety, Darkon variety are
Indonesian: Beberapa buah anggur yang ditanam di Madrigal digunakan untuk bahan baku wine. Terutama wine yang dibuat dari jenis Flaris, jenis Saint, jenis Darkon

English: named Beaujolais and you can get mysterious power when you drink them, according to the legend.
Indonesian: bernama Beaujolais dan kamu bisa mendapatkan kekuatan misterius saat meminumnya, menurut legenda.

English: It seems like these 3 kinds of grapes have a magical power from the earth. I studied them for a long time.
Indonesian: Sepertinya 3 jenis anggur ini memiliki kekuatan magis dari bumi. Aku sudah mempelajarinya sejak lama.

English: But we do not have these grapes right now, even though it is harvest season. The monsters came and took them all.
Indonesian: Tetapi kami tidak memiliki anggur ini sekarang, meskipun ini adalah musim panen. Monster datang dan membawa mereka semua.

English: Therefore we can not drink the wine that we have been waiting for. In addition the monsters will get the magical power. Would you bring the grapes back?
Indonesian: Oleh karena itu kami tidak dapat meminum wine yang telah kami tunggu-tunggu. Selain itu monster akan mendapatkan kekuatan magis. Apakah kamu akan membawa anggur-anggur itu kembali?

English: Hmm... I cannot brew wine until the ban on making Beaujolais is lifted.
Indonesian: Hmm.. Aku tidak bisa membuat wine sampai larangan membuat Beaujolais dicabut.

English: Oh! I can brew a little bit of wine with these! Thank you. I want to reward you with 1 bottle of Beaujolais Flaris which was made from the grapes other adventurers brought.
Indonesian: Oh! Aku bisa membuat sedikit wine dengan ini! Terima kasih. Aku ingin menghadiahimu dengan 1 botol Beaujolais Flaris yang terbuat dari anggur-anggur yang dibawa petualang lain.

English: You can find out how it tastes, just try some yourself!
Indonesian: Kamu dapat mengetahui bagaimana rasanya, coba saja sendiri!

English: Is this all? It is not enough to brew wine. I need $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ grapes at least. Please!
Indonesian: Apakah ini semua? Tidaklah cukup untuk membuat wine. Aku membutuhkan setidaknya $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ anggur. Tolong!

English: ...And if you have the grapes from the other areas... you should deliver them to the person who brews wine in that area.
Indonesian: ..Dan jika kamu memiliki anggur dari daerah lain..Kamu harus memberikannya kepada orang yang membuat wine di daerah itu.

English: Oh thank you. There are 3 kinds of grape divided by where they are grown. Please gather $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ grapes of this area because I cannot brew wine with the grapes from other areas.
Indonesian: Oh terima kasih. Ada 3 jenis anggur yang dibagi berdasarkan tempat tumbuhnya. Kumpulkan $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ anggur dari area ini karena aku tidak dapat membuat wine dengan anggur dari area lain.

English: Vagrant Master (Mercenary)
Indonesian: Vagrant Master (Mercenary)

English: What?! Hahaha! You think you have what it takes to be a Mercenary? Oh, that's good …hic! I think you'd be better off as a comedian!
Indonesian: Apa?! Ha ha ha! Kamu pikir apa saja yang diperlukan untuk menjadi Mercenary? Oh, itu bagus ... hic! Aku pikir kamu lebih baik menjadi komedian!

English: You're still here? Ugh… fine. I'll humor you just this once. If you think you are strong enough to be a Mercenary, then I'll need you to do a little something for me.
Indonesian: Kamu masih di sini? Ugh… baiklah. Aku akan menghiburmu sekali ini saja. Jika kamu pikir kamu cukup kuat untuk menjadi Mercenary, aku ingin kamu melakukan sesuatu untukku.

English: Small Aibatts have been infesting our crops just north of here. We need someone to go exterminate some of those filthy things.
Indonesian: Small Aibatts telah menyerang tanaman kami di utara ini. Kami membutuhkan seseorang untuk pergi memusnahkan hal-hal menyebalkan itu.

English: Slay 20 Small Aibatts and 20 Small Mushpangs then return me when you are finished. Understand? Now get out of here, vermin!
Indonesian: Bunuh 20 Small Aibatts dan 20 Small Mushpangs lalu kembalikan padaku saat kamu selesai. Mengerti? Sekarang pergi dari sini, kutu!

English: Good luck, Vagrant. You'll need it! Hahaha!
Indonesian: Semoga berhasil, Vagrant. Kamu akan membutuhkan itu! Hahaha!

English: I knew you were all talk, Vagrant. That's 30 seconds of my life I won't be getting back…
Indonesian: Aku tahu kamu bicara, Vagrant. Itu 30 detik dalam hidupku, aku tidak akan kembali…

English: Hmmm, that's acceptable. Not bad, Vagrant! Although, I could have done it in half the time. But that's neither here nor there.
Indonesian: Hmm, bisa diterima. Tidak buruk, Vagrant! Meskipun, aku bisa melakukannya di separuh waktu. Tapi itu tidak di sini ataupun di sana.

English: Hahaha! As if you could ever hope to compare yourself to me… Mustang the Great!
Indonesian: Ha ha ha! Seolah-olah kamu bisa berharap untuk membandingkan dirimu denganku… Mustang the Great!

English: What's the matter? You're not afraid of some Small Aibatts, are you?
Indonesian: Apa masalahnya? Kamu tidak takut pada beberapa Small Aibatts, bukan?

English: Alright, listen carefully. Just north of here, there are several Small Aibatts. Slay 20 of them with 20 Small Mushpangs and return to me. Got it?
Indonesian: Baiklah, dengarkan baik-baik. Di utara sini, ada beberapa Small Aibatts. Bunuh 20 dari mereka dengan 20 Small Mushpangs dan kembalikan padaku. Mengerti?

English: <Mustang mumbles something under his breath about you being… not so bright.>
Indonesian: <Mustang menggumamkan sesuatu dengan pelan tentang dirimu... tidak begitu jelas.>

English: I cannot train you to be a Mercenary. You have already chosen another path. You can still cancel the other job quest in the Quest Window and come back to me.
Indonesian: Aku tidak bisa melatihmu untuk menjadi Mercenary. Kamu telah memilih jalan lain. Kamu masih dapat membatalkan pencarian pekerjaan lain di Quest Window dan kembali kepadaku.

English: Slay 20 Small Aibatts and 20 Small Mushpangs just north of Eastern Flarine and return to Mercenary Drillmaster Mustang.
Indonesian: Bunuh 20 Small Aibatts dan 20 Small Mushpangs di utara Flarine Timur dan kembali ke Mercenary Drillmaster Mustang.

English: Mercenary Arms
Indonesian: Mercenary Arms

English: I suppose you've proven you're not completely useless. On to the next task!
Indonesian: Aku kira kamu telah membuktikan bahwa kamu tidak sepenuhnya tidak berguna. Ayo ke tugas berikutnya!

English: I want you to gather the materials needed for making the weapons of the Mercenary. Try not to mess this one up, alright?
Indonesian: Aku ingin kamu mengumpulkan bahan-bahan yang dibutuhkan untuk membuat senjata Mercenary. Cobalah untuk tidak mengacaukan yang satu ini, oke?

English: Collect 10 Twinkle Stones from Aibatts in the area, 5 Chupims from Pukepukes and 1 Poporam from Doridoma. They should be relatively easy to find.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan 10 Twinkle Stones dari Aibatts di area tersebut, 5 Chupim dari Pukepukes dan 1 Poporam dari Doridoma. Mereka harusnya mudah ditemukan.

English: Once you've gathered enough Twinkle Stones, Chupims and Poporam, bring them to Andy the Mercenary Master in northern Flarine.
Indonesian: Setelah kamu mengumpulkan cukup Twinkle Stones, Chupims dan Poporam, bawa mereka ke Andy Mercenary Master di Flarine utara.

English: Good luck! You're gonna need it!
Indonesian: Semoga berhasil! Kamu akan membutuhkannya!

English: Are you afraid of a couple Aibatts? I know they stink and all... but really?
Indonesian: Apakah kamu takut pada sepasang Aibatt? Aku tahu mereka bau dan sebagainya... tapi benarkah?

English: Great job acquiring the Twinkle Stones, Chupims and Poporam, Vagrant. Oh, and don't worry about old Mustang. He's all bark and no bite!
Indonesian: Kerja bagus untuk mendapatkan Twinkle Stones, Chupims dan Poporam, Vagrant. Oh, dan jangan khawatir tentang Mustang tua. Dia menggonggong dan tidak menggigit!

English: A Mercenary can use both swords and axes. They each have strengths and weaknesses. Swords strike fast, but deal only moderate damage, whereas axes deal heavy damage but at a moderate speed.
Indonesian: Seorang Mercenary dapat menggunakan pedang dan kapak. Masing-masing memiliki kekuatan dan kelemahan. Pedang dapat menyerang dengan cepat, tetapi hanya memberikan damage sedang, sedangkan kapak memberikan damage yang keras tetapi pada kecepatan sedang.

English: Which weapon suits you best? That's a decision only you can make, young Vagrant.
Indonesian: Senjata mana yang paling cocok untukmu? Keputusan itu hanya kamu yang bisa menentukannya, Vagrant muda.

English: You need to acquire 10 Twinkle Stones, 5 Chupims and 1 Poporam before I can continue your training, Vagrant.
Indonesian: Kamu harus mendapatkan 10 Twinkle Stone, 5 Chupim dan 1 Poporam sebelum aku bisa melanjutkan latihanmu, Vagrant.

English: Gather 10 Twinkle Stones from the Aibatts, 5 Chupims from Pukepukes and 1 Poporam from Doridoma then bring them to Andy, the Mercenary Master in northern Flarine.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan 10 Twinkle Stones dari Aibatts, 5 Chupim dari Pukepukes dan 1 Poporam dari Doridoma lalu bawa ke Andy, Mercenary Master di Flarine utara.

English: Mercenary Skills
Indonesian: Mercenary Skills

English: You've done very well so far, Vagrant. You are ready for the next step in your journey to become a Mercenary!
Indonesian: Kamu telah melakukannya dengan sangat baik sejauh ini, Vagrant. Kamu siap untuk langkah selanjutnya dalam perjalananmu untuk menjadi Mercenary!

English: You must travel north, and visit the High-Dwarpets. Langdrong, one of the High-Dwarpets, will continue your training.
Indonesian: Kamu harus melakukan perjalanan ke utara, dan mengunjungi High-Dwarpets. Langdrong, salah satu High-Dwarpets, akan melanjutkan latihanmu.

English: High-Dwarpet Langdrong will educate you on Mercenary skills.
Indonesian: High-Dwarpet Langdrong akan mengajarimu tentang skill Mercenary.

English: You can find the High-Dwarpets north of Flarine. Check your map (M Key) if you get lost.
Indonesian: Kamu dapat menemukan High-Dwarpets di utara Flarine. Periksa petamu (Tombol M) jika kamu tersesat.

English: I sense great potential in you, Vagrant. Luck be with you.
Indonesian: Aku merasakan potensi besar dalam dirimu, Vagrant. Keberuntungan bersamamu.

English: What a shame. Please see me again if you change your mind.
Indonesian: Sayang sekali. Cobalah temui aku lagi jika kamu berubah pikiran.

English: Where did you find that, Vagrant? Tell you what, for bringing this to me, I will go over one of the Mercenary Skills it details here. Listen up!
Indonesian: Di mana kamu menemukannya, Vagrant? Katakan apa, untuk membawa ini kepadaku, aku akan membahas salah satu Mercenary Skills yang dijelaskan disini. Dengarkan!

English: As a Mercenary you can wield a weapon and a shield. The skill, Keenwheel, is a high damage spinning attack that can only be used after using the Slash skill and must be used in the Action Slot.
Indonesian: Sebagai Mercenary kamu dapat menggunakan senjata dan perisai. Skill Keenwheel merupakan serangan berputar dengan damage tinggi yang hanya bisa digunakan setelah menggunakan skill Slash dan harus digunakan di Action Slot.

English: Keenwheel is another example. Notice how the skills in the Skill Tree Window (K Key) are shaped like puzzle pieces? This is a good indicator of what skills can be used in what order.
Indonesian: Keenwheel adalah contoh lain. Perhatikan bagaimana skill di Skill Tree Window (Tombol K) berbentuk seperti potongan puzzle? Ini adalah indikator yang baik tentang skill apa yang dapat digunakan serta urutannya.

English: If Andy sent you, then he should have given you some proof. Maybe you're forgetting something, friend?
Indonesian: Jika Andy mengirimmu, maka dia seharusnya memberimu beberapa bukti. Mungkin kamu melupakan sesuatu, teman?

English: Speak with High-Dwarpet Langdrong. He can be found with the other High-Dwarpets north of Flarine.
Indonesian: Bicaralah dengan High-Dwarpet Langdrong. Dia dapat ditemukan dengan High-Dwarpets lainnya di utara Flarine.

English: Duty of Mercenary
Indonesian: Duty of Mercenary

English: So... are you starting to understand how a Mercenary works now? Don't lose that Label of Technique I gave you!
Indonesian: Jadi... apa kamu mulai mengerti cara kerja Mercenary sekarang? Jangan kehilangan Label of Technique yang kuberikan padamu!

English: Now for your next test! There is a creature named Babari just south of Flarine terrorizing the citizens there. Slay him, and seek out Hyuit, the Mercenary Instructor in Eastern Flarine.
Indonesian: Sekarang untuk ujianmu berikutnya! Ada makhluk bernama Babari di selatan Flarine meneror warga di sana. Bunuh dia, dan cari Hyuit, Mercenary Instructor di Flarine Timur.

English: Be careful, I hear Babari packs quite a punch!
Indonesian: Hati-hati, kudengar Babari mengeluarkan pukulan yang cukup keras!

English: You can't give up now, Vagrant! You've come so far already!
Indonesian: Kamu tidak bisa menyerah sekarang, Vagrant! Kamu sudah sampai sejauh ini!

English: The citizens of Flarine are in your debt, Vagrant! Now the children of Flarine can play outside without having to worry about being eaten by that big bully!
Indonesian: Warga Flarine berhutang budi padamu, Vagrant! Sekarang anak-anak Flarine bisa bermain di luar tanpa harus khawatir dimakan oleh si pengganggu besar itu!

English: Mercenaries are experts at close combat. We have the ability to stop an enemy's movement in order to close distance and keep them in range. This ability is called, Sneaker.
Indonesian: Mercenaries ahli dalam pertempuran jarak dekat. Memiliki kemampuan untuk menghentikan gerakan musuh untuk menutup jarak dan menjaga mereka tetap dalam jangkauan. Kemampuan ini disebut, Sneaker.

English: Our main strength is in one on one combat. If we can get within range of an enemy, you can bet they are going to feel it the next day! Welcome to the fold, Mercenary!
Indonesian: Kekuatan utamanya adalah pertarungan satu lawan satu. Jika bisa mendapatkan didalam jangkauan musuh, kamu bisa bertaruh mereka akan merasakannya keesokan harinya! Selamat datang di fold, Mercenary!

English: May I help you? I'm waiting for a pupil to take care of a little problem for me. I'm guessing that's not you? Then we have nothing further to discuss.
Indonesian: Dapatkah aku membantumu? Aku sedang menunggu seorang murid untuk mengurus sedikit masalah. Aku kira itu bukan kamu? Maka tidak ada lagi yang perlu kita diskusikan.

English: Slay Babari and speak with Mercenary Instructor Hyuit in Eastern Flarine.
Indonesian: Bunuh Babari dan bicaralah dengan Mercenary Instructor Hyuit di Flarine Timur.

English: Vagrant Master (Assist)
Indonesian: Vagrant Master (Assist)

English: So you want to be an Assist, huh? I don't blame you. It's the best job in Madrigal!
Indonesian: Jadi kamu ingin menjadi Assist, ya? Aku tidak menyalahkanmu. Ini pekerjaan terbaik di Madrigal!

English: First, I want you to take care of a little something for me. Small Mushpangs have been eating our crops lately.
Indonesian: Pertama, aku ingin kamu mengurus sesuatu untukku. Small Mushpangs telah memakan hasil panen kami akhir-akhir ini.

English: Just north of here, there are several Small Mushpangs. Slay 10 of them with 10 Small Burudengs and return to me as soon as possible.
Indonesian: Di utara sini, ada beberapa Small Mushpangs. Bunuh 10 dari mereka dengan 10 Small Burudengs dan kembalikan padaku secepat mungkin.

English: Good luck, Vagrant!
Indonesian: Semoga berhasil, Vagrant!

English: Having a change of heart? That's alright, come speak to me again if you change your mind.
Indonesian: Ada perubahan? Tidak apa-apa, datang dan bicaralah lagi jika kamu berubah pikiran.

English: Excellent work! Hopefully they'll stay away from our crops now.
Indonesian: Kerja bagus! Semoga mereka akan menjauh dari tanaman kita sekarang.

English: You've done very well so far. Keep up the good work!
Indonesian: Kamu telah melakukannya dengan sangat baik sejauh ini. Pertahankan kerja bagus!

English: Hurry! There isn't much time!
Indonesian: Cepatlah! Tidak ada banyak waktu!

English: You've already chosen another job. I can't help you any further. You can still cancel the other job quest in the Quest Window and come back to me.
Indonesian: Kamu telah memilih pekerjaan lain dan aku tidak bisa membantumu lebih jauh. Kamu masih dapat membatalkan pencarian pekerjaan lain di Quest Window dan kembali kepadaku.

English: Slay 10 Small Mushpangs and 10 Small Burudengs just north of Eastern Flarine then return to Assist Drillmaster Elic.
Indonesian: Bunuh 10 Small Mushpangs dan 10 Small Burudengsl di utara Flarine Timur lalu kembali ke Assist Drillmaster Elic.

English: Arm of Assist
Indonesian: Arm of Assist

English: You've done well so far, Vagrant. But I have another task for you if you are willing.
Indonesian: Kamu telah melakukannya dengan baik sejauh ini, Vagrant. Tapi aku punya tugas lain untukmu jika kamu bersedia.

English: For your next task, I need you to gather some materials which are used to create Assist weapons.
Indonesian: Untuk tugasmu selanjutnya, aku ingin kamu mengumpulkan beberapa bahan yang digunakan untuk membuat senjata Assist.

English: Retrieve 10 Forforms from Mushpangs, 5 Peakyrinds from Peakyturtles and 1 Poporam from Doridoma then bring them to Maki, the Assist Master in Northern Flarine.
Indonesian: Ambil 10 Forform dari Mushpangs, 5 Peakyrinds dari Peakyturtles dan 1 Poporam dari Doridoma lalu bawa ke Maki, Assist Master di Northern Flarine.

English: The Assist Master is with the Madrigal Job Masters in North-Fl. Go!
Indonesian: Assist Master bersama Madrigal Job Masters di North-Fl. Pergi!

English: I guess some people just aren't suited to be an Assist. That's alright, young one. Speak with me again if you change your mind.
Indonesian: Aku kira beberapa orang tidak cocok untuk menjadi Assist. Tidak apa-apa, anak muda. Bicaralah denganku lagi jika kamu berubah pikiran.

English: Thank you for delivering the Forform, Vagrant. Now, on to your next lesson. Assist weapons include Knuckles or Sticks.
Indonesian: Terima kasih telah mengirimkan Forform, Vagrant. Sekarang, ke pelajaran berikutnya. Senjata Assist termasuk Knuckles ataupun Sticks.

English: A Knuckle is a fist weapon used for close-quarters combat, and the Stick is used to perform certain Assist skills, such as healing.
Indonesian: Knuckle adalah senjata tinju yang digunakan untuk pertempuran jarak dekat, dan Stick digunakan untuk melakukan Assist skill tertentu, seperti penyembuhan.

English: It's important to remember that you must have the right weapon equipped to perform certain abilities. With enough practice, a good Assist can switch weapons in combat seamlessly.
Indonesian: Penting untuk diingat bahwa kamu harus memiliki senjata yang tepat untuk melakukan kemampuan tertentu. Dengan latihan yang cukup, Assist yang baik dapat mengganti senjata dalam pertempuran dengan mulus.

English: I'm sorry, I'm waiting for someone to bring something very important. Is that you? I didn't think so.
Indonesian: Maaf, aku sedang menunggu seseorang membawa sesuatu yang sangat penting. Apa itu kamu? Aku tidak berpikir begitu.

English: Gather 10 Forforms from Mushpangs, 5 Peakyrinds from Peakyturtles and 1 Poporam from Doridoma then deliver them to Maki, the Assist Master in Northern Flarine.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan 10 Forforms dari Mushpangs, 5 Peakyrinds dari Peakyrinds dan 1 Poporam dari Doridoma lalu kirimkan ke Maki, Assist Master di Northern Flarine.

English: Assist Skills
Indonesian: Assist Skills

English: Now that you have a good understanding of Assist weaponry, I'd like you to visit Goripeg, one of the High-Dwarpets north of Flarine.
Indonesian: Sekarang setelah kamu memiliki pemahaman yang baik tentang persenjataan Assist, aku ingin kamu mengunjungi Goripeg, salah satu High-Dwarpets di utara Flarine.

English: High-Dwarpet Goripeg will give you information on Assist skills. He knows a lot about Assists and I think you are ready to speak with him.
Indonesian: High-Dwarpet Goripeg akan memberimu informasi tentang Assist skill. Dia tahu banyak tentang Assist dan aku pikir kamu sudah siap untuk berbicara dengannya.

English: You can find the High-Dwarpets by opening your map (M Key). Go quickly, young one!
Indonesian: Kamu dapat menemukan High-Dwarpets dengan membuka petamu (Tombol M). Cepat pergi, anak muda!

English: May Bubble protect you and guide you.
Indonesian: Semoga Bubble melindungimu dan menuntunmu.

English: If you feel that you are not ready, young one, that is your decision. If you change your mind, come and speak with me again.
Indonesian: Jika kamu merasa belum siap, anak muda, itu adalah keputusanmu. Jika kamu berubah pikiran, datang dan bicaralah denganku lagi.

English: Erhm… hello there! You must be the young apprentice Maki spoke so highly of.
Indonesian: Erhm… halo! Kamu pasti apprentice muda yang sangat dibanggakan Maki.

English: The blessing of Rhisis be with you, apprentice! I'd like to go over one of the Assist skills with you. Haste is a skill that you can cast on yourself or an ally.
Indonesian: Berkat Rhisis bersamamu, apprentice! Aku ingin membahas salah satu skill Assist denganmu. Haste adalah skill yang dapat kamu gunakan pada diri sendiri atau rekanmu.

English: The Haste skill allows you to increase your attack speed and decrease your casting time, or that of a friend's, by a very large amount. It is an amazing skill!
Indonesian: Skill Haste memungkinkanmu untuk meningkatkan kecepatan serangan dan mengurangi waktu castingmu, atau waktu casting teman, dengan jumlah yang sangat besar. Ini adalah skill yang luar biasa!

English: Excuse me? I don't believe we have anything to discuss. Please leave me in peace.
Indonesian: Permisi? Aku tidak percaya kita memiliki sesuatu untuk didiskusikan. Tolong tinggalkan aku dalam damai.

English: Visit High-Dwarpet Goripeg north of Flarine. Check your map (M Key) if you get lost.
Indonesian: Kunjungi High-Dwarpet Goripeg di utara Flarine. Periksa petamu (Kunci M) jika kamu tersesat.

English: Duty of Assist
Indonesian: Duty of Assist

English: Here… take this. It's a Label of Technique. It details what I've told you today.
Indonesian: Ambil ini. Ini adalah Label of Technique. Ini menjelaskan apa yang saya katakan padamu hari ini.

English: Now, for the final leg of your journey, apprentice. A creature called Chaner has been terrorizing the locals near the Demians in Madren Town.
Indonesian: Sekarang, untuk bagian terakhir dari perjalananmu, apprentice. Makhluk bernama Chaner telah meneror penduduk setempat di dekat Demian di Kota Madren.

English: Slay him, then return to Assist Instructor Kidmen in Eastern Flarine. She will conclude your Assist training.
Indonesian: Bunuh dia, lalu kembali ke Assist Instructor Kidmen di Eastern Flarine. Dia akan mengakhiri pelatihan Assistmu

English: Good luck to you, apprentice!
Indonesian: Semoga berhasil, apprentice!

English: No? What a shame. Speak to me again if you have a change of heart.
Indonesian: Tidak? Sayang sekali. Bicaralah padaku lagi jika kamu berubah pikiran.

English: Chaner is… gone? Great work! Now, listen carefully. I have something very important to tell you.
Indonesian: Chaner pergi? Kerja bagus! Sekarang, dengarkan baik-baik. Aku memiliki sesuatu yang sangat penting untuk diberitahukan padamu.

English: The role of an Assist on the field of combat is primarily party support, however, an Assist can also prove to be a potent fighter as well.
Indonesian: Peran Assist di medan pertempuran yang utama adalah support party, namun, Assist juga bisa menjadi petarung yang kuat.

English: Congratulations, my friend! You are now an Assist! Welcome to the fold!
Indonesian: Selamat, temanku! Kamu sekarang menjadi Assist! Selamat datang di fold!

English: I'm waiting for word that Chaner has been destroyed. Last I heard he is still on the loose in Madren Town.
Indonesian: Aku menunggu kabar bahwa Chaner telah dihancurkan. Terakhir kudengar dia masih berkeliaran di Kota Madren.

English: Travel to Madren Town, east of the High-Dwarpets, and slay Chaner. Once Chaner is defeated, speak with Assist Instructor Kidmen in Eastern Flarine.
Indonesian: Pergilah ke Kota Madren, di sebelah timur High-Dwarpets, dan bunuh Chaner. Setelah Chaner dikalahkan, bicaralah dengan Assist Instructor Kidmen di Eastern Flarine.

English: Vagrant Master (Magician)
Indonesian: Vagrant Master (Magician)

English: Are you intrigued by the art of magic? If you're speaking with me, you must be interested in becoming a Magician. I must warn you, it is not an easy road.
Indonesian: Apakah kamu tertarik dengan seni magis? Jika kamu berbicara dengan saya, kamu pasti tertarik untuk menjadi seorang Magician. Aku harus memperingatkanmu, itu bukan jalan yang mudah.

English: Very well then, first, I would like you to perform a small task for me. Captain Aibatts have infested the area north of Eastern Flarine.
Indonesian: Baiklah, pertama, aku ingin kamu melakukan tugas kecil. Captain Aibatts telah menduduki daerah utara Flarine Timur.

English: If you're interested in helping, this little nuisance is just north of there. Will you slay 15 Captain Aibatts and 10 Small Burudengs to help us?
Indonesian: Jika kamu tertarik untuk membantu, gangguan kecil ini ada di utara sana. Maukah kamu membunuh 15 Captain Aibatts dan 10 Small Burudengs untuk membantu kami?

English: Thank you! Good luck!
Indonesian: Terima kasih! Semoga berhasil!

English: I see you're not ready to walk the path of the Magician. Very well, speak to me again if you change your mind.
Indonesian: Aku melihat kamu belum siap untuk menjalani perjalanan sebagai Magician. Baiklah, bicaralah padaku lagi jika kamu berubah pikiran.

English: Great job, young Vagrant! I think you'll make a fine Magician.
Indonesian: Kerja bagus, Vagrant muda! Aku pikir kamu akan menjadi Magician yang baik.

English: You must defeat 15 Captain Aibatts and 10 Small Burudengs to prove you are worthy of Magician training. I will not help you if you cannot even complete this simple task.
Indonesian: Kamu harus mengalahkan 15 Captain Aibatts dan 10 Small Burudengs untuk membuktikan bahwa kamu layak untuk pelatihan Magician. Aku tidak akan membantumu jika bahkan kamu tidak dapat menyelesaikan tugas sederhana ini.

English: I'm afraid you've already chosen a different job. We have nothing more to discuss. You can still cancel the other job quest in the Quest Window and come back to me.
Indonesian: Aku khawatir kamu telah memilih pekerjaan lain. Tidak ada lagi yang perlu kita diskusikan. Kamu masih dapat membatalkan pencarian pekerjaan lain di Quest Window dan kembali kepadaku.

English: Slay 15 Captain Aibatts and 10 Small Burudengs then return to Wingyei, the Magician Drillmaster in Flarine.
Indonesian: Bunuh 15 Captain Aibatts dan 10 Small Burudengs lalu kembali ke Wingyei, Magician Drillmaster di Flarine.

English: Weapons of the Magician
Indonesian: Weapons of the Magician

English: Nice work taking care of those Captain Aibatts for us. Now, on to your next task!
Indonesian: Kerja bagus dalam mengurus Captain Aibatts itu untuk kita. Sekarang, lanjutkan ke tugasmu berikutnya!

English: I need you to collect some materials for me and deliver them to Hee, the Magician Master. She will instruct you on the use of Magician weaponry.
Indonesian: Aku ingin kamu mengumpulkan beberapa bahan untukku dan mengirimkannya kepada Hee, Magician Maste. Dia akan menginstruksikanmu tentang penggunaan persenjataan Magician.

English: Gather 10 Twinkle Stones from Aibatts near Flarine, 5 Chupims from Pukepukes and 1 Slain from Lawolf then you may speak with Hee.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan 10 Twinkle Stones dari Aibatts dekat Flarine, 5 Chupim dari Pukepukes dan 1 Slain dari Lawolf lalu kamu bisa berbicara dengan Hee.

English: The Magician Master is located just north of Flarine.
Indonesian: Magician Master terletak tepat di utara Flarine.

English: Good luck to you, Vagrant!
Indonesian: Semoga berhasil, Vagrant!

English: I see you're not quite ready to continue down the path to becoming a Magician. Speak with me again if you change your mind.
Indonesian: Aku melihatmu belum siap untuk melanjutkan perjalanan untuk menjadi seorang Magician. Bicaralah denganku lagi jika kamu berubah pikiran.

English: Thank you for delivering the Twinkle Stones, Vagrant. Wingyei has told me a lot about you. Now, let me tell you a little something about Magician weaponry.
Indonesian: Terima kasih telah mengantarkan Twinkle Stones, Vagrant. Wingyei telah bercerita banyak tentangmu. Sekarang, izinkan aku memberi tahu kamu sedikit tentang persenjataan Magician.

English: Magicians can use both wands and staves. A wand allows the magician to attack from a distance with a charged up attack that deals additional damage while a staff can be used as a melee weapon.
Indonesian: Magician dapat menggunakan tongkat sihir dan tongkat. Tongkat sihir memungkinkan magician untuk menyerang dari jarak jauh dengan serangan yang dibebankan yang memberikan damage tambahan sementara tongkat dapat digunakan sebagai senjata jarak dekat.

English: You will find that Magicians primarily rely on magic spells to deal damage. However, it is important to know how these weapons work.
Indonesian: Kamu akan tahu bahwa Magician akan mengandalkan magic spell untuk memberikan damage. Namun, penting untuk mengetahui cara kerja senjata ini.

English: I am waiting for someone to deliver some materials I require for Magician weaponry.
Indonesian: Aku sedang menunggu seseorang untuk mengirimkan beberapa bahan yang aku butuhkan untuk persenjataan Magician.

English: Gather 10 Twinkle Stones from Aibatts near Flarine, 5 Chupims from Pukepukes and 1 Slain from Lawolf then speak with Magician Master Hee in Northern Flarine.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan 10 Twinkle Stones dari Aibatts dekat Flarine, 5 Chupim dari Pukepukes dan 1 Slain dari Lawolf lalu bicara dengan Magician Master Hee di Northern Flarine.

English: Magician Skills
Indonesian: Magician Skills

English: That concludes your lesson on Magician weaponry. Now, I'll need you to visit one of the High-Dwarpets to continue your training.
Indonesian: Itu kesimpulan pelajaranmu tentang persenjataan Magician. Sekarang, aku ingin kamu mengunjungi salah satu High-Dwarpets untuk melanjutkan pelatihanmu.

English: Travel to Flarine and head north. You'll find a High-Dwarpet camp just south of the middle of Leren Mountains.
Indonesian: Perjalanan ke Flarine dan menuju utara. Kamu akan menemukan kamp High-Dwarpet di selatan tengah Leren Mountains.

English: Speak with High-Dwarpet Hastan once you arrive. If you get lost, you can check your map (M Key) to find your way.
Indonesian: Bicara dengan High-Dwarpet Hastan setelah kamu tiba. Jika tersesat, kamu dapat memeriksa petamu (Tombol M) untuk menemukan jalan.

English: Do not be frightened by what lies ahead. This is your destiny. Speak with me again if you'd like to continue your path.
Indonesian: Jangan takut dengan apa yang ada di depan. Ini adalah takdirmu. Bicaralah denganku lagi jika ingin melanjutkan perjalananmu.

English: Greetings, young one! The will of Rhisis be with you! I am Hastan. Magician Master Hee mentioned that you might be stopping by.
Indonesian: Salam, anak muda! Kehendak Rhisis bersamamu! Aku Hastan. Magician Master Hee menyebutkan bahwa kamu mungkin akan mampir.

English: Magicians are powerful fighters that utilize magic to defeat their enemies. Let me go over one of the basic attacks with you.
Indonesian: Magician adalah petarung kuat yang memanfaatkan sihir untuk mengalahkan musuh mereka. Biarkan aku membahas salah satu serangan dasar denganmu.

English: Mental Strike is a very strong magic attack that consumes Magic Points (MP) in order to be cast. This skill allows you to attack the target from a distance for a high amount of damage.
Indonesian: Mental Strike adalah serangan sihir yang sangat kuat yang menghabiskan Magic Points (MP) untuk dilemparkan. Skill ini memungkinkanmu untuk menyerang target dari jarak jauh dengan damage yang besar.

English: Excuse me? Who are you exactly? I'm waiting for someone else right now. Take a hike!
Indonesian: Permisi? Siapa kamu sebenarnya? Aku sedang menunggu orang lain sekarang. Berjalanlah!

English: Speak with High-Dwarpet Hastan north of Flarine. Check your map (M Key) if you lose your way.
Indonesian: Bicara dengan High-Dwarpet Hastan di utara Flarine. Periksa petamu (Tombol M) jika tersesat.

English: Duty of Magician
Indonesian: Duty of Magician

English: You learn quickly, Vagrant! Perhaps you will be a great Magician one day! Here, take this. It is a Label of Technique that details what I've explained to you today.
Indonesian: Kamu belajar dengan cepat, Vagrant! Mungkin kamu akan menjadi Magician yang hebat suatu hari nanti! Ambil ini. Ini adalah Label of Technique yang menjelaskan apa yang telah aku jelaskan hari ini.

English: For your final task, I want you to travel to the west of Flaris and defeat the creature known as Seido. He has been harassing some of the residents of Flarine as of late.
Indonesian: Untuk tugas terakhirmu, aku ingin kamu melakukan perjalanan ke arah selatan Flaris dan mengalahkan makhluk yang dikenal sebagai Seido. Dia telah melecehkan beberapa penduduk Flarin akhir-akhir ini.

English: Once Seido is defeated, speak with Magician Instructor Lopaze in Eastern Flarine. She will conclude your training.
Indonesian: Setelah Seido dikalahkan, bicaralah dengan Magician Instructor Lopaze di Eastern Flarine. Dia akan mengakhiri pelatihanmu.

English: You've done very well so far, young one. Keep up the great work!
Indonesian: Kamu telah melakukannya dengan sangat baik sejauh ini, anak muda. Pertahankan!

English: You've come a long way just to give up when you're so close to the end. Speak with me again if you change your mind.
Indonesian: Kamu telah menempuh perjalanan jauh hanya untuk menyerah ketika kamu sudah sangat dekat dengan akhir. Bicaralah denganku lagi jika kamu berubah pikiran.

English: As Magicians, we are most effective when attacking at long range. Many of our skills employ the power of the elements.
Indonesian: Sebagai Magician, kami paling efektif saat menyerang jarak jauh. Banyak dari skill kami yang menggunakan kekuatan elemen.

English: This allows us to take advantage of elemental vulnerabilities that our enemies may have. Congratulations, young one! You are now a Magician!
Indonesian: Ini memungkinkan kita untuk memanfaatkan kerentanan elemen yang mungkin dimiliki musuh kita. Selamat, anak muda! Kamu sekarang adalah seorang Magician!

English: I sure wish someone would take care of that Seido creature near Flarine… Oh, hello! Did you need something?
Indonesian: Aku sangat berharap seseorang akan merawat makhluk Seido dekat Flarine itu… Oh, halo! Apakah kamu membutuhkan sesuatu?

English: Defeat Seido near the west of Flarine. Speak with Magician Instructor Lopaze once he has been defeated.
Indonesian: Kalahkan Seido di dekat barat Flarine. Bicaralah dengan Magician Instructor Lopaze setelah dia dikalahkan.

English: Find Red Bang Thieves
Indonesian: Temukan Red Bang Thieves

English: Help! Help me! My cash box... My money... It's all gone! Someone stole my cash box! Iblis watch over me!
Indonesian: Tolong! Tolong aku! Kotak uangku... Uangku... Semuanya hilang! Seseorang mencuri kotak uangku! Iblis mengintaiku!!!

English: I was saving money in my cash box in order to buy a present for my girlfriend, but it disappeared this morning.
Indonesian: Aku menyimpan uang di kotak uang untuk membeli hadiah untuk kekasihku, tetapi menghilang pagi ini.

English: So I have asked people, and they said that there are unknown thieves just west of the Fountain of Dead Person these days. I'm not sure I believe them though…
Indonesian: Jadi aku telah bertanya kepada orang-orang, dan mereka mengatakan bahwa ada pencuri tak dikenal di sebelah barat Fountain of Dead Person akhir-akhir ini. Aku tidak terlalu percaya mereka…

English: Can you investigate and let me know?
Indonesian: Bisakah kamu menyelidiki dan memberi tahuku?

English: Thank you! Please bring me the evidence which proves they really exist. If you find them, that is.
Indonesian: Terima kasih! Tolong bawakan aku bukti yang membuktikan bahwa mereka benar-benar ada. Jika kamu menemukan mereka, ya itu benar.

English: You only care about yourself. Fine, I'll find someone else.
Indonesian: Kamu hanya peduli pada diri sendiri. Baiklah, aku akan mencari orang lain.

English: So they really do exist!
Indonesian: Jadi mereka benar-benar ada!

English: I think this is good evidence, but... I want something more conclusive!
Indonesian: Aku pikir ini adalah bukti yang bagus, tapi... Aku ingin sesuatu yang lebih meyakinkan!

English: Find the thieves west of the Fountain of Dead Person in Flaris and return with evidence.
Indonesian: Temukan pencuri itu di sebelah barat Fountain of Dead Person di Flaris dan kembalilah dengan bukti.

English: Find Luda's Cash Box
Indonesian: Temukan Cash Box Luda

English: I asked the witnesses with the evidence you have brought to me, and now it is clear they had stolen my cash box. Now the only thing I have to do is get the cash box back from them.
Indonesian: Aku bertanya kepada para saksi dengan bukti yang kamu bawa kepadaku, dan sekarang jelas mereka telah mencuri kotak uangnya. Sekarang satu-satunya hal yang harus aku lakukan adalah mengambil kotak uang itu kembali dari mereka.

English: I am really sorry but please do me a favor once again? I really need to get that cash box back. I really need to get my girlfriend a present. You see…
Indonesian: Aku benar-benar minta maaf tapi tolong bantu aku sekali lagi? Aku benar-benar perlu mendapatkan kotak uang itu kembali. Aku benar-benar perlu memberi kekasihku hadiah. Kamu tahu…

English: it is our 100th day anniversary… She will be so upset if I don't. Would you please get my cash box back from them? I will reward you.
Indonesian: ini adalah hari jadi kami yang ke-100… Dia akan sangat marah jika aku tidak melakukannya. Maukah kamu mendapatkan kembali kotak uangku dari mereka? Aku akan memberimu hadiah.

English: Thank you. Thank you very much. As I heard, one of them is keeping the cash box.
Indonesian: Terima kasih. Terima kasih banyak. Seperti yang aku dengar, salah satu dari mereka menyimpan kotak uangnya.

English: You make me really disappointed. Whatever…
Indonesian: Kamu membuatku benar-benar kecewa. Terserah…

English: You found it! Thank you so much! I'll never forget this! Take this, it's the least I can do.
Indonesian: Kamu menemukannya! Terima kasih banyak! Aku tidak akan pernah melupakan ini! Ambil ini, itulah bisa saya lakukan.

English: Where is my cash box? You have not found it yet. Please bring it to me. I will be waiting.
Indonesian: Di mana kotak uangku? Kamu belum menemukannya. Tolong bawakan padaku. Aku akan menunggu.

English: Recover Luda's cash box from the Red bang Thieves at the camp west of the Fountain of Dead Person.
Indonesian: Pulihkan kotak uang Luda dari Red bang Thieves di kamp barat Fountain of Dead Person.

English: Plot of Colack
Indonesian: Plot of Colack

English: Did you know that a huge meteorite fell nearby a few days ago?
Indonesian: Tahukah kamu bahwa meteorit besar jatuh di dekat situ beberapa hari yang lalu?

English: We usually refine chunks of meteorite into a very rare metal. We call it Meteoritill.
Indonesian: Kami biasanya memperbaiki potongan meteorit menjadi logam yang sangat langka. Kami menyebutnya Meteoritill.

English: It is the best material for making expensive arms or armor in Madrigal.
Indonesian: Ini adalah bahan terbaik untuk membuat senjata atau armor yang mahal di Madrigal.

English: It usually takes about 500 years to get it because meteorites don't fall every day. However, one just fell, so now's our chance!
Indonesian: Biasanya dibutuhkan sekitar 500 tahun untuk mendapatkannya karena meteorit tidak jatuh setiap hari. Namun, satu baru saja jatuh, jadi sekaranglah kesempatan kita!

English: Think you can find me some Meteoritill? I would be very pleased to acquire some.
Indonesian: Bisakah kamu menemukan untukku beberapa Meteoritill? Aku akan sangat senang jika mendapatkannya.

English: Keep it secret, though. I don't want the other armorsmiths to find out! Try searching south of Saint City.
Indonesian: Tetap rahasiakan. Aku tidak ingin pembuat senjata lain mengetahuinya! Coba cari di selatan Saint City.

English: Pfft! Fine! I'll find someone else to help me, but you better keep your mouth shut!
Indonesian: Pfft! Baik! Aku akan menemukan orang lain untuk membantuku, tetapi kamu lebih baik tutup mulut!

English: Oh my… you found it! Real Meteoritill! I'll be rich beyond my wildest dreams! Muahahah!
Indonesian: Astaga… kau menemukannya! Real Meteoritill! Aku akan menjadi kaya melebihi impian terliarku! Muahahaha!!

English: Oh, I mean uh… I will be sure to make good use of this material. Here's a little something for your trouble.
Indonesian: Oh, maksudku uh… Aku pasti akan memanfaatkan materi ini dengan baik. Ini sedikit untuk masalahmu.

English: Thanks again, friend!
Indonesian: Terima kasih, temanku!

English: You didn't find any? That's a shame. Keep looking! Don't give up!
Indonesian: Kamu tidak menemukan apapun? Itu memalukan. Tetap mencari! Jangan menyerah!

English: Find 5 Pieces of Meteoritill and bring them to Colack in Saint City.
Indonesian: Temukan 5 Potongan Meteoritill dan bawa ke Coack di Saint City.

English: Missing Play Script
Indonesian: Missing Play Script

English: Oh boy... I am in big trouble. How long have you been standing there? Did you hear everything I was saying?
Indonesian: Astaga... Aku dalam masalah besar. Berapa lama kamu berdiri di sana? Apakah kamu mendengar semua yang aku katakan?

English: You heard? Hmm... Okay, I will tell you what happened. I am in charge of play scripts for the Pepoview Troupe.
Indonesian: Kamu dengar? Hmm.. Oke, aku akan memberitahumu apa yang terjadi. Aku bertanggung jawab atas skrip permainan untuk Pepoview Troupe.

English: The new play script called The Sky of Madrigal has disappeared. If I don't get it back, I'll be fired.
Indonesian: Naskah drama baru berjudul The Sky of Madrigal telah menghilang. Jika aku tidak mendapatkannya kembali, aku akan dipecat.

English: I know who stole it. His name is Colar, and I think he did it as payback for being fired himself.
Indonesian: Aku tahu siapa yang mencurinya. Namanya Colar, dan aku pikir dia melakukannya sebagai balasan karena dipecat akibat ulahnya sendiri.

English: Would you please do me a favor? Would you please bring me the play script from Colar?
Indonesian: Maukah kamu membantuku? Maukah kamu membawakanku naskah drama dari Colar?

English: You will?! Thank you very much! Colar is hiding somewhere in the far east of Darkon 1. Please find him!
Indonesian: Kamu mau?! Terima kasih banyak! Colar bersembunyi di suatu tempat di timur jauh Darkon 1. Tolong temukan dia!

English: I knew you weren't going to help me. Why did I even tell you all of that?
Indonesian: Aku tahu kamu tidak akan membantuku. Kenapa aku memberitahumu semua itu?

English: What?! What play script? I don't have it, I swear!
Indonesian: Apa?! naskah drama apa? Aku tidak memilikinya, aku bersumpah!

English: Well, yes. I stole it. A grave robber who was riding some kind of strange machine took it from me.
Indonesian: Baiklah. Aku mencurinya. Seorang perampok kuburan yang mengendarai semacam mesin aneh mengambilnya dariku.

English: The machine was spouting steam and the grave robber was riding and controlling it. That is why I am in this terrible situation now.
Indonesian: Mesin itu menyemburkan uap dan perampok kuburan itu mengendarai dan mengendalikannya. Itulah mengapa aku berada dalam situasi yang mengerikan ini sekarang.
