English: A few days ago, every stocking was stolen in Madrigal. I figured out that the darn Masquerpets did it. Now we are in big trouble. Darn it!
Indonesian: Beberapa hari yang lalu, setiap kaus kaki dicuri di Madrigal. Saya menemukan bahwa Masquerpet sialan melakukannya. Sekarang kita dalam masalah besar. Sialan!!!

English: You can help me create a Merry Christmas in Madrigal, right?
Indonesian: Kamu dapat membantu saya membuat Selamat Natal di Madrigal, kan?

English: Good! Go and hunt Masquerpets, and bring me 300 stockings. Yes, I will reward you. Go!
Indonesian: Bagus! Pergi dan berburu Masquerpet, dan bawakan 300 stoking untukku. Ya, saya akan memberi kamu imbalan. Pergi!!

English: Hey! Are you going to make this Christmas into a nightmare? Are you crazy?
Indonesian: Hai! Apakah kamu akan membuat Natal ini menjadi mimpi buruk? Kamu gila?

English: Ha ha ha! Good job! Thank you! But... We still do not have enough stockings...
Indonesian: Ha ha ha! Kerja yang baik! Terima kasih! Tapi.. Stoking kita masih kurang....

English: Hey... Are you stupid? Or you cannot count? I told you 300 stockings! 300!
Indonesian: Hei.. Apakah kamu bodoh? Atau kamu tidak bisa menghitung? Aku bilang 300 stoking!! 300!!

English: Go and hunt Masquerpets, and bring me 300 stockings. Yes, I will reward you. Go!
Indonesian: Pergi dan berburu Masquerpet, dan bawakan 300 stoking untukku. Ya, saya akan memberi kamu imbalan. Pergi!!

English: Desperate Christmas
Indonesian: Desperate Christmas

English: Hey... We are in big trouble now. The stockings... The stockings... Now what should I do? I have to get the stockings back!
Indonesian: Hei.. Kami dalam masalah besar sekarang. Stoking.. Stoking.. Sekarang apa yang harus saya lakukan? Aku harus mendapatkan kembali stokingnya!

English: The stockings have the wishes and dreams of all of the children. But... But...
Indonesian: Stoking memiliki keinginan dan impian semua anak. Tapi.. Tapi..

English: Every stocking was stolen a few days ago in Madrigal. I figured out that Masquerpets did it. Now we are in big trouble.
Indonesian: Setiap kaus kaki dicuri beberapa hari yang lalu di Madrigal. Saya menemukan bahwa Masquerpets melakukannya. Sekarang kita dalam masalah besar.

English: Would you please help me create a Merry Christmas in Madrigal?
Indonesian: Maukah kamu membantu saya membuat Selamat Natal di Madrigal?

English: But... This Christmas will be sorrowful without the stockings...
Indonesian: Tapi .. Natal ini akan sedih tanpa stoking ...

English: Ho ho ho! I knew you would! Thank you so much! But... We still do not have enough stockings...
Indonesian: Hohoho! Saya tahu kamu akan melakukannya! Terima kasih banyak! Tapi.. Stoking kita masih kurang...

English: I told you we need 100 stockings...
Indonesian: Sudah kubilang kita butuh 100 stoking...

English: Take Ddukguk Back
Indonesian: Ambil Ddukguk Kembali

English: Oh my God, I am in big trouble... Psst! Hey, wait! Please listen to me. The biggest holiday in Madrigal, Lunar New Year, is coming soon.
Indonesian: Ya Tuhan, aku dalam masalah besar.. Psst! Hei tunggu! Tolong dengarkan saya. Liburan terbesar di Madrigal, Tahun Baru Imlek, akan segera datang.

English: So Losha made special Ddukguk for the holiday and asked me to keep it. But the Masquerpets heard of it, and...
Indonesian: Jadi Losha membuat Ddukguk khusus untuk liburan dan meminta saya untuk menyimpannya. Tapi para Masquerpet mendengarnya, dan..

English: ...and they took all of the Ddukguks away. I could not do anything because I was really terrified... Now what should I do? Losha will kick me out if she knows this.
Indonesian: ..dan mereka mengambil semua Ddukguk pergi. Saya tidak bisa berbuat apa-apa karena saya sangat ketakutan.. Sekarang apa yang harus saya lakukan? Losha akan menendangku keluar jika dia tahu ini.

English: Would you... please help me? For Lunar New Year? Please?
Indonesian: Maukah kamu..tolong saya? Untuk Tahun Baru Imlek? Tolong?

English: Thank you! Please hunt every Masquerpet you can find in Madrigal and bring me 100 Ddukguks. I will definitely reward you!
Indonesian: Terima kasih! Silakan berburu setiap Masquerpet yang dapat kamu temukan di Madrigal dan bawakan saya 100 Ddukguks. Saya pasti akan memberimu imbalan!

English: Are you really going to kick me out? Becoming a cook is my dream. Please help me. I cannot give up now.
Indonesian: Apakah kamu benar-benar akan mengusir saya? Menjadi juru masak adalah impian saya. Tolong bantu aku. Aku tidak bisa menyerah sekarang.

English: Thank you, thank you so much! Here you are. It is my little present.
Indonesian: Terima kasih, terima kasih banyak! Ini kamu. Ini adalah hadiah kecilku.

English: Well... I told you I need 100 Ddukguk...
Indonesian: Yah.. sudah kubilang aku butuh 100 Ddukguk..

English: Please hunt every Masquerpet you can find in Madrigal and bring me 100 Ddukguks. I will definitely reward you!
Indonesian: Silakan berburu setiap Masquerpet yang dapat Anda temukan di Madrigal dan bawakan saya 100 Ddukguks. Saya pasti akan memberimu imbalan!

English: Build Love House -Nina-
Indonesian: Build Love House -Nina-

English: Hello! I am Nina, the wife of Poul, who is standing over there. Our family wants to move to here because my husband loves this place very much, but...
Indonesian: Halo! Saya Nina, istri Poul, yang berdiri di sana. Keluarga kami ingin pindah ke sini karena suami saya sangat menyukai tempat ini, tapi..

English: ...but we do not have money to buy a house. So we decided to build a house by ourselves. However...
Indonesian: ..tapi kami tidak punya uang untuk membeli rumah. Jadi kami memutuskan untuk membangun rumah sendiri. Namun..

English: However, people said that we have to hunt Masquerpets if we want to build a house. How can we do that?
Indonesian: Namun, kata orang, kita harus berburu Masquerpet jika ingin membangun rumah. Bagaimana kita bisa melakukan itu?

English: Could you please help our family?
Indonesian: Bisakah kamu membantu keluarga kami?

English: Thank you! Then please bring me drying Rootioe. You can get them from any Masquerpet as far as I know.
Indonesian: Terima kasih!! Kalau begitu tolong bawakan aku pengeringan Rootioe. Kamu bisa mendapatkannya dari Masquerpet mana pun sejauh yang saya tahu.

English: You are so cruel...
Indonesian: Kamu kejam sekali..

English: Thank you, thank you... Thank you very much!
Indonesian: Terima kasih, terima kasih.. Terima kasih banyak!!

English: We still are missing some... Please bring me more. Please.
Indonesian: Kami masih kehilangan beberapa... Tolong bawakan saya lebih banyak. Silahkan.

English: Please bring me drying Rootioe. You can get them from any Masquerpet as far as I know.
Indonesian: Tolong bawakan saya mengeringkan Rootioe. Kamu bisa mendapatkannya dari Masquerpet mana pun sejauh yang saya tahu.

English: Build Love House -ChiChi-
Indonesian: Build Love House -ChiChi-

English: Hello! I am ChiChi, the daughter of Poul, who is standing over there. Our family wants to move to here because my daddy loves this place very much, but...
Indonesian: Halo! Saya ChiChi, putri Poul, yang berdiri di sana. Keluarga kami ingin pindah ke sini karena ayahku sangat mencintai tempat ini, tapi..

English: Thank you! Then please bring me drying Rootioe. You can get it from any Masquerpet as far as I know.
Indonesian: Terima kasih!! Kalau begitu tolong bawakan aku pengeringan Rootioe. Kamu bisa mendapatkannya dari Masquerpet mana pun sejauh yang saya tahu.

English: Build Love House -PiPi-
Indonesian: Build Love House -PiPi-

English: Hello! I am PiPi, the son of Poul , who is standing over there. Our family wants to move to here because my daddy loves this place very much, but...
Indonesian: Halo! Saya PiPi, putra Poul, yang berdiri di sana. Keluarga kami ingin pindah ke sini karena ayahku sangat mencintai tempat ini, tapi..

English: New Puppy Yorrn
Indonesian: Anak Anjing Baru Yorn

English: Excuse me, can I talk to you for a moment?
Indonesian: Permisi, bisakah saya berbicara denganmu sebentar?

English: The pretty lady beside me is Losha, my elder sister. I am her younger sister, Loyah.
Indonesian: Wanita cantik di sampingku adalah Losha, kakak perempuanku. Saya adiknya, Loyah.

English: My sister has a very cute puppy, but unfortunately, he's gone missing! She originally found the puppy up in the mountains.
Indonesian: Adikku memiliki anak anjing yang sangat lucu, tapi sayangnya, dia hilang! Dia awalnya menemukan anak anjing di pegunungan.

English: When she first saw the puppy, it was cold and starving. So she brought it home and took care of it, but suddenly it disappeared one day.
Indonesian: Ketika dia pertama kali melihat anak anjing itu, dia kedinginan dan kelaparan. Jadi dia membawanya pulang dan merawatnya, tapi tiba-tiba menghilang suatu hari.

English: Since then, my sister has been looking everywhere for the puppy. She doesn't eat or drink or sleep. Would you please help my sister find her lost puppy?
Indonesian: Sejak itu, saudara perempuan saya mencari anak anjing itu ke mana-mana. Dia tidak makan atau minum atau tidur. Maukah kamu membantu saudara perempuan saya menemukan anak anjingnya yang hilang?

English: Great! She found the puppy somewhere in the middle of Leren Mountains where the Grownup Lawolfs live. Maybe the puppy is trying to find it's way home?
Indonesian: Besar! Dia menemukan anak anjing itu di suatu tempat di tengah Leren Mountains tempat para Grownup Lawolfs tinggal. Mungkin anak anjing itu mencoba mencari jalan pulang?

English: How could you refuse the request from a lady? You have no social manners! Have you no shame?!
Indonesian: Bagaimana kamu bisa menolak permintaan dari seorang wanita? Kamu tidak memiliki sopan santunl! Apa kau tidak malu?!

English: Yorrn! Where did you find him? In the mountains!? I knew it! He was probably trying to find his way home! Welcome back, Yorrn!
Indonesian: Yorrn! Di mana kamu menemukannya? Di pegunungan!? Aku tahu itu!! Dia mungkin berusaha menemukan jalan pulang! Selamat datang kembali, Yorn!

English: Have you found Yorrn? No? Well, please keep looking! I'm worried about my sister!
Indonesian: Sudahkah kamu menemukan Yorn? Tidak? Nah, silakan terus mencari! Aku khawatir tentang adikku!

English: Travel to the middle of Leren Mountains, near the Grownup Lawolfs. Find Losha's lost puppy, and return to Loyah.
Indonesian: Perjalanan ke tengah Leren Mountains, dekat Grownup Lawolfs. Temukan anak anjing Losha yang hilang, dan kembali ke Loyah.

English: Trouble-Maker in Pumpkin Village
Indonesian: Pembuat Masalah di Desa Labu

English: Hey there, I have a problem. Can you help me?
Indonesian: Hei, aku punya masalah. Bisakah kamu membantuku?

English: Actually I have 2 kids, one daughter and one son. My daughter has gone missing!
Indonesian: Sebenarnya saya punya 2 anak, satu putri dan satu putra. Putri saya telah hilang!

English: This was several years ago with some other missing children... So, my son is the only child I have left. However today... Today he disappeared too!
Indonesian: Ini beberapa tahun yang lalu dengan beberapa anak lain yang hilang... Jadi, anakku adalah satu-satunya anak yang tersisa. Namun hari ini... Hari ini dia juga menghilang!!

English: Both of my kids are now missing. I feel like I can't go on living. Please, will you help me find my son?
Indonesian: Kedua anak saya sekarang hilang. Saya merasa tidak bisa melanjutkan hidup. Tolong, maukah kamu membantu saya menemukan anak saya?

English: You're amazing! My son used to love the Pumpkin Patch. You should start your search there.
Indonesian: Kamu menakjubkan! Anak saya dulu suka Labu Patch. kamu harus memulai pencarianmu di sana.

English: If you will not help me, then I have no other choice…
Indonesian: Jika kamu tidak membantu saya, maka saya tidak punya pilihan lain ...

English: Hey, who are you? What? My mom is worried about me? What else is new…? Ugh, fine. I'll go back and let her know I'm okay.
Indonesian: Hei, siapa kamu? Apa? Ibuku mengkhawatirkanku? Apalagi yang baru…? Baik. Saya akan kembali dan memberi tahu dia bahwa saya baik-baik saja.

English: I am just watching those pumpkin heads. Aren't they cool? I wish I had one!
Indonesian: Saya hanya menonton kepala labu itu. Bukankah mereka keren? Saya berharap saya punya satu!

English: Travel to Pumpkin Town and search for Mayun, JeongHwa's son.
Indonesian: Pergi ke Kota Labu dan cari Mayun, putra JeongHwa.

English: Doridori Sushi
Indonesian: Doridori Sushi

English: Finally! The time has come to learn how to make Doridori Sushi. I just need some ingredients!
Indonesian: Akhirnya! Waktunya telah tiba untuk mempelajari cara membuat Doridori Sushi. Aku hanya butuh beberapa bahan!

English: I'll need to practice the recipe so that I can master it. Oh boy, Doridori Sushi is the best sushi in Madrigal! I can't wait!
Indonesian: Saya perlu mempraktekkan resepnya agar saya bisa menguasainya. Astaga, Doridori Sushi adalah sushi terbaik di Madrigal! Saya tidak sabar!

English: Tell you what, if you help me, I will give you some of this fantastic sushi. How's that sound?
Indonesian: Katakan apa, jika kamu membantu saya, saya akan memberimu beberapa sushi yang fantastis ini. Bagaimana suara itu?

English: I knew you wouldn't be able to resist! Now, bring me the following materials: 12 Doridoma Keratins and 5 Mushpang Secretion. You can get them from Small Doridomas and Captain Mushpangs.
Indonesian: Aku tahu kamu tidak akan bisa menolak! Sekarang, bawakan saya bahan-bahan berikut: 12 Doridoma Keratins dan 5 Mushpang Secretion. Kamu bisa mendapatkannya dari Small Doridomas dan Captain Mushpang.

English: You have no idea how delicious my sushi is. Oh well. Your loss!
Indonesian: Kamu tidak tahu betapa lezatnya sushi saya. Baiklah. Kerugianmu!

English: Ah ha! There we go! Your order is ready! I even autographed it in wasabi! Careful, it's SPICY!
Indonesian: Ah! Ini dia! Pesananmu sudah siap! Saya bahkan menandatanganinya di wasabi! Hati-hati, ini PEDAS!

English: I know they can be hard to find, but I'd really like to learn to make it sometime this year. Hurry up, pal!
Indonesian: Saya tahu mereka mungkin sulit ditemukan, tetapi saya benar-benar ingin belajar membuatnya tahun ini. Cepat, sobat!

English: Collect 12 Doridoma Keratins and 5 Mushpang Secretion from Small Doridomas and Captain Mushpangs. Return to Sotta when you have the ingredients.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan 12 Doridoma Keratins dan 5 Mushpang Secretion dari Small Doridomas dan Captain Mushpangs. Kembali ke Sotta ketika kamu memiliki bahan-bahannya.

English: Successor of Hero -Master-
Indonesian: Successor of Hero -Master-

English: So you think you're ready to become a Knight? It isn't easy, but since you've made it this far I think you're up to the challenge.
Indonesian: Jadi kamu pikir kamu siap untuk menjadi seorang Ksatria? Ini tidak mudah, tetapi karena kamu telah berhasil sejauh ini, saya pikir kamu siap menghadapi tantangan.

English: First, a simple test of your skills in combat to see if you are qualified.
Indonesian: Pertama, tes sederhana keterampilanmu dalam pertempuran untuk melihat apakah kamu memenuhi syarat.

English: Go to KhipRa and hunt down $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. Not the Small ones, or the Giants, just regular $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. That should be easy enough.
Indonesian: Pergi ke KhipRa dan buru $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. Bukan yang Kecil, atau Raksasa, hanya $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ yang biasa. Itu seharusnya cukup mudah.

English: Good luck, my friend. I'll be watching.
Indonesian: Semoga berhasil, temanku. Aku akan melihat.

English: Giving up already? But this is the easy part.
Indonesian: Sudah menyerah? Tapi ini adalah bagian yang mudah.

English: Excellent work, Mercenary! Now you're on your way to becoming a Knight.
Indonesian: Kerja bagus, Mercenary! Sekarang kamu sedang dalam perjalanan untuk menjadi seorang Ksatria.

English: To commemorate this day, I have something for you.
Indonesian: Untuk memperingati hari ini, aku punya sesuatu untukmu.

English: Exactly 20 Drillers, Squire. That's what you'll need to take your first steps to Knighthood.
Indonesian: Tepatnya 20 Pengebor, Squire. Itulah yang kamu perlukan untuk mengambil langkah pertama menuju Knighthood.

English: Corel is your master, young Mercenary. I can not help you.
Indonesian: Corel adalah tuanmu, Mercenary muda. Saya tidak dapat membantumu.

English: Hunt Down 20 regular Drillers and return to Karandur in Darken City.
Indonesian: Kalahkan 20 Pengebor reguler dan kembali ke Karandur di Darken City.

English: Successor of Hero -Helmet-
Indonesian: Successor of Hero -Helmet-

English: This letter of recommendation is proof of your achievements thus far. Guard it as you would your own life.
Indonesian: Surat rekomendasi ini adalah bukti pencapaianmu selama ini. Jaga itu seperti kamu menjaga hidupmu sendiri.

English: Take it to Hormes, the Knight Sage. He resides at the The Fountain of Dead Person in the Northern Leren Mountains.
Indonesian: Bawa ke Hormes, Knight Sage. Dia tinggal di The Fountain of Dead Person di Northern Leren Mountains.

English: Before you go, though, I want you to find Kindler, a grave-robber. He's hiding out near the Clockworks' Cage, South of Darken City.
Indonesian: Namun, sebelum kamu pergi, saya ingin kamu menemukan Kindler, perampok kuburan. Dia bersembunyi di dekat Clockworks' Cage, South of Darken City.

English: I believe he has information on the Golden Helmet of Billaon. Retrieve it by any means, and take it to Hormes along with your letter.
Indonesian: Saya percaya dia memiliki informasi tentang Helm Emas Billaon. Ambil dengan cara apapun, dan bawa ke Hormes bersama dengan suratmu.

English: May the courage of Billaon be with you always.
Indonesian: Semoga keberanian Billaon selalu bersamamu.

English: You've already come so far, why give up now?
Indonesian: Kamu sudah sampai sejauh ini, mengapa menyerah sekarang?

English: My word! This… this is the Golden Helmet of Billaon! We thought it had been lost forever!
Indonesian: Ucapanku! Ini ... ini adalah Helm Emas Billaon! Kami pikir itu telah hilang selamanya!

English: No one had seen it since that grave-robbing scoundrel Kindler stole it and hid it away. Thank you, you're truly remarkable!
Indonesian: Tidak ada yang melihatnya sejak bajingan Kindler perampok kuburan itu mencurinya dan menyembunyikannya. Terima kasih, Kamu benar-benar luar biasa!

English: You have a question? Out with it, quickly. I have no time to waste with idle chatter.
Indonesian: Kamu punya pertanyaan? Keluar dengan itu, cepat. Saya tidak punya waktu untuk disia-siakan dengan obrolan kosong.

English: Find Kindler and use whatever information he has to locate the Golden Helmet. Then take it, and your letter, to Hormes, the Knight Sage at the The Fountain of Dead Person in Flaris.
Indonesian: Temukan Kindler dan gunakan informasi apa pun yang dia miliki untuk menemukan Helm Emas. Kemudian ambil, dan suratmu, untuk Hormes, Knight Sage di The Fountain of Dead Person di Flaris.

English: Successor of Hero -Scroll-
Indonesian: Successor of Hero -Scroll-

English: I deeply appreciate what you've already done, but alas, the Helmet's journey does not end here.
Indonesian: Saya sangat menghargai apa yang telah kamu lakukan, tetapi sayangnya, perjalanan Helm tidak berakhir di sini.

English: It belongs with the Hersan Kurmin, in the Plain of Bubble.
Indonesian: Itu milik Hersan Kurmin, di Plain of Bubble.

English: The Kurmin Family has managed the house and relics of Billaon for generations. I'm sure they would reward you handsomely for its return.
Indonesian: Keluarga Kurmin telah mengelola rumah dan peninggalan Billaon secara turun-temurun. Saya yakin mereka akan memberimu imbalan yang mahal untuk pengembaliannya.

English: Time is a-wasting, Mercenary! Hurry along, now!
Indonesian: Waktu adalah buang-buang waktu, Mercenary! Cepatlah, sekarang!

English: No time to be showered with the appreciation and riches of a wealthy family? Very well, then...
Indonesian: Tidak ada waktu untuk dihujani penghargaan dan kekayaan keluarga kaya? Baiklah kalau begitu...

English: Oh my… I can't believe it.... I've been looking for this for years. Thank you, thank you very much!
Indonesian: Astaga... Aku tidak percaya.... Aku sudah mencari ini selama bertahun-tahun. Terima kasih terima kasih banyak!

English: I'd like to give you something for bringing this back to the Kurmin family.
Indonesian: Saya ingin memberimu sesuatu untuk membawa ini kembali ke keluarga Kurmin.

English: This Scroll has only been passed down to the Knights in my family line, until now. I'd like you to have it.
Indonesian: Gulir ini hanya diturunkan ke Ksatria di garis keluarga saya, sampai sekarang. Saya ingin kamu memilikinya.

English: What nice weather! Oh, I'm sorry, did you need to speak with me?
Indonesian: Cuaca yang bagus! Oh, maaf, apakah kamu perlu berbicara dengan saya?

English: Go to the Plain of Bubble to meet Kurmin and give her the Golden Helmet.
Indonesian: Pergi ke Plain of Bubble untuk bertemu Kurmin dan berikan dia Helm Emas.

English: Successor of Hero -Altar-
Indonesian: Successor of Hero -Altar-

English: To show my gratitude, I’ll help you further along your way towards becoming a Knight.
Indonesian: Untuk menunjukkan rasa terima kasih saya, saya akan membantumu lebih jauh di sepanjang jalan menuju menjadi seorang Ksatria.

English: You’ll need to visit the Altar of Knight at Magmient in Darkon 3.
Indonesian: kamu perlu mengunjungi Altar of Knight di Magmient di Darkon 3.

English: Lobiet, the Knight Priest, will recognize the scroll I’ve given you…
Indonesian: Lobiet, Knight Priest, akan mengenali gulungan yang kuberikan padamu…

English: Retrieve the 8 Soulstones from regular Wheelems and take them to Lobiet.
Indonesian: Ambil 8 Soulstones dari Wheelem biasa dan bawa ke Lobiet.

English: Good luck, Mercenary.
Indonesian: Semoga berhasil, Mercenary.

English: I know it’s a challenge, but I assure you, the reward is worth it.
Indonesian: Saya tahu ini sebuah tantangan, tetapi saya jamin, hadiahnya sepadan.

English: I haven’t a clue why those Wheelems took the stones, but nevertheless, thank Billaon you’ve returned them.
Indonesian: Saya tidak tahu mengapa Wheelems itu mengambil batu-batu itu, tetapi bagaimanapun, terima kasih kepada Billaon kamu telah mengembalikannya.

English: The Souls of the Heroes can rest, thanks to you.
Indonesian: Jiwa Pahlawan bisa beristirahat, terima kasih.

English: What brings you to this holy Altar for the souls of Heroes?
Indonesian: Apa yang membawamu ke Altar suci ini untuk jiwa Pahlawan?

English: Hunt down 8 regular Wheelems (not Bouncing or Rough) and retrieve 8 Soulstones from them.
Indonesian: Memburu 8 Wheelems biasa (bukan Bouncing atau Rough) dan mengambil 8 Soulstones dari mereka.

English: Successor of Hero -Guardian-
Indonesian: Successor of Hero -Guardian-

English: This is the Mark of Heroes. It is a special sigil from the Guardian of the Knight’s Altar that denotes the wearer as a successor of Knight Hero.
Indonesian: Ini adalah Tanda Pahlawan. Ini adalah sigil khusus dari Guardian of the Knight's Altar yang menunjukkan pemakainya sebagai penerus Knight Hero.

English: You only need one more item to finally become a Knight. You will find it in Guardiane.
Indonesian: Kamu hanya membutuhkan satu item lagi untuk akhirnya menjadi seorang Knight. Kamu akan menemukannya di Guardiane.

English: In Guardiane, in the Guardian's Room, you will find a spirit called the Venel Guardian.
Indonesian: Di Guardiane, di Guardian's Room, Kamu akan menemukan roh yang disebut Venel Guardian.

English: Defeat this spirit, and take his heart. This will be your final test.
Indonesian: Kalahkan roh ini, dan ambil hatinya. Ini akan menjadi ujian terakhirmu.

English: Once you have completed this task, present the heart to Boneper, the Knight Guardian.
Indonesian: Setelah kamu menyelesaikan tugas ini, berikan hati kepada Boneper, Penjaga Ksatria.

English: I wish you luck, Mercenary!
Indonesian: Saya berharap kamu beruntung, Mercenary!

English: You’re almost finished, Mercenary. Don’t give up now.
Indonesian: Kamu hampir selesai, Mercenary. Jangan menyerah sekarang.

English: Well done! I now officially bestow the title of Knight upon you.
Indonesian: Bagus sekali! Saya sekarang secara resmi memberikan gelar Ksatria kepadamu.

English: Billaon, please bless and encourage this Knight as they follow your will!
Indonesian: Billaon, tolong berkati dan dorong Ksatria ini saat mereka mengikuti keinginanmu!

English: Only one recognized as a Knight may pass. Please turn back.
Indonesian: Hanya satu yang diakui sebagai Ksatria yang boleh lulus. Silakan kembali.

English: Defeat the Venel Guardian, take his heart, and present it to Boneper the Knight Guardian.
Indonesian: Kalahkan Venel Guardian, ambil hatinya, dan berikan kepada Boneper the Knight Guardian.

English: So you think you're ready to become a Blade? It isn't easy, but since you've made it this far I think you're up to the challenge.
Indonesian: Jadi kamu pikir kamu siap untuk menjadi Blade? Ini tidak mudah, tetapi karena kamu telah berhasil sejauh ini, saya pikir kamu siap menghadapi tantangan.

English: Good luck, warrior. I'll be watching.
Indonesian: Semoga beruntung, pejuang. Aku akan melihatmu.

English: Quitting already? But this is the easy part.
Indonesian: Sudah berhenti? Tapi ini adalah bagian yang mudah.

English: Hmm... Good job, I knew you could do this! Now you are qualified as a successor.
Indonesian: Hmm... Kerja bagus, aku tahu kamu bisa melakukan ini! Sekarang kamu memenuhi syarat sebagai penerus.

English: Congratulations! You passed the first test.
Indonesian: Selamat! Anda lulus ujian pertama.

English: Exactly 20 Drillers, Mercenary. That's what you'll need to take your first steps to becoming a Blade.
Indonesian: Tepatnya 20 Pengebor, Mercenary. Itulah yang kamu perlukan untuk mengambil langkah pertama kamu untuk menjadi Blade.

English: Karandur is your master, young Mercenary. I can not help you.
Indonesian: Karandur adalah tuanmu, Mercenary muda. Saya tidak dapat membantumu.

English: Hunt Down 20 Drillers and return to Corel in Darken City.
Indonesian: Buru 20 Pengebor dan kembali ke Corel di Darken City.

English: Successor of Hero -Earring-
Indonesian: Successor of Hero -Earring-

English: This letter of recommendation is proof of your achievements as a Blade-in-Training. Guard it as you would your own life.
Indonesian: Surat rekomendasi ini adalah bukti pencapaianmu sebagai Blade-in-Training. Jaga itu seperti kamu menjaga hidupmu sendiri.

English: Take it to Guabill, the Blade Sage. He resides at the Fountain of Dead Person in the North Leren Mountains.
Indonesian: Bawa ke Guabill, Blade Sage. Dia tinggal di the Fountain of Dead Person di North Leren Mountains.

English: Before you do that, however, locate the Earring of Heren. It’s hidden somewhere in Heret, in Darkon 3.
Indonesian: Namun, sebelum kamu melakukannya, temukan Earring of Heren. Itu tersembunyi di suatu tempat di Heret, di Darkon 3.

English: May the mercy of Heren be with you always.
Indonesian: Semoga rahmat Heren selalu bersamamu.

English: Dear me! This… this is Earring of Heren! We thought it had been lost forever!
Indonesian: Untuk aku! Ini ... ini adalah Anting Heren! Kami pikir itu telah hilang selamanya!

English: It had gone missing in Heret somewhere, and no one could find it. Thank you, you're truly remarkable!
Indonesian: Itu hilang di Heret di suatu tempat, dan tidak ada yang bisa menemukannya. Terima kasih,kamu benar-benar luar biasa!

English: Your efforts this day will be forever appreciated.
Indonesian: Usahamu hari ini akan selamanya dihargai.

English: The souls of many people travel to the Fountain of Dead Person. It is the crossroads between life and death.
Indonesian: Jiwa banyak orang melakukan perjalanan ke Fountain of Dead Person. Ini adalah persimpangan antara hidup dan mati.

English: Find the Earring of Heren, hidden somewhere in Heret. Then take it and your letter to Guabrill, the Blade Sage at the Fountain of Dead Person in Flaris.
Indonesian: Temukan Anting Heren, tersembunyi di suatu tempat di Heret. Kemudian bawa dan surat kamu ke Guabrill, Blade Sage di Fountain of Dead Person di Flaris.

English: Now to get the Earring back into the right hands, the Manager of the House of Heren.
Indonesian: Sekarang untuk mengembalikan Anting ke tangan yang tepat, Manajer House of Heren.

English: Please deliver it to Ata at the Observatory in Flaris.
Indonesian: Tolong kirimkan ke Ata di Observatory di Flaris.

English: His family has managed the House of Heren for generations, and they’ve been seeking this earring for just as long. Possessing it again will give them great relief.
Indonesian: Keluarganya telah mengelola House of Heren selama beberapa generasi, dan mereka telah lama mencari anting-anting ini. Memilikinya lagi akan memberi mereka kelegaan besar.

English: Oh, I can just imagine how happy this is going to make them. Hurry along!
Indonesian: Oh, aku bisa membayangkan betapa bahagianya ini akan membuat mereka. Cepatlah!

English: Delivering this earring will not only help Ata’s family, but I’m sure they’d be willing to help you in your quest. Please, reconsider.
Indonesian: Memberikan anting-anting ini tidak hanya akan membantu keluarga Ata, tetapi saya yakin mereka akan bersedia membantu kamu dalam pencarianmu. Tolong, pertimbangkan kembali.

English: It this…? Oh, it is! I can finally go home now! Thank you, thank you!
Indonesian: Ini…? Oh, itu! Akhirnya aku bisa pulang sekarang! Terima kasih terima kasih!

English: You don’t know how much this means to my family! We’ve been searching for the Earring for so long and now...forgive me for rambling, I’m just so excited!
Indonesian: Kamu tidak tahu betapa berartinya ini bagi keluarga saya! Kami telah mencari Anting begitu lama dan sekarang ... maafkan saya karena bertele-tele, saya sangat bersemangat!

English: This Scroll belonged to the Blades in my family line. Since you’re trying to become one, I want you to have it.
Indonesian: Gulungan kertas ini milik Blades di garis keluarga saya. Karena kamu mencoba menjadi satu, saya ingin kamu memilikinya.

English: Full Moon out tonight. Strange things usually happen when that occurs…
Indonesian: Bulan Purnama keluar malam ini. Hal-hal aneh biasanya terjadi ketika itu terjadi ...

English: Deliver the Earring of Heren to Ata at the Observatory in Flaris.
Indonesian: Kirimkan Anting Heren ke Ata di Observatorium di Flaris.

English: You’ll want to take it to the Blade Priest, Jeperdy. She manages the Altar of Blades in Brekin, Darkon 3.
Indonesian: Kamu pasti ingin membawanya ke Blade Priest, Jeperdy. Dia mengelola Altar of Blades di Brekin, Darkon 3.

English: Oh, since you're heading that way, could you retrieve a jewel for her called the Tear of Darkness? A Scorpicon in the Plateau of Silence has it, and we believe it could threaten the Souls of Heroes the Altars protect.
Indonesian: Oh, karena kamu menuju ke sana, bisakah kamu mengambilkan permata untuknya yang disebut Tear of Darkness? Kalajengking di Dataran Tinggi Keheningan memilikinya, dan kami yakin itu bisa mengancam Jiwa Pahlawan yang dilindungi Altar.

English: Please take it to Priest Jeperdy, and perhaps we can investigate it further.
Indonesian: Tolong bawa ke Priest Jeperdy, dan mungkin kita bisa menyelidikinya lebih lanjut.

English: Something this potentially dangerous could bring harm to the Altar of Blade. Please, you must help us retrieve it.
Indonesian: Sesuatu yang berpotensi berbahaya ini dapat membahayakan Altar of Blade. Tolong, kamu harus membantu kami mengambilnya.

English: Hmm, just as I thought. Even Soulstones react to it. This requires much more investigation.
Indonesian: Hmm, seperti yang saya pikirkan. Bahkan Soulstones bereaksi terhadapnya. Ini membutuhkan lebih banyak penyelidikan.

English: Worry not, young Mercenary. Bringing me the jewel was enough on your part. I’ll do the rest.
Indonesian: Jangan khawatir, Mercenary muda. Membawakanku permata itu sudah cukup darimu. Saya akan melakukan sisanya.

English: What brings you to this holy Altar for the Souls of Heroes?
Indonesian: Apa yang membawamu ke Altar suci untuk Jiwa Pahlawan ini?

English: Take the Tear of Darkness from Scorpicon in Plateau of Silence, Saint Morning, and bring it to Priest Jeperdy in Brekin, Darkon 3.
Indonesian: Ambil Tear of Darkness dari Scorpion di Plateau of Silence, Saint Morning, dan bawa ke Priest Jeopardy di Breckin, Darkon 3.

English: Here, take this Mark of the Heroes. It along with one last item will denote your status as a true Blade.
Indonesian: Ini, ambil Tanda Pahlawan ini. Itu bersama dengan satu item terakhir akan menunjukkan statusmu sebagai Blade sejati.

English: In the Guardian's Room, you will find a spirit called the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$.
Indonesian: Di Ruang Penjaga, Kamu akan menemukan roh yang disebut $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$.

English: Once you have completed this task, present the heart to Sencyrit, the Blade Guardian.
Indonesian: Setelah kamu menyelesaikan tugas ini, berikan hati kepada Sencyrit, Blade Guardian.

English: I wish you luck.
Indonesian: Saya berharap Anda beruntung.

English: Well done! I now officially bestow the title of Blade upon you.
Indonesian: Bagus sekali! Saya sekarang secara resmi memberikan gelar Blade kepadamu.

English: Heren, please bless and encourage this Blade as they follow your will!
Indonesian: Di sini, tolong berkati dan dorong Blade ini karena mereka mengikuti kehendakmu!

English: Only one recognized as a Blade may pass. Please turn back.
Indonesian: Hanya satu yang dikenali sebagai Blade yang boleh lewat. Silakan kembali.

English: Defeat the Venel Guardian, take his heart, and present it to Sencyrit the Blade Guardian in Guardiane.
Indonesian: Kalahkan Venel Guardian, ambil hatinya, dan berikan kepada Sencyrit the Blade Guardian di Guardiane.

English: So you think you're ready to become a Billposter? It isn't easy, but since you've made it this far I think you're up to the challenge.
Indonesian: Jadi kamu pikir kamu siap untuk menjadi seorang Billposter? Ini tidak mudah, tetapi karena kamu telah berhasil sejauh ini, saya pikir kamu siap menghadapi tantangan.

English: Good luck. I'll be watching.
Indonesian: Semoga beruntung. Aku akan melihat.

English: Excellent work! Now you're on your way to becoming a Billposter.
Indonesian: Kerja bagus! Sekarang kamu sedang dalam perjalanan untuk menjadi seorang Billposter.

English: Exactly 20 Drillers. That's what you'll need to take your first steps to becoming a Billposter.
Indonesian: Tepatnya 20 Pengebor. Itulah yang kamu perlukan untuk mengambil langkah pertama kamu untuk menjadi seorang Billposter.

English: Ellend is your master, young Assist. I can not help you.
Indonesian: Ellend adalah tuanmu, Asisten muda. Saya tidak dapat membantumu.

English: Hunt Down 20 Drillers and return to Ride in Darken City.
Indonesian: Buru 20 Pengebor dan kembali ke Ride in Darken City.

English: Successor of Hero -Hall Document-
Indonesian: Successor of Hero -Hall Document-

English: This letter of recommendation is proof of your achievements as a Billposter. Guard it as you would your own life.
Indonesian: Surat rekomendasi ini merupakan bukti pencapaianmu sebagai seorang Billposter. Jaga itu seperti kamu menjaga hidupmu sendiri.

English: Take it to Domek, the Billposter Sage. He resides at Fountain of Dead Person in the Northern Leren Mountains.
Indonesian: Bawa ke Domek, Sage Billposter. Dia tinggal di Fountain of Dead Person di Pegunungan Leren Utara.

English: Before you do that, however, retrieve the Hall Document from Hoiren. He's hiding somewhere in the Garden of Rhisis.
Indonesian: Namun, sebelum kamu melakukannya, ambil Dokumen Hall dari Hoiren. Dia bersembunyi di suatu tempat di Taman Rhisis.

English: Luck be with you.
Indonesian: Keberuntungan bersamamu.

English: Your skill must be extraordinary if you were able to take this document from Hoiren, good work!
Indonesian: Keahlianmu pasti luar biasa jika bisa mengambil dokumen ini dari Hoiren, kerja bagus!

English: The Billposter Hero Roentel originally owned this document, but his pupil Hoiren stole it when he died.
Indonesian: Pahlawan Billposter Roentel awalnya memiliki dokumen ini, tetapi muridnya Hoiren mencurinya ketika dia meninggal.

English: Hoiren hid it away, and no one could find it until now. We deeply appreciate your efforts to return it.
Indonesian: Hoiren menyembunyikannya, dan tidak ada yang bisa menemukannya sampai sekarang. Kami sangat menghargai upaya kamu untuk mengembalikannya.

English: Such a peaceful place...if only these other Sages would stop with their chattering I could get some writing done...
Indonesian: Tempat yang begitu damai ... jika saja orang bijak lain ini berhenti dengan obrolan mereka, saya bisa menyelesaikan beberapa tulisan ..

English: Retrieve the Hall Document from Hoiren, who is hiding somewhere in the Garden of Rhisis. Then deliver it and your letter to Domek the Billposter Sage. You can find him at the Fountain of Dead Person.
Indonesian: Ambil Dokumen Aula dari Hoiren, yang bersembunyi di suatu tempat di Taman Rhisis. Kemudian kirimkan dan suratmu ke Domek the Billposter Sage. Kamu dapat menemukannya di Fountain of Dead Person.

English: The rightful caretaker of the Hall Document is Segho of the Pesin family. They have been managing Roentel’s Hall of the Martial Arts for generations.
Indonesian: Pengurus yang sah dari Dokumen Hall adalah Segho dari keluarga Pesin. Mereka telah mengelola Aula Seni Bela Diri Roentel selama beberapa generasi.

English: He is out of the Hall right now, doing some adventuring of his own in Flaris.
Indonesian: Dia keluar dari Aula sekarang, melakukan petualangannya sendiri di Flaris.

English: He’s an accomplished mountaineer, so you may be able to find him in the Leren Mountains. Present him with the Hall Document when you find him.
Indonesian: Dia pendaki gunung yang ulung, jadi kamu mungkin bisa menemukannya di Pegunungan Leren. Hadir dia dengan Dokumen Hall ketika kamu menemukannya.

English: Very well, then. Perhaps someone truly worthy of becoming a Billposter will come along to deliver this for me...
Indonesian: Baiklah kalau begitu. Mungkin seseorang yang benar-benar layak menjadi Billposter akan datang untuk menyampaikan ini untukku...

English: Surprised to run into somebody else this high up. I’m looking for Roentel’s Hall Document, you wouldn’t happen to have heard about it… well, what d’ya know...
Indonesian: Terkejut bertemu orang lain setinggi ini. Saya mencari Dokumen Aula Roentel, kamu tidak akan pernah mendengarnya ... yah, apa yang kamu tahu ...

English: Thanks for bringing this back to us, now I can finally get back to the Hall. Say, I knew I had a good reason to bring this along. Let’s see... *rummaging*
Indonesian: Terima kasih telah membawa ini kembali kepada kami, sekarang saya akhirnya bisa kembali ke Aula. Katakanlah, saya tahu saya punya alasan bagus untuk membawa ini. Mari kita lihat... *rummaging*

English: There you go. Every Billposter in my family line possessed this Scroll. Now it’s yours.
Indonesian: Ini dia. Setiap Billposter di garis keluarga saya memiliki Scroll ini. Sekarang milikmu.

English: Ahh, Leren Mountains. The root of Flaris itself, perfect for surveying every spot on the map.
Indonesian: Ahh, Pegunungan Leren. Akar Flaris itu sendiri, sempurna untuk mensurvei setiap tempat di peta.

English: Deliver the Hall Document to Segho in the Leren Mountains.
Indonesian: Kirimkan Dokumen Hall ke Segho di Pegunungan Leren.

English: Head on over to Fera, the Billposter Priest. She manages their Altar in Arians, Darkon 3.
Indonesian: Pergilah ke Fera, Pendeta Billposter. Dia mengelola Altar mereka di Arians, Darkon 3.

English: She’s been looking for the Poster of Skill which contains Shadow Avatar, Roentel’s most devastating technique.
Indonesian: Dia sedang mencari Poster of Skill yang berisi Shadow Avatar, teknik paling menghancurkan Roentel.

English: Rumor has it that grave-robbers controlling the Steam Walkers have gotten a hold of it. Take it back from them, and get it into Fera’s hands.
Indonesian: Rumor mengatakan bahwa perampok kuburan yang mengendalikan Steamwalker telah menguasainya. Ambil kembali dari mereka, dan serahkan ke tangan Fera.

English: Good luck, friend!
Indonesian: Semoga beruntung, teman!

English: Someone with evil intentions using Shadow Avatar could lead to catastrophe. Please, reconsider!
Indonesian: Seseorang dengan niat jahat menggunakan Shadow Avatar dapat menyebabkan malapetaka. Tolong, pertimbangkan kembali!

English: Well done! People say that only Roentel can use this, but with Billposters like you around, who knows?
Indonesian: Bagus sekali! Orang bilang hanya Roentel yang bisa menggunakan ini, tapi dengan billposter sepertimu, siapa tahu?

English: Until then though, I’ll do my best to protect it.
Indonesian: Sampai saat itu, saya akan melakukan yang terbaik untuk melindunginya.

English: Retrieve the Poster of Skill from the Steam Walkers, then bring it to Fera in Arians, Darkon 3.
Indonesian: Ambil Poster of Skill dari Steamwalker, lalu bawa ke Fera di Arians, Darkon 3.

English: Here, take this Mark of the Heroes. It along with one last item will denote your status as a true Billposter.
Indonesian: Di sini, ambil Tanda Pahlawan ini. Ini bersama dengan satu item terakhir akan menunjukkan statusmu sebagai Billposter sejati.

English: Once you have completed this task, present the heart to Capafe, the Billposter Guardian.
Indonesian: Setelah kamu menyelesaikan tugas ini, tunjukkan hati kepada Capafe, Penjaga Billposter.

English: You’re almost finished, Assist. Don’t give up now.
Indonesian: Kamu hampir selesai,Asisten. Jangan menyerah sekarang.

English: Well done! I now officially bestow the title of Billposter upon you.
Indonesian: Bagus sekali! Saya sekarang secara resmi menganugerahkan gelar Billposter kepadamu.

English: Roentel, please bless and encourage this Billposter as they follow your will!
Indonesian: Roentel, mohon berkati dan dorong Poster Poster ini karena mereka mengikuti kehendakmu!

English: Only one recognized as a Billposter may pass. Please turn back.
Indonesian: Hanya satu yang diakui sebagai Billposter yang boleh lewat. Silakan kembali.

English: Defeat the guardian spirit, Venel Guardian, and get it's heart. Then please visit Capafe who is the Billposter Guardian.
Indonesian: Kalahkan roh penjaga, Venel Guardian, dan dapatkan jantungnya. Kemudian silahkan kunjungi Capafe yang merupakan Billposter Guardian.

English: So you think you're ready to become a Ringmaster? It isn't easy, but since you've made it this far I think you're up to the challenge.
Indonesian: Jadi kamu pikir kamu siap untuk menjadi Ringmaster? Ini tidak mudah, tetapi karena kamu telah berhasil sejauh ini, saya pikir kamu siap menghadapi tantangan.

English: I will be watching you.
Indonesian: Aku akan mengawasimu.

English: Excellent work! Now you're on your way to becoming a Ringmaster.
Indonesian: Kerja bagus! Sekarang kamu sedang dalam perjalanan untuk menjadi seorang Ringmaster.

English: Exactly 20 Drillers. That's what you'll need to take your first steps to becoming a Ringmaster.
Indonesian: Tepatnya 20 Pengebor. Itulah yang kamu perlukan untuk mengambil langkah pertama untuk menjadi Ringmaster.

English: Ride is your master, young Assist. I can not help you.
Indonesian: Ride adalah tuanmu, Assist muda. Saya tidak dapat membantumu.

English: Hunt Down 20 Drillers and return to Ellend in Darken City.
Indonesian: Buru 20 Pengebor dan kembali ke Ellend di Darken City.

English: Successor of Hero -Seal-
Indonesian: Successor of Hero -Seal-

English: This letter of recommendation is proof of your achievements as a Ringmaster. Guard it as you would your own life.
Indonesian: Surat rekomendasi ini adalah bukti pencapaianmu sebagai Ringmaster. Jaga itu seperti kamu menjaga hidupmu sendiri.

English: Take it to Clamb, the Ringmaster Sage. He resides at the The Fountain of Dead Person in the Northern Leren Mountains.
Indonesian: Bawa ke Clam, Sage Ringmaster. Dia tinggal di The Fountain of Dead Person di Pegunungan Leren Utara.

English: Before you do that, however, retrieve the Seal of Aenn from Roy near the Plateau of Silence in Saint Morning.
Indonesian: Namun, sebelum Anda melakukannya, ambil Seal of Aenn dari Roy di dekat Plateau of Silence di Saint Morning.

English: May Aenn’s mercy be with you always.
Indonesian: Semoga rahmat Aenn selalu bersamamu.

English: The Seal of Aenn! Someone’s finally found the Aenn family symbol!
Indonesian: Segel Aenn! Seseorang akhirnya menemukan simbol keluarga Aenn!

English: I’d always heard that Roy would steal anything of value, but I never thought he’d have a mind to take the Seal!
Indonesian: Saya selalu mendengar bahwa Roy akan mencuri sesuatu yang berharga, tetapi saya tidak pernah berpikir dia akan memiliki pikiran untuk mengambil segel!

English: Your efforts are most appreciated!
Indonesian: Usahamu sangat dihargai!

English: You're a long way from a doctor’s office… but I am still a healer of the sick and injured.
Indonesian: Kamu jauh dari kantor dokter ... tapi saya masih penyembuh yang sakit dan terluka

English: Retrieve the Seal of Aenn from Roy near the Plateau of Silence in Saint Morning, then take it to Clamb, the Ringmaster Sage. You can find him at the Fountain of Dead Person.
Indonesian: Ambil Seal of Aenn dari Roy di dekat Plateau of Silence di Saint Morning, lalu bawa ke Clamb, the Ringmaster Sage. Kamu dapat menemukannya di Fountain of Dead Person.

English: Now, deliver the Seal to Teshar, the leader of Kyon Soldiers.
Indonesian: Sekarang, serahkan Segel ke Teshar, pemimpin Prajurit Kyon.

English: Teshar and her Mercenaries can be found in Eastern Flarine.
Indonesian: Teshar dan Mercenary-nya dapat ditemukan di Flarine Timur.

English: Make haste!
Indonesian: Cepat!

English: The Seal is very important, and you’re one of the only people able to keep it safe. Please, reconsider taking this task.
Indonesian: Segel itu sangat penting, dan kamu adalah satu-satunya orang yang bisa menjaganya tetap aman. Tolong, pertimbangkan kembali untuk mengambil tugas ini.

English: Greetings, I am Teshar, and I lead Kyon’s company of soldiers for hire. How may I help...oh my. How did you find this? I’ve looked all over Flaris for it.
Indonesian: Salam, saya Teshar, dan saya memimpin kompi tentara Kyon untuk disewa. Bagaimana saya bisa membantu ... oh saya. Bagaimana kamu menemukan ini? Saya telah mencari di seluruh Flaris untuk itu.

English: In Saint Morning, really? That explains why I never ran across it. Anyway, thank you very much. Please, take this as a token of my appreciation.
Indonesian: Di Saint Morning, benarkah? Itu menjelaskan mengapa saya tidak pernah berlari melintasinya. Bagaimanapun, terima kasih banyak. Tolong, anggap ini sebagai tanda penghargaan saya.

English: This Scroll was passed down to each Ringmasters in my family. I’d like you to have it.
Indonesian: Gulungan ini diturunkan ke setiap Ringmaster di keluarga saya. Saya ingin kamu memilikinya.

English: Even though the Kyon are hired soldiers, we do not follow just anyone because of the money. We respect faith and royalty.
Indonesian: Meskipun Kyon adalah tentara bayaran, kami tidak mengikuti sembarang orang karena uang. Kami menghormati iman dan royalti.

English: Deliver the Seal of Aenn to Teshar in Eastern Flarine.
Indonesian: Kirimkan Segel Aenn ke Teshar di Flarine Timur.

English: Now, since you’re going to become a Ringmaster, you should see the Ringmaster Priest, Heedan, in Darkon 3.
Indonesian: Sekarang, karena kamu akan menjadi Ringmaster, kamu akan melihat Ringmaster Priest, Heedan, di Darkon 3.

English: She’s been trying to track down the Teardrop of Aenn that was stolen by Hunter X.
Indonesian: Dia mencoba melacak Teardrop of Aenn yang dicuri oleh Hunter X.

English: If you can get it back, you’d help her out a great deal.
Indonesian: Jika kamu bisa mendapatkannya kembali, kamu akan sangat membantunya.

English: But… you must do it if you are to become a Ringmaster.
Indonesian: Tapi ... kamu harus melakukannya jika kamu ingin menjadi seorang Ringmaster.

English: Great job, now everything is at it should be.
Indonesian: Kerja bagus, sekarang semuanya sudah seharusnya.

English: Thank you very much. I will do my best to keep it safe.
Indonesian: Terima kasih banyak. Saya akan melakukan yang terbaik untuk menjaganya tetap aman.

English: I have given you your task, young one. Please do it.
Indonesian: Aku telah memberimu tugasmu, anak muda. Tolong lakukan itu.

English: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ is in Darkon 1. Find him, get back the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, and take it to Heedan in Cendil, Darkon 3.
Indonesian: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ ada di Darkon 1. Temukan dia, dapatkan kembali $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, dan bawa ke Heedan di Cendil, Darkon 3.

English: Here is the Symbol of the Hero. You have to complete one more task in order to be recognized as a Successor of the Hero.
Indonesian: Berikut adalah Simbol Pahlawan. Kamu harus menyelesaikan satu tugas lagi agar bisa diakui sebagai Penerus Pahlawan.

English: There is a place called the Room of the Guardian. You can find it in Guardiane. There, the Will of Heroes is protected.
Indonesian: Ada tempat yang disebut Kamar Penjaga. Kamu dapat menemukannya di Guardian. Di sana, Kehendak Pahlawan dilindungi.

English: Defeat the guardian spirit, Cardinal Guardian, and retrieve his heart.
Indonesian: Kalahkan roh penjaga, Venel Cardinal, dan ambil kembali jantungnya.

English: Then, deliver the heart to Romvoette, the Ringmaster Guardian in Guardiane.
Indonesian: Kemudian, berikan hati itu ke Romvoette, Penjaga Ringmaster di Guardiane.

English: I wish you luck, Assist.
Indonesian: Saya berharap Anda beruntung, Asisten.

English: You've come all this way just to give up? This is the last step. Please, think this through.
Indonesian: Kamu datang sejauh ini hanya untuk menyerah? Ini adalah langkah terakhir. Tolong, pikirkan ini baik-baik.

English: Welcome, Assist. You've done very well! Now, I appoint you the Successor of the Ringmaster Hero!
Indonesian: Selamat datang, Asisten. Kamu telah melakukannya dengan sangat baik! Sekarang, saya menunjuk kamu sebagai Penerus Ringmaster Hero!

English: Aenn, bless and watch over this person who is following your will, Ringmaster!
Indonesian: Aenn, berkati dan awasi orang yang mengikuti kehendakmu ini, Ringmaster!

English: I believe you've come here by mistake, Assist. Have you forgotten your task?
Indonesian: Saya yakin kamu datang ke sini karena kesalahan, Assist. Apakah kamu lupa tugasmu?

English: Defeat the Cardinal Guardian in Guardiane and retrieve his heart. Then visit Romvoette, the Ringmaster Guardian in Guardiane
Indonesian: Kalahkan Venel Cardinal di Guardiane dan ambil jantungnya. Kemudian kunjungi Romvoette, Penjaga Ringmaster di Guardiane

English: So, you think you're ready to become a Successor of the Psykeeper Hero? You've come a long way, Magician. I think you're ready.
Indonesian: Jadi, apakah kamu sudah siap menjadi Penerus Psykeeper Hero? Kamu telah datang jauh, Penyihir. Saya pikir kamu sudah siap.

English: First, we'll need to test your skills in combat if we are to continue down this path.
Indonesian: Pertama, kami perlu menguji keterampilan kamu dalam pertempuran jika kami ingin melanjutkan jalan ini.

English: I want you to defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. Not Small $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s or Giant $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, just $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. They are located southwest of the Gouthan Mountains.
Indonesian: Saya ingin kamu mengalahkan $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. Bukan $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s Kecil atau $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s Raksasa, hanya $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. Mereka terletak di barat daya Gouthan Mountains.

English: I will be watching you, Magician. Good luck!
Indonesian: Aku akan mengawasimu, Penyihir. Semoga beruntung!

English: You're giving up now before you've even started?
Indonesian: kamu menyerah sekarang bahkan sebelum kamu memulai?

English: Yes, very well done, Magician. You've certainly come a long way. You're ready to become a Successor to the Psykeeper Hero.
Indonesian: Ya, bagus sekali, Penyihir. Kamu pasti telah menempuh perjalanan jauh. Kamu siap menjadi Penerus Pahlawan Psikiater.

English: I've already given you your task, my friend. You must hurry.
Indonesian: Saya sudah memberi kamu tugasmu, temanku. Kamu harus bergegas.

English: Horison tells me you've already chosen the path of the Elementor. I cannot aid you. If you have any questions, please ask her. You can still cancel the other job quest in the Quest Window and come back to me.
Indonesian: Horison memberitahuku bahwa kamu telah memilih jalur Elementor. Saya tidak bisa membantumu. Jika kamu memiliki pertanyaan, silakan tanyakan padanya. Kamu masih dapat membatalkan pencarian pekerjaan lain di Jendela Pencarian dan kembali kepada saya.

English: Defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. Not Small $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s or Giant $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, just $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. They are located southwest of the Gouthan Mountains.
Indonesian: Kalahkan $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. Bukan $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s Kecil atau $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s Raksasa, hanya $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. Mereka terletak di barat daya Gouthan Mountains.

English: Successor of Hero -Underwear-
Indonesian: Successor of Hero -Underwear-

English: Here is your Letter of Recommendation. This shows that I have recognized your potential. Do not lose this document.
Indonesian: Ini Surat Rekomendasimu. Ini menunjukkan bahwa saya telah mengenali potensimu. Jangan sampai dokumen ini hilang.

English: For your next assignment, I need you to retrieve the Magic Underwear of Power from Kynsy who is hiding somewhere near the Erons Factory in Darkon 1.
Indonesian: Untuk tugasmu selanjutnya, aku ingin kamu mengambil Magic Underwear of Power dari Kynsy yang bersembunyi di suatu tempat di dekat Pabrik Erons di Darkon 1.

English: Good luck to you, Magician!
Indonesian: Semoga sukses, Penyihir!

English: Are you afraid to walk the path of the Psykeeper? Sure, it's not easy, but I think you have what it takes. Speak with me again if you change your mind.
Indonesian: Apakah kamu takut untuk berjalan di jalur Psykeeper? Tentu, itu tidak mudah, tetapi saya pikir kamu memiliki apa yang diperlukan. Bicaralah dengan saya lagi jika kamu berubah pikiran.

English: Yes, you found them! Amazing! What…? Do I like girl's underwear? What a silly question!
Indonesian: Ya, kamu menemukan mereka! Luar biasa!! Apa…? Apakah saya suka pakaian dalam perempuan? Sungguh pertanyaan yang konyol!

English: Anyway, you did an excellent job acquiring these. I will continue your training immediately.
Indonesian: Bagaimanapun, kamu melakukan pekerjaan yang sangat baik untuk mendapatkan ini. Saya akan segera melanjutkan pelatihan kamu.

English: Well, I certainly look dashing in these! *snicker*
Indonesian: Yah, saya pasti terlihat gagah dalam hal ini! *snicker*

English: Now, where did I put my underwear...
Indonesian: Sekarang, di mana aku meletakkan celana dalamku...

English: Deliver the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ and the Letter of Recommendation to Cuarine, the Psykeeper Wiseman at the Fountain of Dead Person near the Northern Leren Mountains.
Indonesian: Kirimkan $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ dan Surat Rekomendasi kepada Cuarine, Psykeeper Wiseman di Fountain of Dead Person dekat Pegunungan Leren Utara.

English: Alright, so let's move on. Deliver the Magic Underwear of Power to Ryupang in Madren Town
Indonesian: Baiklah, jadi mari kita lanjutkan. Kirimkan Magic Underwear of Power ke Ryupang di Kota Madren

English: Make haste, Magician!
Indonesian: Bergegaslah, Penyihir!

English: Ryupang NEEDS that underwear! Please, think it over!
Indonesian: Ryupang MEMBUTUHKAN pakaian dalam itu! Tolong, pikirkan!

English: Hmmm… yes? What've you go there, young Magician?
Indonesian: Hmm… ya? Apa yang kamu pergi ke sana, Penyihir muda?

English: The Magic Underwear of Power! Where did you find them? No matter, the important thing is that we now have this very important relic.
Indonesian: Kekuatan Pakaian Dalam Ajaib! Di mana kamu menemukan mereka? Tidak masalah, yang penting sekarang kita memiliki relik yang sangat penting ini.

English: Take this, my friend. This Stamped Scroll will prove you are worthy to become a Successor of the Psykeeper Hero.
Indonesian: Ambil ini, temanku. Gulungan Stempel ini akan membuktikan bahwa kamu layak menjadi Penerus Psykeeper Hero.

English: We are the survivors of the Massacre of the Mr. Pumpkins. We became soldiers to fight back and seek our revenge. Curse those Pumpkin-heads!
Indonesian: Kami adalah orang-orang yang selamat dari Pembantaian Mr. Pumpkins. Kami menjadi tentara untuk melawan dan membalas dendam. Terkutuklah para kepala Labu itu!

English: Deliver the Magic Underwear of Power to Ryupang in Madren Town.
Indonesian: Kirimkan Magic Underwear of Power ke Ryupang di Kota Madren.

English: No, on to your next challenge, Magician! I need you to speak with someone.
Indonesian: Tidak, tantangan berikutnya, Penyihir! Aku ingin kau berbicara dengan seseorang.

English: Pereb, the Psykeeper Priest, is trying to locate an ancient Relic from the war somewhere in the Cave of Envy in Darkon 2. It's called the Trace of Offerep.
Indonesian: Pereb, Psykeeper Priest, sedang mencoba untuk menemukan Relik kuno dari perang di suatu tempat di Cave of Envy in Darkon 2. Ini disebut Trace of Offerep.

English: Well, what are you waiting for? Get moving!
Indonesian: Nah, tunggu apa lagi? Bergerak!

English: Don't give up now, Magician. You're so close!
Indonesian: Jangan menyerah sekarang, Penyihir. Kamu sangat dekat!

English: I am grateful that you've brought the Trace of Offerep, Magician. I have been searching for this for a very long time.
Indonesian: Saya bersyukur bahwa kamu telah membawa Trace of Offerep, Penyihir. Saya telah mencari ini untuk waktu yang sangat lama.

English: You possess great potential, young Magician. Keep working hard and you will realize your dream.
Indonesian: Kamu memiliki potensi besar, Penyihir muda. Teruslah bekerja keras dan kamu akan mewujudkan impian kamu.

English: This is the alter where the Souls of Heroes are protected. What can I do for you, young one?
Indonesian: Ini adalah alter dimana Jiwa Pahlawan dilindungi. Apa yang bisa saya lakukan untukmu, anak muda?

English: Locate the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, and present it to Pereb, the Psykeeper Priest at the Altar of Psykeeper in Darkon 3.
Indonesian: Temukan $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, dan berikan kepada Pereb, Psykeeper Priest di Altar of Psykeeper di Darkon 3.

English: This is the Symbol of the Hero. There is only one more task to complete before you can be named a Successor of the Psykeeper Hero.
Indonesian: Ini adalah Simbol Pahlawan. Hanya ada satu tugas lagi yang harus diselesaikan sebelum kamu dapat dinobatkan sebagai Penerus Psykeeper Hero.

English: There is a place called the Room of the Guardian. You'll find it in Guardiane. There, the Will of the Heroes is protected.
Indonesian: Ada tempat yang disebut Kamar Penjaga. Kamu akan menemukannya di Guardiane. Di sana, Kehendak Pahlawan dilindungi.

English: You must confront the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, who resides there, and retrieve his heart.
Indonesian: Kamu harus menghadapi $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, yang tinggal di sana, dan mengambil jantungnya.

English: Deliver the Venel Heart to Shyniff, the Psykeeper Guardian in Guardiane.
Indonesian: Kirim Venel Heart ke Shyniff, Psykeeper Guardian di Guardiane.

English: May the wisdom of the Heroes guide you, young one.
Indonesian: Semoga kebijaksanaan para Pahlawan membimbingmu, anak muda.

English: Quitting now would be foolish, young one. Give it some though and speak to me again should you change your mind.
Indonesian: Berhenti sekarang akan bodoh, anak muda. Berikan beberapa meskipun dan berbicara dengan saya lagi jika kamu berubah pikiran.

English: Welcome, Magician. Your journey to becoming a Psykeeper is now complete. I now appoint you, a Successor of the Psykeeper Hero!
Indonesian: Selamat datang, Penyihir. Perjalananmu untuk menjadi seorang Psykeeper telah selesai. Saya sekarang menunjukmu, Penerus Psykeeper Hero!

English: Offerep, please guide and protect this brave soul who is following in your path, Psykeeper!
Indonesian: Offerep, tolong bimbing dan lindungi jiwa pemberani ini yang mengikuti jalanmu, Psykeeper!

English: I am awaiting a new Successor to the Psykeeper Hero. If that is you, I believe you may be forgetting something, young one.
Indonesian: Saya sedang menunggu Penerus baru Pahlawan Psykeeper. Jika itu kamu, aku yakin kamu mungkin melupakan sesuatu, anak muda.

English: Defeat the Venel Guardian, and deliver the Venel Heart to Shyniff, the Psykeeper Guardian in Guardiane.
Indonesian: Kalahkan Venel Guardian, dan berikan Venel Heart ke Shyniff, Psykeeper Guardian di Guardiane.

English: So, you think you're ready to become a Successor of the Elementor Hero? You've come a long way, Magician. I think you're ready.
Indonesian: Jadi, apakah kamu sudah siap untuk menjadi Penerus Pahlawan Elementor? Kamu telah datang jauh, Penyihir. Saya pikir kamu sudah siap.

English: Yes, very well done, Magician. You've certainly come a long way. You're ready to become a Successor to the Elementor Hero.
Indonesian: Ya, bagus sekali, Penyihir. kamu pasti telah menempuh perjalanan jauh. Kamu siap menjadi Penerus Elementor Hero.

English: You've already made a decision to become a Successor of the Psykeeper Hero. You have to visit Ellend to continue your training.
Indonesian: Kamu telah membuat keputusan untuk menjadi Penerus Pahlawan Psikiater. Kamu harus mengunjungi Ellen untuk melanjutkan pelatihanmu.

English: Successor of Hero -Feather-
Indonesian: Successor of Hero -Feather-

English: Here is your Letter of Recommendation. This shows that the master recognizes your potential. Do not lose this document.
Indonesian: Ini Surat Rekomendasimu. Ini menunjukkan bahwa master mengenali potensimu. Jangan sampai dokumen ini hilang.

English: For your next assignment, I'll need you to get the Feather of Magic Power which is located somewhere in Magmient, in Darkon 3.
Indonesian: Untuk tugasmu berikutnya, saya akan membutuhkan kamu untuk mendapatkan Feather of Magic Power yang terletak di suatu tempat di Magmient, di Darkon 3.

English: Once you've located the feather, present it to Cuzrill, the Elementor Wiseman near the Fountain of Dead person in Flaris.
Indonesian: Setelah kamu menemukan bulunya, berikan kepada Cuzrill, Elementor Wiseman di dekat Fountain of Dead person in Flaris.

English: I pray the mercy of Lillip will always be with you.
Indonesian: Aku berdoa rahmat Lilip akan selalu bersamamu.

English: Don't underestimate yourself, Magician. The path is meant to be difficult. Let me know if you change your mind.
Indonesian: Jangan meremehkan diri sendiri, Penyihir. Jalan itu dimaksudkan untuk menjadi sulit. Beri tahu saya jika kamu berubah pikiran.

English: An, yes. The Feather of Magic power! It is said that this was crafted by Lillip and made from the feather of a Luia. It can double your magic power.
Indonesian: Sebuah, ya. Feather of Magic power! Dikatakan bahwa ini dibuat oleh Lillip dan terbuat dari bulu Luia. Itu bisa menggandakan kekuatan sihirmu.

English: I sure know a lot about it, don't I? Hahaha! Thank you for finding this, Magician.
Indonesian: Saya yakin tahu banyak tentang itu, bukan? Hahaha! Terima kasih telah menemukan ini, Penyihir.

English: I am just as clever as the Elementor Priest! Maybe I'm even more clever than her! I am surrounded by jealous people!
Indonesian: Aku sama pintarnya dengan Elementor Priest! Mungkin aku bahkan lebih pintar darinya! Saya dikelilingi oleh orang-orang yang cemburu!

English: Locate the Feather of Magic Power and present it to Cuzrill, the Elementor Wiseman near the Fountain of Dead person in Flaris.
Indonesian: Temukan Feather of Magic Power dan berikan kepada Cuzrill, Elementor Wiseman di dekat Fountain of Dead person in Flaris.

English: Now, I need you to deliver this relic to Parine, Tina's helper at Saint City Station.
Indonesian: Sekarang, saya ingin kamu mengirimkan relik ini ke Parine, pembantu Tina di Stasiun Saint City.

English: Take good care of that relic, and good luck!
Indonesian: Jaga baik-baik relik itu, dan semoga berhasil!

English: What? You did all this just to get your filthy hands on that relic? That's just… awful. I'm speechless.
Indonesian: Apa? Kamu melakukan semua ini hanya untuk mendapatkan relik itu? Itu hanya... mengerikan. Saya tidak dapat berkata-kata.

English: You've found it! Oh thank you, thank you, thank you! Finally, I have it! The Feather of Magic Power!
Indonesian: Kamu telah menemukannya! Oh terima kasih, terima kasih, terima kasih! Akhirnya, saya memilikinya! The Feather of Magic Power!

English: You must have been through a lot to acquire this for me. Here, I have something for you…
Indonesian: Kamu pasti telah melalui banyak hal untuk mendapatkan ini untuk saya. Ini, aku punya sesuatu untukmu…

English: Take this, my friend. This Stamp Scroll will prove you are worthy to become a Successor of the Elementor Hero.
Indonesian: Ambil ini, teman saya. Gulungan Stempel ini akan membuktikan bahwa kamu layak menjadi Penerus Elementor Hero.

English: I am the scion of Lillip. At the moment, I am learning from Tina about managing the Saint City Station. Why are you here? Are you forgetting something?
Indonesian: Saya adalah keturunan Lilip. Saat ini, saya belajar dari Tina tentang mengelola Stasiun Saint City. Mengapa kamu di sini? Apakah kamu melupakan sesuatu?

English: Deliver the Feather of Magic Power to Parine, Tina's helper at Saint City Station.
Indonesian: Kirimkan Feather of Magic Power ke Parine, pembantu Tina di Stasiun Saint City

English: You'll need to speak with Condram, the Elementor Priest in order to continue your journey. However, fir you'll have to complete another task.
Indonesian: Kamu harus berbicara dengan Condram, Elementor Priest untuk melanjutkan perjalananmu. Namun, pertama Kamu harus menyelesaikan tugas lain.

English: Elementor Priest Condram is looking for something very important. It is the Perfume of Lillip, which is rumored to be somewhere in Heret, in Darkon 3.
Indonesian: Elementor Priest Condram sedang mencari sesuatu yang sangat penting. Ini adalah Parfum Lillip, yang dikabarkan ada di suatu tempat di Heret, di Darkon 3.

English: You… won't? Why not? It would be a shame to let someone as gifted as you simply give up. Speak to me again when you're ready.
Indonesian: Kamu ... tidak akan? Kenapa tidak? Sayang sekali jika seseorang yang berbakat seperti kamu menyerah begitu saja. Bicaralah padaku lagi saat kau siap.

English: Ah yes, the Perfume of Lillip. I have been looking for this for a very long time.
Indonesian: Ah ya, Parfum Lilip. Saya telah mencari ini untuk waktu yang sangat lama.

English: Thank you very much, Magician. Now the relics of the Elementor Hero are safe.
Indonesian: Terima kasih banyak, Penyihir. Sekarang peninggalan dari Elementor Hero aman.

English: This is the altar where we protect the Souls of the Heroes. What can I do for you, my friend?
Indonesian: Ini adalah altar tempat kami melindungi Jiwa Pahlawan. Apa yang bisa saya lakukan untukmu, temanku?

English: Find the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ and deliver the Stamped Scroll to Priest Condram at the Altar of Elementor in Darkon 3.
Indonesian: Temukan $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ dan kirimkan Stamped Scroll ke Priest Condram di Altar of Elementor di Darkon 3.

English: This is the Symbol of the Hero. There is only one more task to complete before you can be named a Successor of the Elementor Hero.
Indonesian: Ini adalah Simbol Pahlawan. Hanya ada satu tugas lagi yang harus diselesaikan sebelum kamu dapat dinobatkan sebagai Penerus Elementor Hero.

English: Deliver the Venel Heart to Wendien, the Elementor Guardian in Guardiane.
Indonesian: Kirim Venel Heart ke Wendien, Elementor Guardian di Guardiane.

English: Maybe the wisdom of the Heroes guide you, my friend.
Indonesian: Mungkin kebijaksanaan para Pahlawan membimbingmu, temanku.

English: Welcome, Magician. Your journey to becoming an Elementor is complete. I now appoint you, a Successor of the Elementor Hero!
Indonesian: Selamat datang, Penyihir. Perjalananmu untuk menjadi Elementor telah selesai. Sekarang saya menunjukmu, Penerus Elementor Hero!

English: Lillip! Bless and guide this brave soul who is following your will! Elementor!
Indonesian: Lilip! Memberkati dan membimbing jiwa pemberani ini yang mengikuti kehendakmu! Elementor!

English: I am awaiting a new Successor to the Elementor Hero. If that is you, I believe you may be forgetting something, Magician.
Indonesian: Saya sedang menunggu Penerus baru untuk Elementor Hero. Jika itu Anda, saya yakin kamu mungkin melupakan sesuatu, Penyihir.

English: Defeat the Venel Guardian, and deliver the Venel Heart to Wendien, the Elementor Guardian in Guardiane.
Indonesian: Kalahkan Venel Guardian, dan berikan Venel Heart ke Wendien, Elementor Guardian di Guardiane.

English: Sound which calls the Dark
Indonesian: Suara yang memanggil Kegelapan

English: Have you ever heard the horrible sound from Mars Mine? That strange and hair-raising sound… It's spooky!
Indonesian: Pernahkah kamu mendengar suara mengerikan dari Tambang Mars? Suara aneh dan menggelitik itu… Seram!

English: Maybe you haven't, but you will. Muahahaha! I heard it clearly! I hope it's not the sound I think it is...
Indonesian: Mungkin kamu belum melakukannya, tetapi kamu akan melakukannya. Muahahaha! Aku mendengarnya dengan jelas!!! Saya harap itu bukan suara yang saya kira ...

English: (After a long hesitation...) Listen, if it is the sound I think it is, we have a big problem. Well, more like a disaster.
Indonesian: (Setelah ragu-ragu lama...) Dengar, jika itu suara yang saya pikir itu, kita punya masalah besar. Yah, lebih seperti bencana.

English: (Holds your hands suddenly… creepy, right?) So, please, will you do me a favor?
Indonesian: (Menggenggam tanganmu tiba-tiba… menyeramkan, kan?) Jadi, tolong, maukah kamu membantuku?

English: Great, please investigate the entrance to the Mars Mine, then return to me.
Indonesian: Bagus, tolong selidiki pintu masuk ke Tambang Mars, lalu kembali padaku.

English: Not interested, huh? Fine, go play with Aibatts or something…
Indonesian: Tidak tertarik, huh? Baiklah, bermainlah dengan Aibatts atau semacamnya…

English: Unfortunately it's exactly what I thought... Darn, I am still missing something.
Indonesian: Sayangnya itu persis seperti yang kupikirkan... Sial, aku masih melewatkan sesuatu.

English: Please just investigate the entrance. It can't be that hard…
Indonesian: Tolong selidiki saja pintu masuknya. Tidak bisa sesulit itu…

English: Investigate the entrance to the Mars Mine.
Indonesian: Selidiki pintu masuk ke Tambang Mars.

English: Phantom of Fear
Indonesian: Phantom of Fear

English: I cannot be sure by only investigating the entrance. I need more detailed information…
Indonesian: Saya tidak bisa memastikan dengan hanya menyelidiki pintu masuk. Saya butuh informasi lebih detail…

English: (Looks at you imploringly) Would you please, please bring me more detailed information?
Indonesian: (Melihat Anda memohon) Tolong, tolong berikan saya informasi yang lebih rinci?

English: I wouldn't ask if it weren't very, very important. Will you help?
Indonesian: Saya tidak akan bertanya apakah itu tidak terlalu, sangat penting. Maukah kamu membantu?

English: Thank you! This time, investigate the inside of the Mars Mine. Also, please investigate the masquerpets there.
Indonesian: Terima kasih! Kali ini, selidiki bagian dalam Tambang Mars. Juga, tolong selidiki topeng-topeng di sana.

English: It's not like I'm asking you for your first born child…
Indonesian: Bukannya aku memintamu untuk anak sulungmu…

English: Oh no… We're doomed! What are we going to do!?
Indonesian: Oh tidak… Kita ditakdirkan! Apa yang akan kita lakukan!?

English: I know it sounds dangerous, but you've got to be brave. This is very important.
Indonesian: Saya tahu kedengarannya berbahaya, tetapi kamu harus berani. Ini sangat penting.

English: Investigate the inside of the Mars Mine. Once inside, investigate the masquerpets you find.
Indonesian: Selidiki bagian dalam Tambang Mars. Begitu masuk, selidiki topeng yang kamu temukan.

English: Serus Uriel
Indonesian: Serus Uriel

English: Now I'm sure it's what I feared. I still I can't do anything about it. I need evidence... Hmm...
Indonesian: Sekarang saya yakin itu yang saya takutkan. Aku masih tidak bisa berbuat apa-apa. Aku butuh bukti... Hmm...

English: (Thinking for a while, and then, suddenly...)
Indonesian: (Berpikir sebentar, dan kemudian, tiba-tiba...)

English: Yes! That's it! There must be evidence in the Mars Mine! We have to find it!
Indonesian: Ya! Itu dia! Pasti ada bukti di Mars Mine! Kita harus menemukannya!!!

English: If the seal is broken, the broken pieces of the magic key must be there.
Indonesian: Jika segel rusak, potongan kunci ajaib yang rusak harus ada di sana.

English: Now I know what we must do! Would you please help me once more, friend?
Indonesian: Sekarang saya tahu apa yang harus kita lakukan! Maukah kamu membantu saya sekali lagi, teman?

English: Thank you! Collect the 5 pieces of the broken key somewhere in the Mars Mine, and return to me
Indonesian: Terima kasih! Kumpulkan 5 buah broken key di suatu tempat di Tambang Mars, dan kembalikan padaku

English: Are you serious? What part of *doomed* did you not understand?
Indonesian: Apakah kamu serius? Bagian mana dari *doomed* yang tidak kamu mengerti?

English: It's all clear now. It is exactly what I was afraid of. Serus Uriel has returned. The Phantom of Fear.
Indonesian: Semuanya jelas sekarang. Justru itu yang saya takutkan. Serus Uriel telah kembali. Hantu Ketakutan.

English: Keep looking! The pieces of the broken key must be somewhere inside the Mars Mine!
Indonesian: Tetap mencari! Potongan kunci yang rusak pasti ada di suatu tempat di dalam Tambang Mars!

English: Collect 5 pieces of the broken key in the Mars Mine and return to Dr. Estly.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan 5 buah broken key di Tambang Mars dan kembalikan ke Dr. Estly.

English: Dangerous War
Indonesian: Dangerous War

English: As long as Serus Uriel is still alive, it will be impossible to avoid all out war…
Indonesian: Selama Serus Uriel masih hidup, mustahil untuk menghindari perang habis-habisan…

English: I do not want to stain Flaris with blood again. That's the last thing we need right now.
Indonesian: Saya tidak ingin menodai Flaris dengan darah lagi. Itu hal terakhir yang kita butuhkan saat ini.

English: Her power can't possibly be as strong as before, otherwise she wouldn't be hiding in the mine.
Indonesian: Kekuatannya tidak mungkin sekuat sebelumnya, jika tidak, dia tidak akan bersembunyi di tambang.

English: I need your help again. Can you help me protect our peaceful Flaris?
Indonesian: Aku butuh bantuanmu lagi. Bisakah kamu membantu saya melindungi Flaris kita yang damai?

English: I do not know exactly where it is, but there is a chamber for Serus Uriel. In front of that room, there are five guardians that protect it. Please defeat them first.
Indonesian: Saya tidak tahu persis di mana itu, tetapi ada kamar untuk Serus Uriel. Di depan ruangan itu, ada lima penjaga yang melindunginya. Tolong kalahkan mereka dulu.

English: What the hell is more important than this? I really cannot understand!
Indonesian: Apa yang lebih penting dari ini? Aku benar-benar tidak bisa mengerti!

English: Hmm... You are really great. I will appoint you as a punitive force of Serus Uriel. Here is the key. Please take it.
Indonesian: Hmm.. Kamu benar-benar hebat. Saya akan menunjukmu sebagai kekuatan hukuman Serus Uriel. Inilah kuncinya. Silakan ambil.

English: From now on, the conflict is with Serus Uriel. Please, head back there and use the key to open the door to her chamber.
Indonesian: Mulai sekarang, konfliknya adalah dengan Serus Uriel. Tolong, kembali ke sana dan gunakan kunci untuk membuka pintu kamarnya.

English: Don't give up now, you must defeat her.
Indonesian: Jangan menyerah sekarang, kamu harus mengalahkannya.

English: Don't underestimate the 5 guardians. They are very powerful.
Indonesian: Jangan meremehkan 5 wali. Mereka sangat kuat.

English: Defeat the 5 Veduque Guardians in front of Serus Uriel's Chamber and return to Dr. Estly to acquire the Mars Dungeon Key.
Indonesian: Kalahkan 5 Veduque Guardians di depan Serus Uriel's Chamber dan kembali ke Dr. Estly untuk mendapatkan Mars Dungeon Key.

English: Existence which Desire Summoned
Indonesian: Existence which Desire Summoned

English: So you're interested in challenging Clockworks, huh? What are you, nuts?!
Indonesian: Jadi kamu tertarik untuk menantang Clockworks, ya? Apa yang kamu, gila?!

English: Okay...if you insist. However before I help you, I need to make sure you aren't just going to walk in there and fall over dead. I need to make sure you're worthy. Okay?
Indonesian: Oke ... jika kamu bersikeras. Namun sebelum saya membantumu, saya perlu memastikan kamu tidak hanya akan berjalan di sana dan jatuh mati. Saya perlu memastikanmu layak. Oke?

English: Great! Please visit Dr. Est. He is studying the ecology of Darkon, in the nearby Gouthan Mountains of Darkon1.
Indonesian: Besar! Silakan kunjungi Dr. Est. Dia sedang mempelajari ekologi Darkon, di dekat Gouthan Mountains di Darkon1.

English: Backing out already? Hahaha! I knew you were all talk…
Indonesian: Sudah mundur? Hahaha! Saya tahu kamu semua berbicara ...

English: Oh, did the Mayor of Darkon send you? You must be the one he was talking about that's crazy enough to challenge Clockworks. Here, you'll need this book.
Indonesian: Oh, apakah Walikota Darkon mengirimmu? Kamu pasti orang yang dia bicarakan yang cukup gila untuk menantang Clockworks. Di sini, kamu akan membutuhkan buku ini.

English: It contains information about how Clockworks appeared here in Madrigal. It's a good read, but not for the faint of heart.
Indonesian: Ini berisi informasi tentang bagaimana Clockworks muncul di sini di Madrigal. Ini bacaan yang bagus, tapi tidak untuk yang lemah hati.

English: Clockworks is one of the most dangerous monsters in Madrigal! He's huge! I have been studying him for 4 years now, but I still don't know everything about him.
Indonesian: Clockworks adalah salah satu monster paling berbahaya di Madrigal! Dia besar! Saya telah mempelajarinya selama 4 tahun sekarang, tetapi saya masih belum tahu segalanya tentang dia.

English: Visit Dr. Est near the Gouthan Mountains in Darkon 1.
Indonesian: Kunjungi Dr. Est di dekat Gouthan Mountains di Darkon 1

English: Great Clockworks War - 1st
Indonesian: Great Clockworks War - 1st

English: Alright, let's get started. Have you heard of the Great Clockworks War? You'll need to study it before you can challenge Clockworks.
Indonesian: Baiklah, mari kita mulai. Pernahkah kamu mendengar tentang Great Clockworks War? Kamu harus mempelajarinya sebelum kamu dapat menantang Clockworks.

English: the Great Clockworks War is the first time the people of Darkon were faced with that terrible menace, Clockworks. The people of Darkon were defeated.
Indonesian: Great Clockworks War adalah pertama kalinya orang-orang Darkon dihadapkan pada ancaman mengerikan itu, Clockworks. Orang-orang Darkon dikalahkan.
