English: They escaped to the Erons Factory. Evidence of this war can be found all over Darkon… Are you ready to continue to the next step?
Indonesian: Mereka melarikan diri ke Pabrik Erons. Bukti perang ini dapat ditemukan di seluruh Darkon… Apakah kamu siap untuk melanjutkan ke langkah berikutnya?

English: Find 5 pieces of War Remnants in Darkon 2, and then visit my brother, Dr. Estern. He is at the Hill of Shade in Saint Morning.
Indonesian: Temukan 5 buah War Remnants di Darkon 2, lalu kunjungi saudaraku, Dr. Estern. Dia berada di Bukit Naungan di Saint Morning.

English: I guess you truly aren't ready to face Clockworks. Why did you waste my time?
Indonesian: Saya kira kamu benar-benar tidak siap menghadapi Clockworks. Mengapa kamu membuang waktu saya?

English: My brother sent you, right? Nice to meet you! My name is Dr. Estern, Dr. Est's younger brother. Why did he send... Oh, you're going to challenge Clockworks? Okay, do you have the War Remnants?
Indonesian: Kakakku mengirimmu, kan? Senang bertemu denganmu! Nama saya Dr. Estern, adik Dr. Est. Kenapa dia mengirim... Oh, kau akan menantang Clockworks? Oke, apakah kamu memiliki Sisa Perang?

English: Hmm... Five, exactly! Okay, here you are. This book is about the study of Clockworks. It will be really useful in learning about your opponent.
Indonesian: Hmm... Lima, tepatnya! Oke, di sini kamu. Buku ini adalah tentang studi Clockworks. Ini akan sangat berguna dalam mempelajari lawanmu.

English: Yes? I'm sorry, I think I'm waiting for someone else.
Indonesian: Ya? Maaf, saya pikir saya sedang menunggu orang lain.

English: Locate 5 pieces War Remnants in Darkon 2 and visit Dr. Estern at the Hill of Shade near Saint Morning
Indonesian: Temukan 5 War Remnants di Darkon 2 dan kunjungi Dr. Estern di Hill of Shade dekat Saint Morning

English: Great Clockworks War - 2nd
Indonesian: Great Clockworks War - 2nd

English: Now for the final step! You've already heard about the Great Clockworks War. Actually, there was another Clockworks War after that…
Indonesian: Sekarang untuk langkah terakhir! kamu sudah pernah mendengar tentang Great Clockworks War. Sebenarnya, ada Perang Clockworks lain setelah itu ...

English: That time, Clockworks was defeated and captured.
Indonesian: Saat itu, Clockworks dikalahkan dan ditangkap.

English: He was held at the cage where he was defeated by the allied forces of Flarine, Saint City and Darkon.
Indonesian: Dia ditahan di kandang di mana dia dikalahkan oleh pasukan sekutu Flarine, Saint City dan Darkon.

English: You can see the evidence of the war in Darkon 1 and at the Plain of Bubble in Flaris.
Indonesian: Kamu dapat melihat bukti perang di Darkon 1 dan di Plain of Bubble di Flaris.

English: Please find 5 War Scars in Darkon 1 and the Plain of Bubble, and then visit my brother, Dr. Estly, who is in Northern Flaris.
Indonesian: Silakan temukan 5 Bekas Luka Perang di Darkon 1 dan Plain of Bubble, lalu kunjungi saudara saya, Dr. Estly, yang ada di Flaris Utara.

English: Fine, have it your way. I guess you just aren't ready to face Clockworks.
Indonesian: Baiklah, lakukan dengan caramu. Saya rasa kamu belum siap menghadapi Clockworks.

English: Oh, did my brothers send you to me? Then you must be the Clockworks challenger! Please, show me the War Scars.
Indonesian: Oh, apakah saudara-saudaraku mengirimmu kepadaku? Maka kamu harus menjadi penantang Clockworks! Tolong, tunjukkan Bekas Luka Perang.

English: Hmmm… everything looks to be in order here! Here, take this book. It is a more detailed study of Clockworks. It goes into detail about his behavior.
Indonesian: Hmmm… semuanya terlihat rapi di sini! Ini, ambil buku ini. Ini adalah studi yang lebih rinci tentang Clockworks. Ini masuk ke detail tentang perilakunya.

English: I'm waiting for someone who is supposed to be bringing me something important.
Indonesian: Aku sedang menunggu seseorang yang seharusnya membawakanku sesuatu yang penting.

English: Find 5 War Scars in Darkon 1 and the Plain of Bubble and visit Dr.Estly in Northern Flaris.
Indonesian: Temukan 5 Bekas Luka Perang di Darkon 1 dan Plain of Bubble dan kunjungi Dr.Estly di Flaris Utara.

English: Show What You Can Do
Indonesian: Tunjukkan Apa yang Bisa Kamu Lakukan

English: Well, it looks like you have all the information you need about Clockworks.
Indonesian: Sepertinya kamu memiliki semua informasi yang kamu butuhkan tentang Clockworks.

English: So, after all that, the masterpiece of Darkon was created, Clocks! What? You don't know what Clocks is?
Indonesian: Jadi, setelah semua itu, mahakarya Darkon telah dibuat, Jam! Apa? Kamu tidak tahu apa itu Jam?

English: It's like a small version of Clockworks. We made it for the people who want to challenge Clockworks, so they can practice first!
Indonesian: Ini seperti versi kecil dari Clockworks. Kami membuatnya untuk orang-orang yang ingin menantang Clockworks, sehingga mereka dapat berlatih terlebih dahulu!

English: Since you're on your way to becoming the next challenger, why don't you practice a bit, first?
Indonesian: Karena kamu sedang dalam perjalanan untuk menjadi penantang berikutnya, mengapa kamu tidak berlatih sedikit dulu?

English: Clocks' Cage is outside of Darken. You'll have to defeat it, but you'll probably need some help.
Indonesian: Clocks' Cage berada di luar Darken. Kamu harus mengalahkannya, tetapi kamu mungkin membutuhkan bantuan.

English: I knew you were a coward! Hahaha!
Indonesian: Aku tahu kamu pengecut! Hahaha!

English: Congratulations! Now, you are ready to challenge Clockworks. You better be prepared or you'll get squished!
Indonesian: Selamat! Sekarang, kamu siap untuk menantang Clockworks. Kamu sebaiknya bersiap-siap atau kamu akan terjepit!

English: Don't be fooled by his size, Clocks is almost as powerful as Clockworks.
Indonesian: Jangan terkecoh dengan ukurannya, Clocks hampir sekuat Clockworks.

English: Defeat Clocks, who is caged just outside of Darken. You may need some help.
Indonesian: Kalahkan Clocks, yang dikurung di luar Darken. Kamu mungkin membutuhkan bantuan.

English: Create Guild
Indonesian: Create Guild

English: Do you want to create a new guild? Excellent! First, I have to check if you are qualified to create a new guild.
Indonesian: Apakah kamu ingin membuat serikat baru? Bagus sekali! Pertama, saya harus memeriksa apakah kamu memenuhi syarat untuk membuat guild baru.

English: Okay, first you have to organize your own party. You should be the party leader and the total number of members should be 3, including you. Got it?
Indonesian: Oke, pertama-tama kamu harus mengatur pesta kamu sendiri. Kamu harus menjadi pemimpin partai dan jumlah total anggota harus 3, termasuk kamu. Mengerti?

English: Once again, make your own party. Remember that you should be the party leader and the total number of members should be 3, including you. Please visit me again once you have done this.
Indonesian: Sekali lagi, buat pesta kamu sendiri. Ingatlah bahwa kamu harus menjadi pemimpin partai dan jumlah total anggota harus 3, termasuk kamu. Silakan kunjungi saya lagi setelah kamu melakukan ini.

English: Okay, in that case, if you decide to create a guild later, we'll be here!
Indonesian: Oke, kalau begitu, jika kamu memutuskan untuk membuat guild nanti, kami akan berada di sini!

English: Hmm… Okay, lets see. You are the party leader, and there are 3 members... Good!
Indonesian: Hmm…Oke, kalau begitu, jika kamu memutuskan untuk membuat guild nanti, kami akan berada di sini!

English: Now I will let you create your own guild. By the way, according to Madrigal policy, you must pay 3,000,000 Penya to create the guild.
Indonesian: Sekarang saya akan membiarkan kamu membuat serikat kamu sendiri. Omong-omong, menurut kebijakan Madrigal, kamu harus membayar 3.000.000 Penya untuk membuat guild.

English: Do you have 3,000,000 Penya right now?
Indonesian: Apakah kamu memiliki 3.000.000 Penya sekarang?

English: There seems to be a problem. Maybe you aren't the party leader or you do not have enough members. Remember, you have to be the party leader and you should have 3 party members, including yourself.
Indonesian: Sepertinya ada masalah. Mungkin kamu bukan pemimpin partai atau kamu tidak memiliki cukup anggota. Ingat, kamu harus menjadi pemimpin partai dan kamu harus memiliki 3 anggota partai, termasuk kamu sendiri.

English: Please come back again when you have met all of the conditions for creating your guild.
Indonesian: Silakan kembali lagi ketika kamu telah memenuhi semua persyaratan untuk membuat serikat kamu.

English: Thanksgiving with Ivil Tobby
Indonesian: Thanksgiving with Ivil Tobby

English: My brother Iblis was going to bring us $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$s for Thanksgiving, but he lost them on his way here.
Indonesian: Kakakku Iblis akan membawakan kita $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ untuk Thanksgiving, tapi dia kehilangannya dalam perjalanan ke sini.

English: I will give you the forbidden gift, a red bead, if you can bring me 1,000 rice cakes. Will you do that?
Indonesian: Saya akan memberi kamu hadiah terlarang, manik-manik merah, jika kamu bisa membawakan saya 1.000 kue beras. Apakah kamu akan melakukannya?

English: You can get the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$s by hunting monsters.
Indonesian: Kamu bisa mendapatkan $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ dengan berburu monster.

English: Hey, go away if you have nothing to do with me!
Indonesian: Hei, pergilah jika kamu tidak ada hubungannya denganku!

English: Oh! You did a great job!
Indonesian: Oh! Kamu melakukan pekerjaan yang hebat!

English: You are missing some $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$s....did you eat any of them?
Indonesian: Kamu kehilangan beberapa $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$....apakah kamu memakannya?

English: Ivil Tobby said he will give me the forbidden gift, a red bead, if I can bring him 1,000 rice cakes.
Indonesian: Ivil Tobby berkata dia akan memberiku hadiah terlarang, manik-manik merah, jika aku bisa membawakannya 1.000 rice cakes.

English: Thanksgiving with Ivil Dorry
Indonesian: Thanksgiving with Ivil Dorry

English: I will give you the forbidden gift, an orange bead, if you can bring me 600 rice cakes. Will you do that?
Indonesian: Saya akan memberi kamu hadiah terlarang, manik-manik oranye, jika kamu bisa membawakan saya 600 kue beras. Apakah kamu akan melakukannya?

English: Ivil Dorry said she will give me the forbidden gift, an orange bead, if I can bring her 600 rice cakes.
Indonesian: Ivil Dorry berkata dia akan memberiku hadiah terlarang, manik-manik oranye, jika aku bisa membawakan 600 rice cakes untuknya.

English: Thanksgiving with Ivil Nana
Indonesian: Thanksgiving with Ivil Nana

English: I will give you the forbidden gift, a yellow bead, if you can bring me 300 rice cakes. Will you do that?
Indonesian: Saya akan memberi kamu hadiah terlarang, manik-manik kuning, jika kamu bisa membawakan saya 300 kue beras. Apakah kamu akan melakukannya?

English: Ivil Nana said she will give me the forbidden gift, a yellow bead, if I can bring her 300 rice cakes.
Indonesian: Ivil Nana mengatakan dia akan memberiku hadiah terlarang, sebuah yellow bead, jika aku bisa membawakannya 300 rice cakes.

English: Thanksgiving with Ivil Tubby
Indonesian: Thanksgiving dengan lvil Tubby

English: I will give you the forbidden gift, a green bead, if you can bring me 100 rice cakes. Will you do that?
Indonesian: Aku akan memberimu hadiah terlarang, sebuah Green Bead, jika Kau bisa membawakanku 100 Rice Cakes. Maukah Kau melakukannya?

English: Ivil Tubby said he will give me the forbidden gift, a green bead, if I can bring him 100 rice cakes.
Indonesian: Ivil Tubby mengatakan dia akan memberiku hadiah terlarang, sebuah Green Bead, jika aku bisa membawakannya 100 Rice Bead.

English: Thanksgiving with Ivil Pho
Indonesian: Thanksgiving dengan lvil Pho

English: I will give you the forbidden gift, a blue bead, if you can bring me 50 rice cakes. Will you do that?
Indonesian: Aku akan memberimu hadiah terlarang, sebuah Blue Bead, jika Kamu bisa membawakanku 50 Rice Cake. Maukah Kau melakukannya?

English: Ivil Pho said she will give me the forbidden gift, a blue bead, if I can bring her 50 rice cakes.
Indonesian: Ivil Pho mengatakan dia akan memberiku hadiah terlarang, sebuah Blue Bead, jika aku bisa membawakannya 50 Rice Cakes

English: Gather Leaves 01
Indonesian: Gather Leaves 01

English: I need leaves... I have to gather more leaves than these guys next to me...
Indonesian: I need leaves... I have to gather more leaves than these guys next to me...

English: If you bring me 100 leaves, I will give you the forbidden gift, a Fir Tree. Will you do that?
Indonesian: Jika Kamu membawakanku 100 Leaves, aku akan memberimu hadiah terlarang, sebuah Fir Tree. Bisakah kamu melakukannya?

English: You can collect the leaves by hunting any monster in the world.
Indonesian: Kamu dapat mengumpulkan Leaves dengan berburu monster apa pun di dunia.

English: Get away if you have nothing to do with me! Go!
Indonesian: Pergi jika kamu tidak punya urusan denganku!! Pergi!!

English: Oh, you did it! Congratulations!
Indonesian: Ah, kamu berhasil melakukannya!! Selamat!!

English: I am still short on leaves! I cannot beat the guys next to me with this handful of leaves!
Indonesian: Aku masih memiliki sedikit Leaves! Aku tidak bisa mengalahkan orang-orang di sebelahku hanya dengan Leaves segini!

English: The Firdryad said he will give me the forbidden gift, a Fir Tree, if I bring him 100 leaves.
Indonesian: Firdryad berkata kalau dia akan memberiku hadiah terlarang. sebuah Fir Tree, jika aku membawakannya 100 Leaves.

English: Gather Leaves 02
Indonesian: Gather Leaves 02

English: I need leaves... I have to gather more leaves than these guys next to me...
Indonesian: Aku butuh Leaves.. Aku harus mengumpulkannya lebih banyak daripada orang-orang di sebelahku ini..

English: If you bring me 300 leaves, I will give you the forbidden gift, a Persimmon Tree. Will you do that?
Indonesian: Jika kamu membawakanku 300 Leaves, aku akan memberimu hadiah terlarang, sebuah Persimmon Tree. Maukah kamu melakukannya?

English: The Persdryad said she will give me the forbidden gift, a Persimmon Tree, if I bring her 300 leaves.
Indonesian: Persdryad berkata kalau Dia akan memberiku hadiah terlarang, sebuah Presimmon Tree, jika aku membawakannya 300 Leaves.

English: Gather Leaves 03
Indonesian: Gather Leaves 03

English: If you bring me 600 leaves, I will give you the forbidden gift, a Pear Tree. Will you do that?
Indonesian: Jika Kau membawakanku 600 Leaves, Aku akan memberimu hadiah terlarang, sebuah Pear Tree. Maukah Kau melakukannya?

English: The Peardryad said he will give me the forbidden gift, a Pear Tree, if I bring him 600 leaves.
Indonesian: Peardryad berkata kalau dia akan memberiku hadiah terlarang, sebuah Pear Tree, jika aku membawakannya 600 Leaves.

English: Gather Leaves 04
Indonesian: Gather Leaves 04

English: If you bring me 1000 leaves, I will give you the forbidden gift, a Pine Tree. Will you do that?
Indonesian: Jika Kau membawakanku 1000 Leaves, Aku akan memberimu hadiah terlarang, sebuah Pine Tree. Maukah Kau melakukannya?

English: The Pinedryad said she will give me the forbidden gift, a Pine Tree, if I bring her 1000 leaves.
Indonesian: Pinedryad berkata kalau Dia akan memberiku hadiah terlarang, sebuah Pine Tree, jika aku membawakannya 1000 Leaves

English: Welcome to Madrigal!
Indonesian: Selamat datang di Madrigal!

English: Welcome, traveler! By the look of you, I'd say you're getting ready for an adventure, am I right? Well then you've come to the right place!
Indonesian: Selamat datang, Traveler! Jika melihat penampilanmu, Aku bisa bilang jika Kau telah siap untuk berpetualang, benarkan? Kau datang ke tempat yang tepat!

English: There are plenty of dangerous monsters out there to battle, and my shop will help you get prepared for the fight!
Indonesian: Ada banyak monster berbahaya di luar sana untuk dihajar, dan tokoku akan setia membantumu mempersiapkan diri sebelum pertarungan!

English: You'll be seeing me a lot later on, I'm sure, but for now why don't you pay our local smith Boboko a visit?
Indonesian: Kita akan sering bertemu nanti, Aku yakin itu, tapi untuk saat ini mengapa kamu tidak coba mampir ke tukang besi lokal Boboko?

English: Boboko owns the Armor Shop near here, and I think he might have something special for you.
Indonesian: Boboko memiliki Armor Shop di dekat sini, dan Aku rasa Dia mungkin memiliki sesuatu yang istimewa untukmu.

English: Boboko's right nearby, you can't miss him with all the hammering! Oh, and welcome to Madrigal!
Indonesian: Toko Boboko ada disekitar sini, Tidak mungkin kau akan kelewatan dengan semua suara palu itu! Oh, dan selamat datang di Madrigal!

English: Packing it in so soon? But the day's just started! You have so much to do!
Indonesian: Sudah mulai berkemas? hari baru saja dimulai! Kau masih memiliki begitu banyak hal yang harus dilakukan!

English: Howdy! Lui told me you'd be coming! Here, this should help you get started. Next time you come by, we'll get you underway on your Vagrant training.
Indonesian: Halo! Lui bilang kau akan datang! Ambil, ini akan membantumu memulai. Lain kali Kau mampir, kita akan membantumu mengikuti pelatihan Vagrant.

English: Visit Boboko of the Armor Shop to receive a gift.
Indonesian: Kunjungi Boboko di Armor Shop untuk menerima hadiah.

English: Introduction to Armor
Indonesian: Instruksi mengenai Armor

English: Good to see you again! Glad to see some new faces in Madrigal, what with all the Masquerpets around. Let's see what we can do to get you ready to face them.
Indonesian: Senang bertemu denganmu lagi! Senang melihat beberapa wajah baru di Madrigal, dengan semua Masquerpet di sekitar. Mari kita lihat apa yang bisa kita lakukan untuk membuatmu siap menghadapi mereka.

English: This is the Armor Shop. Here, you can buy the armor crafted by my family once you meet the requirements for it. There are 4 armor slots in your inventory - Helmet, Suit, Gauntlet, and Boots.
Indonesian: Ini adalah Armor Shop. Di sini, kamu dapat membeli armor yang dibuat oleh keluargaku setelah kamu memenuhi persyaratan yang dibutuhkan. Ada 4 slot armor di inventorymu - Helmet, Suit, Gauntlet, dan Boots.

English: You'll find that different jobs and levels have access to different kinds of armor. 'Course, you probably already knew that. Now, go talk with my brother Boboku next door at his Weapon Shop.
Indonesian: Kamu akan menemukan jika pekerjaan dan level yang berbeda akan memiliki akses ke jenis armor yang berbeda pula. Tentu saja, Kau mungkin sudah tahu itu. Sekarang, bicaralah dengan saudaraku Boboku di sebelah Weapon Shop ini.

English: I know it's loud over here, but didn't you see me pointin'? Boboku's Weapon Shop is right next door!
Indonesian: Aku tahu di sini berisik, tapi tidakkah Kau melihatku menunjuk? Boboku Weapon Shop tepat di sebelah!

English: You sure? Well if you change your mind, nobody knows weapons like my brother Boboku.
Indonesian: Kamu yakin? Oke, jika Kau berubah pikiran, tak ada yang paham soal senjata melebihi saudaraku Boboku.

English: Well hello there! Good of you to stop by. Here, take this, and the next time I see ya we'll get you up to speed on weapons.
Indonesian: Oh, Halo disana! Baik sekali Kau mau mampir. Ambil ini, dan lain kali aku melihatmu, kita akan membantumu mempercepat senjatamu.

English: Visit Boboko at the Weapon Shop.
Indonesian: Kunjungi Boboko di Weapon Shop

English: Introduction to Weapons
Indonesian: Instruksi mengenai Weapon

English: Just like armor, weapons differ by the job. You don't have the experence to wield anything in my shop yet, but look around Madrigal, I'm sure you'll find something.
Indonesian: Sama seperti Armor, senjata berbeda tergantung dari Job. Kamu belum memiliki pengalaman untuk menggunakan apa pun di tokoku saat ini, tetapi melihat-lihatlah sekitar Madrigal, Aku yakin Kau akan menemukan sesuatu

English: As a Vagrant, you can use a sword in one hand and a shield in the other. Equip them by double-clicking them or dragging them into the appropriate slot in your inventory.
Indonesian: Sebagai Vagrant, Kamu dapat menggunakan pedang di satu tangan dan perisai di tangan lainnya. Kamu bisa memakainya dengan mengklik dua kali atau menyeretnya ke slot yang sesuai di inventorymu.

English: Now you're ready to look at shields. Go see Luda next door at the Shield Shop and he'll take care of you.
Indonesian: Sekarang Kamu siap untuk mencari perisai. Temui Luda di Shield Shop sebelah dan dia yang akan mengurusnya.

English: Luda's Shield Shop is just next door. Have fun, kid! Stop by anytime you need a good weapon!
Indonesian: Luda Shield Shop tepat ada disebelah. Selamat bersenang-senang, Nak! Mampirlah kapan saja jika Kau membutuhkan senjata yang bagus!

English: Look, I know it's not as exciting as axes and swords, but you'll need one just the same. Plus he's got plenty of other stuff for sale, so pay him a visit.
Indonesian: Dengar, aku tahu ini tidak semenarik kapak dan pedang, tapi kamu juga membutuhkannya. Ditambah dia punya banyak barang lain untuk dijual, jadi mampirlah ketempatnya.

English: Haha, nice to meet ya, name's Luda! I'm in charge of shields and other equipment for Vagrants here in Madrigal. Let's get you set up to fight, shall we?
Indonesian: Haha, senang bertemu denganmu, namaku Luda! Aku menyediakan perisai dan peralatan lainnya untuk Vagrant di Madrigal. Mari kita buat dirimu agar siap dalam pertarungan, oke?

English: Visit Luda at the Shield Shop.
Indonesian: Kunjungi Luda di Shield Shop

English: Introduction to Shields
Indonesian: Instruksi mengenai Shield

English: Hahaha! Welcome to the Shield Shop! You can buy shields, weapons, and armor for Vagrants here. I stock all the equipment that you need prior to your first job change at level 15.
Indonesian: Hahaha! Selamat datang di Shield Shop! Kamu bisa membeli perisai, senjata, dan armor untuk Vagrants di sini. Aku menyediakan semua peralatan yang Kamu butuhkan sebelum perubahan job pertamamu di level 15.

English: Why don't you buy a Long Sword with the Penya you've collected? You can buy it by double tapping on it or dragging it into your inventory.
Indonesian: Mengapa Kau tidak membeli Long Sword dengan Penya yang telah Kau kumpulkan? Kau dapat membelinya dengan mengkliknya dua kali atau menyeretnya ke inventorymu.

English: Also, you can sell an item by dragging it into the shop window. Pretty easy, huh? Okay, after buying it, please visit Losha at the Food Shop.
Indonesian: Juga, Kau dapat menjual item dengan menyeretnya ke shop window. Cukup mudahkan? Oke, setelah membelinya silahkan kunjungi Losha di Food Shop.

English: Losha at the Food Shop is staying in Eastern Flarine which is located to the east of here. You'll have to cross the bridge to get there.
Indonesian: Losha dari Food Shop tinggal di Eastern Flarine yang terletak di sebelah timur dari sini. Kau harus menyeberangi jembatan untuk sampai ke sana

English: What, you think it's too far? The Food Shop is very important for your journey, you should definitely check it out.
Indonesian: Apa, menurutmu itu terlalu jauh? Food Shop sangat penting untuk perjalananmu, pastikan kamu mampir kesana.

English: You are new to Madrigal, right? Hi! I have heard a lot about you already! Here, take this. It's a gift from Luda. Talk to me again for you next task!
Indonesian: Kau baru di Madrigal, kan? Hai! Aku sudah mendengar banyak tentangmu! Ambil ini. Ini pemberian dari Luda. Bicaralah padaku lagi untuk tugasmu selanjutnya!

English: You should buy a Long Sword from Luda at the Shield Shop.
Indonesian: Kamu harus membeli Long Sword dari Luda di Shield Shop.

English: Losha at the Food Shop will give me a Green Shield and 1,200 Penya when I visit her.
Indonesian: Losha di Food Shop akan memberiku Green Shield dan 1.200 Penya saat aku mengunjunginya

English: A Vagrant's First Steps (1)
Indonesian: A Vagrant's First Steps (1)

English: Hello! I am Losha and I run the Food Shop. I sell food that is helpful for when you lose your Health Points (HP). Each type of food has a different recovery power and level requirement.
Indonesian: Halo! Aku Losha, pemilik dari Food Shop. Aku menjual makanan yang berguna ketika Kamu kehilangan Health Points (HP). Setiap jenis makanan memiliki kekuatan recovery dan persyaratan level yang berbeda

English: You can eat the food by double-clicking it in your inventory. Also, you can add them to your hot keys. Please remember that once you eat food, you cannot eat again for a certain amount of time.
Indonesian: Kamu dapat memakan makanan dengan mengkliknya dua kali di inventorymu. Kamu juga dapat menambahkannya ke hot key. Harap diingat bahwa sekali Kamu makan, Kamu tidak bisa makan lagi untuk jangka waktu tertentu.

English: Now that the lesson is over it is time for some combat! There are a lot of Aibatts to the north. Please hunt 15 Small Aibatts and go back to Luda at the Shield Shop.
Indonesian: Karena pelajaran telah selesai, saatnya untuk pertempuran! Ada banyak Aibatt di utara. Silakan berburu 15 Small Aibatt dan kembali ke Luda di Shield Shop.

English: Don't be too nervous and please check your equipment again before you venture out. Oh, and don’t forget to buy some food!
Indonesian: Jangan terlalu gugup dan harap periksa kembali equipmentmu sebelum keluar. Oh, dan jangan lupa beli makanan!!!

English: This is only your first step into a larger world. Don't hesitate, go forth and defeat those Small Aibatts!
Indonesian: Ini adalah langkah pertamamu menuju ke dunia yang lebih besar. Jangan ragu, maju dan kalahkan Small Aibatts itu!

English: Great! You completed your task wonderfully! I can see that you will be very famous one day. If you talk to me again, I will give you another task which will be a little bit harder.
Indonesian: Bagus! Kamu menyelesaikan tugasmu dengan luar biasa! Aku dapat melihat kalau Kau akan menjadi sangat terkenal suatu hari nanti. Jika Kau berbicara denganku lagi, Aku akan memberimu tugas lain yang akan sedikit lebih sulit.

English: You should hunt 15 Small Aibatts. Please check in the quest window (Q Key) and return to Luda at the Shield Shop once you're finished.
Indonesian: Kamu harus berburu 15 Small Aibatt. Silakan periksa di Quest Window (Tombol Q) dan kembali ke Luda di Shield Shop setelah Kamu selesai.

English: Luda at the Shield Shop will give me 2,500 Penya when I hunt 15 Small Aibatts and return to him.
Indonesian: Luda di Shield Shop akan memberiku 2.500 Penya ketika aku berburu 15 Small Aibatt dan kembali padanya

English: A Vagrant's First Steps (2)
Indonesian: A Vagrant's First Steps (2)

English: I didn’t know that you could accomplish so much this fast! How wonderful! I have one more request for you. There are other monsters around Flarine. They are called Mushpangs.
Indonesian: Aku tidak tahu kalau kau dapat menyeledaikan begitu banyak quest secepat ini! Luar biasa! Aku punya satu quest lagi untukmu. Ada monster lain di sekitar Flarine. Mereka disebut Mushpang.

English: Please wipe them out! If you hunt 10 Small Mushpangs and 5 normal Mushpangs, I will give you a reward. Oh, and hold onto any trophies they drop, as they will be very useful in the near future!
Indonesian: Tolong musnahkan mereka! Jika Kamu berburu 10 Small Mushpang dan 5 Normal Mushpang, Aku akan memberimu hadiah. Oh, dan ambil drop yang mereka jatuhkan, karena itu akan sangat berguna dalam waktu dekat!

English: Yeah, I knew you could do this!
Indonesian: Ya, Aku tahu Kamu bisa melakukan ini!

English: Mushpangs are very easy for you to hunt! Help protect Flarine from this menace!
Indonesian: Mushpang sangatlah mudah untuk Kamu buru! Bantu lindungi Flarine dari ancaman ini!

English: It appears there is no monster that can threaten you around Flarine. It's time for you to step out into the world and show your power! Your adventure has just started!
Indonesian: Sepertinya tidak ada monster yang bisa menandingimu di sekitar Flarine. Saatnya bagimu untuk melangkah keluar ke dunia dan menunjukkan kekuatanmu! Petualangan barumu saja dimulai!

English: You didn’t hunt 15 Small Mushpang and 15 Mushpang yet.
Indonesian: Kamu masih belum berburu 15 Small Mushpang dan 15 Mushpang.

English: Luda at the Shield Shop will give me 10,000 Penya when I hunt 15 Small Mushpang and 15 Mushpang, and then return to him.
Indonesian: Luda di Shield Shop akan memberiku 10.000 Penya ketika aku berburu 15 Small Mushpang dan 15 Mushpang, lalu kembali padanya.

English: Flaris
Indonesian: Flaris

English: Saint Morning
Indonesian: Saint Morning

English: Darkon
Indonesian: Darkon

English: 1st Job Change
Indonesian: 1st Job Change

English: 2nd Job Change
Indonesian: 2nd Job Change

English: Mars Dungeon
Indonesian: Mars Dungeon

English: Laws of Aviation (1)
Indonesian: Laws of Aviation (1)

English: Hello traveler! It looks like you've reached level 20! You know what this means right? You can now fly on your very own flying device!
Indonesian: Halo Traveler! Sepertinya Kamu telah mencapai level 20! Kamu tahu apa artinya ini kan? Kamu sekarang dapat terbang dengan perangkat terbangmu sendiri!

English: Scared? Don't worry, go see the Station Manager Dior. She'll show you the ropes and get you flying in no time!
Indonesian: Takut? Jangan khawatir, kunjungi Station Manager Dior. Dia akan menunjukkan jalannya dan membuatmu terbang segera!

English: Dior is on Flarine Station. Take the elevator right in front of me. You can't miss it!
Indonesian: Dior ada di Stasiun Flarine. Gunakan elevator yang ada tepat depanku. Jangan melewatkannya!

English: You don't have to be scared. Well... if you change your mind, do let me know! I'll be right here.
Indonesian: Kamu tidak perlu takut. Ya... jika Kamu berubah pikiran, beri tahu Aku! Aku akan berada di sini

English: What's this? Is sent you? Oh! you want to know about flying on your own flying device? Why didn't you say so?
Indonesian: Kau ingin mengetahui cara mengemudikan pesawatmu? Kenapa tidak bilang dari awal?

English: Visit Dior to learn all about flying.
Indonesian: Kunjungi Dior untuk mempelajari cara untuk terbang

English: Laws of Aviation (2)
Indonesian: Laws of Aviation (2)

English: So you've finally reached level 20! This is the perfect time to learn how to operate your very own flying device.
Indonesian: Kau akhirnya mencapai level 20! Ini waktu yang tepat untuk mempelajari cara mengoperasikan flying devicemu sendiri.

English: The first thing you need to do is buy a flying device. Come back to me when you have one. I sell Boards & Brooms so take a look in my Store.
Indonesian: Hal pertama yang perlu kamu lakukan adalah membeli Flying Device. Kembali padaku saat kamu telah memilikinya. Aku menjual Boards & Brooms, silakan melihat-lihat.

English: Buy a flying device of your choice, and report back to me.
Indonesian: Belilah Flying Device sesuai pilihanmu dan melapor kembali padaku.

English: Let me know when you're ready.
Indonesian: Beritahu aku jika kamu siap.

English: You've made your choice? Great, let's get started!
Indonesian: Apa kamu telah menetukan pilhanmu? Bagus, ayo kita mulai!

English: Buy a flying device and report back to Dior.
Indonesian: Belilah Flying Device dan laporkan kembali ke Dior.

English: Laws of Aviation (3)
Indonesian: Laws of Aviation (3)

English: Now that you have your very own flying device, I'm going to assign you a test. That's right, a test! Just for fun of course. Hehe~
Indonesian: Karena sekarang kamu telah memiliki Flying Devicemu sendiri, aku akan mencoba memberimu sebuah tes. Yup benar, sebuah tes! Tentunya hanya untuk bersenang-senang. Hehe~

English: I want you to fly to the North of Saint City, and meet my associate Tina. Once you've arrived, let her know I sent you. She'll know what to do from there. I've sent countless travelers before you!
Indonesian: Aku ingin kamu terbang menuju Utara dari Saint City dan bertemu dengan rekanku Tina. Saat bertemu dengannya, bilang padanya jika aku yang mengirimmu. Dia telah tahu apa yang harus dilakukan. Aku telah mengirim banyak sekali Traveler sebelum dirimu.

English: Tina is at Saint City Station. That's the most northern part of Saint City. It's the biggest Station in Madrigal, I'm sure you won't miss it!
Indonesian: Tina ada di Saint City Station. Tempat itu terletak di bagian paling utara dari Saint City. Aku yakin kamu tidak akan kelewatan karena itu adalah Station terbesar di Madrigal.

English: Not ready yet? That's fine. Just let me know when you're up to the task.
Indonesian: Masih belum siap? Tidak apa. Beritahu saja aku saat kamu telah siap.

English: What's this? Dior sent you? Another traveler taking Diors Flying test? You're the first one in a while! Just give me a moment. I'll be with you shortly.
Indonesian: Ada apa ini? Dior mengirimmu? Traveler lain yang mengikuti tes terbang DIor? Kamu adalah yang pertama dalam beberapa saat ini! Beri aku waktu sebentar. Aku akan menemanimu setelah ini.

English: Fly to Saint City
Indonesian: Terbang menuju Saint City

English: Laws of Aviation (4)
Indonesian: Laws of Aviation (4)

English: Alright, sorry about that. I just had to finish some important paperwork. Now, where were we?
Indonesian: Baiklah. maaf soal itu. Aku harus menyelesaikan beberapa dokumen penting terlebih dahulu. Sampai di mana kita tadi?

English: *cough* ...Oh! The test, right. Sorry! To get you more familiar with your flying device, I want you to experience Air Combat! Yes, you can also fight in the air! It's very similar to regular Combat, actually.
Indonesian: *huk* ...Oh iya tes, maaf! Untuk membuatmu jadi terbiasa dengan Flying Devicemu, aku ingin kamu mencoba Air Combat! Ya, Kamu juga bisa bertarung di udara! Sederhananya, ini sangat mirip dengan Combat biasa.

English: You can even use skills in the air. Give it a try! Go and kill some of those Pesky Captain Mothbees flying near the northwestern edge of Saint City.
Indonesian: Kamu bahkan bisa menggunakan skill di udara. Cobalah! Pergi dan hajar beberapa Pesky Mothbees yang terbang di sekitar barat daya Saint City.

English: You'll find the Mothbees flying inbetween Flaris and Saint Morning. They seem to gather near the giant gears. Killing 5 should be enough. Report back to me once you're done.
Indonesian: Kamu akan mendapati Mothbees terbang antara Flaris dan Saint Morning. Mereka berkumpul di sekitar Gear besar. Cukup kalahkan 5 dari mereka dan laporkan kembali padaku setelah kamu selesai.

English: They're just bugs, they're not that scary! *sigh* Let me know when you've found enough courage.
Indonesian: Mereka hanyalah sekumpulan serangga, sama sekali tidak menakutkan! *sigh* Bilang saja padaku jika kamu telah menemukan cukup keberanian.

English: Wow impressive! You've really got a knack for this. Well done. You've passed the test!
Indonesian: Wow mengesankan! Kamu cukup berbakat untuk ini. Bagus sekali. Kamu telah lulus tesnya!

English: Kill 5 Captain Mothbees then return back to Tina.
Indonesian: Habisi 5 Captain Mothbees dan kembali ke Tina

English: Laws of Aviation (5)
Indonesian: Laws of Aviation (5)

English: Oh, back already? That was fast! You sure made quick work of those Mothbees.
Indonesian: Sudah kembali? Cepat sekali! Sepertinya kamu cukup bersemangat menghajar Mothbees itu.

English: Here, take this letter. Please deliver it to Dior in Flarine. It's a Letter of Recommendation. Once she reads it I'm sure she'll give you a reward! Hehe~
Indonesian: Ambil surat ini. Tolong kirimkan ke Dior di Flarine. Itu adalah Letter of Recommendation. Begitu dia membacanya, Aku yakin dia akan memberimu hadiah! Hehe~

English: Have a safe journey back to Flaris. See you again soon! Tell my sweetie Dior I said hi!
Indonesian: Semoga kamu kembali ke Flaris dengan selamat. Sampai jumpa lagi! Titip salamku pada Dior tersayang!

English: There's no rush. Just talk to me again when you are ready.
Indonesian: Tak perlu buru-buru. Beritahu saja aku jika kamu telah siap.

English: Welcome back traveler. What's this? A letter of recommendation? Let's see... *mumble mumble* ...wow! Passed with flying colors I see! Well done!
Indonesian: Selamat datang kembali Traveler. Apa ini? Letter of Recommendation? Coba kulihat... *bergumam* ...wow! Lulus dengan memuaskan! Bagus sekali!

English: Deliver the letter to Dior.
Indonesian: Kirimkan suratnya ke Dior.

English: Take to the Skies!
Indonesian: Terbang ke langit!

English: I knew there was something special about you. After reading this letter it seems Tina has taken a liking to you too! What does the letter say, you ask? That's a secret!
Indonesian: Aku tahu ada sesuatu yang istimewa darimu. Setelah membaca surat ini, sepertinya Tina juga tertarik padamu! Kamu tanya apa isi surat itu? rahasia!

English: Congratulations on passing the Initial Test. I'll prepare a reward. It's an experimental fuel that gives your flying device a temporary speed boost!
Indonesian: Selamat telah lulus Tes Awal. Aku akan menyiapkanmu hadiah. Ini adalah bahan bakar hasil eksperimen yang akan memberikan Flyring Devicemu peningkatan kecepatan sementara!

English: When you have time come speak to me again. I'll prepare the reward for you now.
Indonesian: Ketika Kamu punya waktu, datang dan biacaralah denganku. Aku akan menyiapkan hadiah untukmu.

English: Speak to me when you get a moment. I'll prepare the reward for you.
Indonesian: Mampirlah padaku saat kamu luang. Aku akan menyiapkan hadiahmu.

English: Your reward is ready! Here you go! Come see me again once you've gained more experience. I'm sure I'll have more "Tests" for you! *wink*
Indonesian: Hadiahmu telah siap! Ini dia! Datang menemui Aku lagi setelah Kamu mendapatkan lebih banyak experience. Aku akan meniyapkan lebih banyak "tes" untukmu! *kedip*

English: Speak with Dior to claim your reward.
Indonesian: bicaralah dengan Dior untuk klaim hadiahmu.

English: Returning Mission
Indonesian: Returning Mission

English: Menacing Phantom
Indonesian: Menacing Phantom

English: The final task awaits. Please eliminate Serus Uriel. If we don't eliminate her now while she's weakened, Flaris will be in grave danger.
Indonesian: Tugas akhir sudah menunggu. Tolong lenyapkankan Serus Uriel. Jika kita tidak melenyapkannya sekarang saat dia sedang lemah, Flaris akan berada dalam bahaya besar

English: Use the key I gave you to enter her lair. Please be careful, the monsters inside are on whole other level compared to the Guardians. It would be wise to form a party before entering her chamber.
Indonesian: Gunakan kunci yang kuberikan untuk masuk ke sarangnya. Berhati-hatilah, monster yang ada di dalam berada pada level yang sama sekali berbeda dengan Guardian. Sangatlah disarankan untuk membentuk Party sebelum memasuki sarangnya.

English: There is no time. Please rethink this through...
Indonesian: Tidak ada waktu. Tolong pikirkan ini kembali...

English: You've returned! Flaris can be at peace once again. Thank you, adventurer. Please take this as a reward. You have my gratitude.
Indonesian: Kamu telah kembali! Flaris bisa damai sekali lagi. Terima kasih, petualang. Tolong ambil ini sebagai hadiah. Aku sangat berterima kasih padamu.

English: The main thing is you are still alive. Take time to recover, and try again! You can do this!
Indonesian: Yang terpenting adalah kamu masih hidup. Istirahatlah sampai pulih dan coba lagi! Kamu pasti bisa!

English: Defeat 3 Worm Veduques and eliminate Serus Uriel. Use the Mars Dungeon key to enter her chamber.
Indonesian: Kalahkan 3 Worm Veduques dan eliminasi Serus Uriel. Gunakan kunci Mars Dungeon untuk masuk ruangannya.

English: Azria
Indonesian: Azria

English: Welcome to Azria!
Indonesian: Selamat datang di Azria!

English: Welcome to Azria, one of the coldest places in Madrigal!
Indonesian: Selamat datang di Azria, satu dari tempat terdingin di Madrigal!

English: This town is a haven in this dangerous place. Masquerpets have overrun the entire continent and made much of this land uninhabitable.
Indonesian: Kota ini adalah surga di tempat berbahaya ini. Masquerpets telah menguasai seluruh benua dan membuat sebagian besar tanah ini tidak dapat dihuni.

English: We see you have come a long way to get here. I bet it was a very dangerous journey! You must be very brave.
Indonesian: Kami melihat kamu telah menempuh perjalanan jauh untuk sampai ke sini. Aku yakin itu adalah perjalanan yang sangat berbahaya! Kamu harus sangat berani.

English: Feel free to stay as long as you need to. Go and visit Gigaka, our protector. He will help you stay safe.
Indonesian: Tinggalah selama yang kamu inginkan. Pergi dan kunjungi Gigaka, Pelindung kamu. Dia akan membantu menjagamu.

English: Welcome to Azria! (2)
Indonesian: Selamat datang di Azria! (2)

English: Azria is a dangerous place. You are lucky you made it here and lived.
Indonesian: Azria adalah tempat yang berbahaya. Kamu beruntung kamu berhasil sampai di sini dan hidup.

English: I help protect this small town. Dangerous Masquerpets are everywhere.
Indonesian: Aku membantu melindungi kota kecil ini. Masquerpet berbahaya ada di mana-mana.

English: I could use some help fighting them off. If you are interested, feel free to drop by and lend me your assistance.
Indonesian: Aku bisa menggunakan bantuan untuk melawan mereka. Jika kamu tertarik, jangan ragu untuk mampir dan meminjamkanku bantuanmu.

English: Stay within this town and you will be safe from harm. Go and visit Mawrang. He is the oldest and wisest of us all. He will help you survive out in the cold.
Indonesian: Tetap di dalam kota ini dan Kamu akan aman dari bahaya. Pergi dan kunjungi Mawrang. Dia adalah yang tertua dan paling bijaksana dari kita semua. Dia akan membantumu bertahan hidup dalam cuaca dingin.

English: Go and visit Mawrang. He is the oldest and wisest of us all. He will help you survive out in the cold.
Indonesian: Pergi dan kunjungi Mawrang. Dia adalah yang tertua dan paling bijaksana dari kita semua. Dia akan membantumu bertahan hidup dalam cuaca dingin.

English: Welcome, brave warrior. I hope this town serves as your safe haven during your perilous journey here.
Indonesian: Selamat datang, pejuang pemberani. Aku harap kota ini berfungsi sebagai tempat aman bagi selama perjalanan berbahaya kamu di sini.

English: This town could really use your help. We are surrounded in every corner of this continent.
Indonesian: Kota ini benar-benar membutuhkan bantuanmu. Kami terkepung di setiap sudut benua ini.

English: Our people have a lot of hope, but I fear the threat grows stronger and stronger every day.
Indonesian: Orang-orang kami memiliki banyak harapan, tetapi aku khawatir ancaman itu tumbuh semakin kuat setiap hari.

English: We thank you for your help. I hope our hospitality suffices for your needs.
Indonesian: Kami berterima kasih atas bantuan anda. Saya harap keramahan kami sesuai dengan keinginan anda.

English: Old Machinery
Indonesian: Old Machinery

English: So you want to help me fight off masquerpets, huh? Good.
Indonesian: Jadi kamu ingin membantuku melawan masquerpet? Bagus.

English: The entrance to Azria was once an industrious place. It is now overrun by ancient machines. Help me bring down their numbers so other travelers may enter this place more safely.
Indonesian: Pintu masuk ke Azria dulunya merupakan tempat yang rajin. Sekarang dikuasai oleh mesin kuno. Bantu saya menurunkan nomor mereka sehingga wisatawan lain dapat memasuki tempat ini dengan lebih aman.

English: Will you help me?
Indonesian: Maukah kamu menolongku?

English: Good. Get going then. The fighting never stops.
Indonesian: Bagus. Segeralah pergi. Pertempuran tidak pernah berhenti.

English: Come back when you think you are ready.
Indonesian: Kembalilah ketika kamu merasa sudah siap.

English: It appears your efforts were a success. Thank you.
Indonesian: Tampaknya upayamu berhasil. Terima kasih.

English: Not enough monsters have been defeated, unfortunately. You must go back and fight.
Indonesian: Sayangnya, tidak cukup banyak monster yang dikalahkan. Kamu harus kembali dan bertarung.

English: Squash the Sasquatch!
Indonesian: Remukkan Sasquatch!

English: We meet again, traveler. We need more help. Rumor has it that the Yetti are becoming more aggressive towards humans. We can't allow this to continue happening.
Indonesian: Kita bertemu lagi, musafir. Kami membutuhkan lebih banyak bantuan. Rumor mengatakan bahwa Yetti menjadi lebih agresif terhadap manusia. Kami tidak bisa membiarkan ini terus terjadi.

English: Will you lend me a hand once more, traveler?
Indonesian: Maukah kamu membantu saya sekali lagi, traveler?

English: Please defeat 70 Yetti and 55 Mutant Yetti and return to me as soon as you're finished.
Indonesian: Tolong kalahkan 70 Yetti dan 55 Mutant Yetti dan kembali padaku segera setelah kamu selesai.

English: Town Fortification
Indonesian: Town Fortification

English: It seems as though the masquerpets are a greater threat than I thought. We will need to fortify our town as soon as possible.
Indonesian: Sepertinya topeng adalah ancaman yang lebih besar dari yang kukira. Kita perlu membentengi kota kita secepat mungkin.

English: Bring us some wood and stone. We can make good use of it and reinforce our buildings and fences.
Indonesian: Bawakan kami kayu dan batu. Kita dapat memanfaatkannya dengan baik dan memperkuat bangunan dan pagar kita.

English: Please bring back 20 Wood & 20 Stone. You can obtain the Wood from most kinds of Yetti and Stone from most kinds of Augu.
Indonesian: Tolong bawa kembali 20 Wood & 20 Stone. Kamu dapat memperoleh Wood dari sebagian besar jenis Yetti dan Stone dari sebagian besar jenis Augu.

English: That will not be enough, sadly!
Indonesian: Itu tidak akan cukup, sayangnya!

English: Thank you so much! We will put these materials to good use.
Indonesian: Terima kasih banyak! Kami akan menggunakan bahan-bahan ini dengan baik.

English: Now our town is stronger than ever! Unfortunately, we are still lacking a lot of resources.
Indonesian: Sekarang kota kami lebih kuat dari sebelumnya! Sayangnya, kami masih kekurangan banyak sumber daya.

English: Azria used to have a field of crystals that we would use for energy and magic, but these have been devoured by a crazed Augu that has gone absolutely mad.
Indonesian: Azria dulu memiliki bidang kristal yang akan kita gunakan untuk energi dan sihir, tetapi ini telah dimakan oleh Augu gila yang benar-benar gila.

English: The Glacial Augu is now overpowered from all of this crystal essence and has become nearly unstoppable. Can you help us defeat it and retrieve its crystal essence?
Indonesian: The Glacial Augu sekarang dikuasai dari semua crystal essence ini dan telah menjadi hampir tak terbendung. Bisakah kamu membantu kami mengalahkannya dan mengambil esensi kristalnya?

English: Good luck!
Indonesian: Semoga beruntung!

English: I understand. It's a difficult task. I will wait for you to get stronger.
Indonesian: Aku mengerti. Ini adalah tugas yang sulit. Aku akan menunggumu menjadi lebih kuat.

English: The Frosty Beast
Indonesian: The Frosty Beast

English: Amazing! And you did that all by yourself I bet!
Indonesian: Luar biasa! Dan aku yakin kamu melakukannya sendiri!

English: Keep trying! I believe in you!
Indonesian: Teruslah mencoba! Aku percaya padamu!

English: Now that we have all of this crystal essence, we can enforce our town and create a magical barrier that no monster, Violet or not, can ever break through.
Indonesian: Sekarang setelah kita memiliki semua esensi kristal ini, kita dapat menegakkan kota kita dan menciptakan penghalang ajaib yang tidak dapat ditembus oleh monster, Violet atau bukan.

English: We thank you for all of your help! Stay safe out there.
Indonesian: Kami berterima kasih atas semua bantuan kamu! Tetap aman di luar sana.

English: Lost Souls
Indonesian: Lost Souls

English: While we may be safe for now thanks to your help, the armies of Shade are advancing.
Indonesian: Sementara kami mungkin aman untuk saat ini berkat bantuan kamu, pasukan Shade maju.

English: Shade is summoning the very dead to fight against us. Ghosts of the forgotten rulers have completely taken over the old ruins of Azria.
Indonesian: Shade memanggil undead untuk melawan kita. Ghosts of the forgotten rulers telah sepenuhnya mengambil alih ruins of Azria.

English: Bring Mawrang some of their remains so they can be studied. Maybe we can learn something.
Indonesian: Bawa Mawrang beberapa dari sisa-sisa mereka sehingga mereka dapat dipelajari. Mungkin kita bisa belajar sesuatu.

English: Hm... yes... That is interesting.
Indonesian: Hm... ya... Itu cukup menarik..

English: That may not be enough, hm.
Indonesian: Itu mungkin tidak cukup, hm.

English: Overlord
Indonesian: Overlord

English: There is very dark and evil power behind these masquerpets. I fear my suspicions are correct.
Indonesian: Ada kekuatan yang sangat gelap dan jahat di balik masquerpet ini. Aku takut kecurigaanku benar.

English: Some of these masquerpets are being empowered by giant variants. This gives them enough power to break through our barrier!
Indonesian: Beberapa dari topeng ini sedang diberdayakan oleh varian raksasa. Ini memberi mereka kekuatan yang cukup untuk menembus penghalang kita!

English: We must defeat these giants at once!
Indonesian: Kita harus mengalahkan raksasa ini sekaligus!

English: Hurry! We do not have much time left.
Indonesian: Cepat! Kita tidak punya banyak waktu lagi.

English: Very unfortunate...
Indonesian: Sangat disayangkan...

English: That was a close call. Thank you.
Indonesian: Itu tadi hampir saja. Terima kasih.

English: We must defeat more than that.
Indonesian: Kita harus mengalahkan lebih dari itu.

English: Our barrier is safe for now, but there appears to be another army approaching much closer now. This one is a far graver threat than any we have ever faced.
Indonesian: Penghalang kita aman untuk saat ini, tetapi tampaknya ada pasukan lain yang mendekat lebih dekat sekarang. Yang ini adalah ancaman yang jauh lebih parah daripada yang pernah kita hadapi.

English: We must prepare for this battle. Speak to Auxilior as soon as possible.
Indonesian: Kita harus bersiap untuk pertempuran ini. Bicaralah dengan Auxilior sesegera mungkin.

English: There is no time to waste. We must strengthen our magic barrier and gather materials. Slay some Augu and gather what little Crystal Essence they may have shared from the Glacial Augu.
Indonesian: Tidak ada waktu untuk di sia-siakan. Kita harus memperkuat penghalang sihir kita dan mengumpulkan material. Bunuh beberapa Augu dan kumpulkan Crystal Essence kecil yang mungkin telah mereka bagikan dari Glacial Augu.

English: Once you do, bring us a hammer from a Lord Yetti. This is a formidable weapon that we can use to defend ourselves.
Indonesian: Once you do, bring us a hammer from a Lord Yetti. This is a formidable weapon that we can use to defend ourselves.

English: Prepare for Battle! (1)
Indonesian: Bersiap untuk Battle! (1)

English: Let's go then.
Indonesian: Ayo pergi.

English: It's time to face off against the Mammoths. The most fearsome and terrible creature I have ever laid my eyes upon in this place.
Indonesian: Saatnya untuk menghadapi Mammoth. Makhluk paling menakutkan dan mengerikan yang pernah saya lihat di tempat ini.

English: This will not be an easy battle. May Rhisis be with you.
Indonesian: Ini tidak akan menjadi pertempuran yang mudah. Semoga Risis bersamamu.

English: Kill 100 Cannibal Mammoths and last but not least, the Lord Mammoth.
Indonesian: Kill 100 Cannibal Mammoths and last but not least, the Lord Mammoth.

English: You are truly a great warrior and an even greater friend. We owe our lives to you.
Indonesian: Anda benar-benar pejuang yang hebat dan teman yang lebih hebat lagi. Kami berutang hidup kami kepada Anda.

English: We must battle on. I believe in you.
Indonesian: Kita harus terus berjuang. Aku percaya padamu.

English: We are safe now. I know this may not be much, but take this as a sign of our appreciation. You will always be remembered here.
Indonesian: Kami aman sekarang. Aku tahu ini mungkin tidak banyak, tetapi anggap ini sebagai tanda terima kasih kami. Kamu akan selalu dikenang di sini.

English: Prepare for Battle! (2)
Indonesian: Bersiap untuk Battle! (2)

English: Slay Augu and gather Crystal Essence. Also obtain a hammer from a Lord Yetti.
Indonesian: Slay Augu and gather Crystal Essence. Also obtain a hammer from a Lord Yetti.

English: Raising Pets 1 (Egg -> F Tier)
Indonesian: Raising Pets 1 (Egg -> F Tier)

English: Nice egg, stranger. I'm sure you're wondering what kind of pet you'll get from it. Well, don't get too far ahead of yourself now. I can't guarantee you're going to be able to hatch it.
Indonesian: Telur yang bagus, orang asing. Saya yakin kamu bertanya-tanya hewan peliharaan seperti apa yang akan kamu dapatkan darinya. Nah, jangan terlalu jauh di depan diri sendiri sekarang. Saya tidak bisa menjamin kamu akan bisa menetaskannya.

English: However, if you really take care of the egg there shouldn't be a problem. All you need to do is get the egg's experience (EXP) to 99.99% and then bring it back to me. Think you can do that?
Indonesian: Namun, jika kamu benar-benar merawat telurnya seharusnya tidak menjadi masalah. Yang perlu dilakukan adalah mendapatkan egg experience (EXP) menjadi 99,99% dan kemudian mengembalikannya kepadaku. Bisakah kamu melakukan itu?

English: Sounds good! Alright, listen. In order to bring your egg's experience to full, you're going to need to feed it while it's summoned. Find yourself some Pet Candy (F) and get started!
Indonesian: Kedengarannya bagus! Baiklah, dengarkan. Untuk meningkatkan EXP telur sampai penuh, Kamu harus memberinya makan saat dipanggil. Temukan Pet Candy (F) dan mulailah!

English: Well that's a shame. I can't say I'm surprised, though. From the looks of you, you probably couldn't even keep a cactus alive.
Indonesian: Nah itu memalukan. meskipun aku tidak bisa mengatakan kalau aku terkejut. Dari penampilanmu, kamu mungkin bahkan tidak bisa memelihara kaktus.

English: Great job with the egg, stranger! Tell you what, I'll take over from here. It's hatching time!
Indonesian: Kerja bagus dengan telurnya, orang asing! Kamu tahu, aku akan mengambil alih dari sini. Saatnya menetas!

English: You're going to need to get your egg's experience to 99.99% in order for me to hatch it for you. Feel free to stop by again once you've done this!
Indonesian: Kamu perlu untuk membuat EXP dari telur itu menjadi 99,99% agar aku dapat menetaskannya. Kmebalilah kapanpun kamu selesai melakukan itu!

English: The Pet Tamer has asked you to feed your egg some Pet Candy until it reaches 99.99% EXP. Once you've done that, return to him and he will hatch it for you!
Indonesian: Pet Tamer memintamu untuk memberi makan telur dengan Pet Candy sampai mencapai 99,99% EXP. Setelah kamu melakukan itu, kembali padanya dan dia akan menetaskannya untukmu!

English: Raising Pets 2 (F Tier -> E Tier)
Indonesian: Raising Pets 2 (F Tier -> E Tier)

English: Now that you're pet has been hatched, it will increase specific character statistics (Stat Points) depending on the type of pet you have summoned. Every pet type affects a specific character statistic.
Indonesian: Sekarang setelah hewan peliharaan Anda menetas, itu akan meningkatkan statistik karakter tertentu (Stat Points) tergantung pada jenis hewan peliharaan yang Anda panggil. Setiap jenis hewan peliharaan mempengaruhi statistik karakter tertentu.

English: Feed your pet the appropriate Pet Candy and it will gain experience. If you bring your pet's experience to 99.99% again, I'll upgrade it! How does that sound?
Indonesian: Beri makan hewan peliharaanm Pet Candy yang sesuai dan itu akan mendapatkan pengalaman. Jika kamu membawa pengalaman hewan peliharaanmu ke 99,99% lagi, saya akan meningkatkannya! Bagaimana itu terdengar?

English: If your pet's energy runs out, it can't help you. When it's energy gets low, you better feed it to keep the bonuses! Now, go and spend some time with your pet! Come back when you've gained enough experience.
Indonesian: Jika energi hewan peliharaanmu habis, itu tidak dapat membantumu. Saat energinya berkurang, kamu sebaiknya memberinya makan untuk menyimpan bonus! Sekarang, pergi dan habiskan waktu dengan hewan peliharaanmu! Kembalilah ketika kamu sudah mendapatkan cukup pengalaman.

English: Really? You're not interested in advancing your pet's abilities? Fine, have it your way. What a shame…
Indonesian: Sungguh? Kamu tidak tertarik untuk menaikkan abiliti pet kamu? Tak apa, lakukan sesukamu. Sayang sekali…

English: Great job with your pet, my friend! I'll take it from here!
Indonesian: Kerja bagus dengan hewan pet kamu kawan! Aku akan mengambil alihnya dari sini!

English: You need to spend more time with your pet. It hasn't acquired enough experience to be upgraded yet. Stop back by when his experience reaches 99.99%!
Indonesian: Anda perlu menghabiskan lebih banyak waktu dengan hewan peliharaan Anda. Itu belum memperoleh pengalaman yang cukup untuk ditingkatkan. Mampirlah ketika pengalamannya mencapai 99,99%!

English: Bring your pet's experience to 99.99% and the Pet Tamer will upgrade it for you!
Indonesian: Naikkan pet EXp sampai 99,99% dan Pet Tamer akan mengupgradenya untukmu!

English: Raising Pets 3 (E Tier -> D Tier)
Indonesian: Raising Pets 3 (E Tier -> D Tier)

English: The higher the level granted for a particular tier (F, E, D, C, B, A or S), the higher the affected character statistic will be. The level granted is always random. Cool huh?
Indonesian: Semakin tinggi level yang diberikan untuk tier tertentu (F, E, D, C, B, A atau S), semakin tinggi statistik karakter yang terpengaruh. Level yang diberikan selalu acak. Keren ya?

English: E Tier Pets such as this one have 2 levels available (1 - 2) and you achieved a random level during the last upgrade. Will you see me when your pet reaches 99.99% experience again?
Indonesian: E Tier Pet seperti ini memiliki 2 level yang tersedia (1 - 2) dan kamu mencapai level acak selama peningkatan terakhir. Maukah kamu menemuiku ketika pet mencapai EXP 99,99% lagi?

English: Great! I'll see you when you get back. Good luck, and don't forget to feed your pet!
Indonesian: Besar! Temui aku saaat kamu kembali. Semoga berhasil, dan jangan lupa memberi makan pet kamu!

English: Don't give up now, you're doing such a great job!
Indonesian: Jangan menyerah sekarang, Kamu melakukan pekerjaan yang hebat!

English: The two of you are becoming stronger together, and it looks like you guys have become pretty good friends in the process. Excellent! I will upgrade your pet to D tier now!
Indonesian: Kalian berdua menjadi lebih kuat bersama, dan sepertinya kalian telah menjadi teman yang cukup baik. Bagus sekali! Aku akan mengupgrade pet yang kamu miliki ke tingkat D sekarang!

English: Stop back by when your pet reaches 99.99% experience.
Indonesian: Mampirlah kembali saat pet kamu mencapai 99,99% exp.

English: Raising Pets 4 (D Tier -> C Tier)
Indonesian: Raising Pets 4 (D Tier -> C Tier)

English: Excellent job raising your pet so far, my friend. You two certainly look happy together!
Indonesian: Pekerjaan yang baik berhasil membesarkan pet kamu sejauh ini kawan. Kalian berdua terlihat bahagia saat bersama!

English: I'm sure you've noticed by now that the higher the level granted for a particular tier, the higher the benefit to your Stats.
Indonesian: Aku yakin kamu telah menyadari bahwa semakin tinggi level yang diberikan tier tertentu, semakin tinggi manfaaatnya pada stats kamu.

English: No pain, no gain. I'm sure you know the drill by now. Bring the experience of your pet to 99.99% and bring it back to me. I will upgrade it when your done.
Indonesian: Tanpa usaha tak akan ada hasil. Aku yakin kamu sudah cukup paham sekarang. Naikkan EXP pet menjadi 99,99% lalu. Aku akan mengupgradenya..

English: The two of you are becoming stronger together, and it looks like you guys have become pretty good friends in the process. Excellent! I will upgrade your pet to C tier now!
Indonesian: Kalian berdua menjadi lebih kuat bersama, dan sepertinya kalian telah menjadi teman yang baik. Bagus sekali! Aku akan mengupgrade pet yang kamu miliki ke tingkat C sekarang!

English: Not quite there… your pet needs more experience. I'm sure you already knew that.
Indonesian: Masih belum cukup... Pet kamu membutuhkan lebih banyak EXP. Aku yakin Kamu sudah mengetahuinya.

English: Raising Pets 5 (C Tier -> B Tier)
Indonesian: Raising Pets 5 (C Tier -> B Tier)

English: I can see that you and your pet have been through a great deal together. You're almost there!
Indonesian: Aku dapat melihat kalau kamu dan petmu telah melalui banyak hal bersama. Kamu hampir sampai!

English: I'll upgrade your pet to *S level* using magic handed down through my family. All you have to do is get the experience of your pet to 99.99%. You've done it before, will you do it the one last time?
Indonesian: Aku akan meningkatkan petmu ke * level S * menggunakan sihir yang diturunkan melalui keluargaku. Yang harus kamu lakukan adalah mendapatkan pet experience hingga 99,99%. Kamu telah melakukannya sebelumnya, apakah kamu akan melakukannya untuk terakhir kalinya?

English: I knew you would. It looks like both you and your pet are ready to begin.
Indonesian: Aku tahu kamu dapat melakukannya. Sepertinya Kamu dan pet kamu siap untuk memulai.

English: Does this mean you are giving up on your pet?
Indonesian: Apakah ini berarti Anda menyerah pada pet kamu?

English: Congratulations! As long as you have your pet, you will never be alone. Your pet seems to be very happy, you've done a great job. Now allow me to apply the final upgrade!
Indonesian: Selamat! Selama kamu memiliki pet, kamu tidak akan pernah sendirian. Petmu tampaknya sangat bahagia, Kamu telah merawatnya dengan baik. Sekarang izinkan aku untuk melakukan upgrade terakhir!

English: You are so close to getting your pet to its ultimate level. Do not give up now.
Indonesian: Kamu sangat dekat untuk membawa pet kamu ke level tertingginya. Jangan menyerah sekarang.

English: Raising Pets 6 (B Tier -> A Tier)
Indonesian: Raising Pets 6 (B Tier -> A Tier)

English: The two of you are becoming stronger together, and it looks like you guys have become pretty good friends in the process. Excellent! I will upgrade your pet to B tier now!
Indonesian: Kalian berdua menjadi lebih kuat bersama, dan sepertinya kalian telah menjadi teman yang baik. Bagus sekali! Aku akan mengupgrade pet yang kamu miliki ke tingkat B sekarang!

English: Raising Pets 7 (A Tier -> S Tier)
Indonesian: Raising Pets 7 (A Tier -> S Tier)

English: The two of you are becoming stronger together, and it looks like you guys have become pretty good friends in the process. Excellent! I will upgrade your pet to A tier now!
Indonesian: Kalian berdua menjadi lebih kuat bersama, dan sepertinya kalian telah menjadi teman yang baik. Bagus sekali! Aku akan mengupgrade pet yang kamu miliki ke tingkat A sekarang!

English: Volkane
Indonesian: Volkane

English: Finding the Guardians
Indonesian: Finding the Guardians

English: A great terror lies within this volcano. A cataclysmic maelstrom is said to have erupted this volcano and carved out these caverns.
Indonesian: Sebuah teror besar terletak di dalam gunung berapi ini. Sebuah pusaran dahsyat dikatakan telah meletuskan gunung berapi ini dan mengukir gua-gua ini.

English: The Red Meteonyker is one of the most dangerous Masquerpets in all of Madrigal. As a fearsome creation of Shade, I do not know of many who have survived his fiery breath. This abomination has been sealed away for many ages.
Indonesian: Red Meteonyker adalah Masquerpet paling berbahaya di sleuruh Madrigal. Ciptaan Shade yang menakutkan. Tidak banyak orang yang selamat dari semburan apinya. Makhluk keji ini telah disegel selama berabad-abad

English: Many adventurers like yourself who battle Masquerpets in Darkon are unaware of the grave danger that lies below them. The walls are giving way and the Red Meteonyker may not be tempered much longer.
Indonesian: Banyak petualang seperti anda yang melawan Masquerpets di Darkon tidak menyadari bahaya besar yang ada di bawah mereka. Dindingnya memberi jalan dan Red Meteonyker mungkin tidak akan marah lebih lama lagi.

English: You think you can face the Red Meteonyker? I do not wish such a grim fate on anyone. However... you have survived the horrors of Darkon, so you must be very strong. Maybe I am being too skeptical. There may be some hope after all.
Indonesian: Kamu pikir bisa menghadapi Red Meteonyker? Aku tidak berharap nasib buruk seperti itu pada siapa pun. Namun... kamu telah selamat dari kengerian Darkon, jadi kamu pasti sangat kuat. Mungkin saya terlalu skeptis. Mungkin ada beberapa harapan setelah semua.

English: Many of us guardians were annihilated when sealing the Red Meteonyker away. Only three of us are left, and each of us holds a piece of the key needed to enter the lair of the Red Meteonyker. You must find them and obtain each piece.
Indonesian: Banyak dari kami para penjaga dimusnahkan saat menyegel Red Meteonyker. Hanya kami bertiga yang tersisa, dan masing-masing dari kami memegang sepotong kunci yang dibutuhkan untuk memasuki sarang Red Meteonyker. Kamu harus menemukan mereka dan mendapatkan setiap bagian.

English: Can you help me find my long-lost guardian allies and defeat the Red Meteonyker once and for all?
Indonesian: Bisakah kamu membantuku menemukan sekutu penjagaku yang telah lama hilang dan mengalahkan Red Meteonyker untuk selamanya?

English: Very well. Here is the first piece of the key. There are threats in this cavern other than the Red Meteonyker. Good luck.
Indonesian: Baik. Inilah bagian pertama dari kuncinya. Ada ancaman di gua ini selain Red Meteonyker. Semoga beruntung.

English: Wise decision. Stay safe, traveler.
Indonesian: Keputusan yang bijaksana. Jaga diri, traveler.

English: You have not found any guardians yet? That is fine. We will find them eventually.
Indonesian: Kamu masih belum menemukan guardian? Tidak apa-apa. Kita akan menemukan mereka pada akhirnya nanti.

English: Find Obnis.
Indonesian: Temukan Obnis.

English: Kumah is alive? I see. And I see you have one of the three pieces of the key with you. You must be fearless for wanting to face the Red Meteonyker alone.
Indonesian: Kumah masih hidup? Aku mengerti. Dan melihat kamu memiliki salah satu dari tiga buah kunci itu. Kamu harus berani karena ingin menghadapi Red Meteonyker sendirian.

English: As Kumah may have told you, our power is not as strong as it once was. This place takes a toll on your strength.
Indonesian: Seperti yang Kumah katakan padamu, kekuatan kami tidak sekuat dulu. Tempat ini membebani kekuatan kita.

English: I have unfortunately been trapped in this spot for a while. I can take on Meteonykers, but some powerful Berserk Meteonykers have been swarming the place in search of us guardians.
Indonesian: Sayangnya saya telah terjebak di tempat ini untuk sementara waktu. Saya dapat menghadapi Meteonykers, tetapi beberapa Berserk Meteonykers yang kuat telah mengerumuni tempat itu untuk mencari kami para penjaga.

English: Can you help me escape? In return, I will give you the second piece of the key you will need to enter the lair of the Red Meteonyker.
Indonesian: Bisakah kamu membantuku melarikan diri? Sebagai imbalannya, aku akan memberimu bagian kedua dari kunci yang kau perlukan untuk memasuki sarang Red Meteonyker.

English: Why thank you, kind stranger. I will wait here for you.
Indonesian: Terima kasih, orang asing yang baik hati. Aku akan menunggumu disini.

English: Hmph. I'll just give up then...
Indonesian: Hmph. aku akan menyerah kalau begitu...

English: I knew I could count on you!
Indonesian: Aku tahu aku dapat mengandalkanmu!

English: My dear traveler, there are still too many Berserk Meteonykers!
Indonesian: Traveler tersayang, masih terlalu banyak Berserk Meteonyker!

English: Finding the Guardians (2)
Indonesian: Finding the Guardians (2)

English: Finding the Guardians (3)
Indonesian: Finding the Guardians (3)

English: Test of Strength
Indonesian: Test of Strength

English: Kill 3 Berserk Meteonykers
Indonesian: Kalahkan 3 Berserk Meteonykers

English: There is only one piece left, in the hands of our fellow guardian Airon. She is stubborn though, and you might need to convince her... if you can find her.
Indonesian: Hanya ada satu bagian yang tersisa, di tangan rekan Guardian kita, Airon. Dia keras kepala, dan kamu mungkin perlu meyakinkannya... jika kamu bisa menemukannya.

English: The other two guardians may still be alive, but you are foolish to come here. Nobody is strong enough to face the Red Meteonyker.
Indonesian: Dua guardian lainnya mungkin masih hidup, tetapi kamu bodoh datang ke sini. Tidak ada yang cukup kuat untuk menghadapi Red Meteonyker.

English: Kumah spoke to you? That's okay. He has too much faith in people. I'm a bit of a skeptic. Nothing has ever gone right in this terrible place for us.
Indonesian: Kumah berbicara kepadamu? Enggak apa-apa. Dia memiliki terlalu banyak kepercayaan pada orang-orang. Saya sedikit skeptis. Tidak ada yang pernah berjalan dengan benar di tempat yang mengerikan ini bagi kita.

English: Show me a convincing display of your strength. This chamber is filled with Katamaws, a ferocious beast that cannot be tamed. Kill 70 of them and I may consider trusting your abilities.
Indonesian: Tunjukkan padaku tampilan yang meyakinkan dari kekuatanmu. Ruangan ini dipenuhi dengan Katamaws, Makhluk buas yang tidak bisa dijinakkan. Habisi 70 dari mereka dan aku mungkin mempertimbangkan untuk mempercayai kemampuanmu.

English: Go on then.
Indonesian: Pergilah kalau begitu.

English: You surprise me. I was wrong about you.
Indonesian: Kamu mengejutkanku. Aku telah salah menilaimu.

English: That's not nearly enough.
Indonesian: Itu tidak cukup.

English: I kept my word. You now have all three pieces of the key.
Indonesian: Aku menjaga kata-kataku. Kamu sekarang memiliki ketiga bagian kunci.

English: In order to merge them and unlock the entrance to the Red Meteonyker, you must find a guardian forger.
Indonesian: Untuk menggabungkan mereka dan membuka kunci pintu masuk ke Red Meteonyker, Kamuharus menemukan Guardian forger.

English: Most were wiped out long ago. You must find any survivors and bring the key together once again.
Indonesian: Sebagian besar telah dimusnahkan sejak lama. Kamu harus menemukan yang selamat dan menyatukan kuncinya sekali lagi.

English: What brings you here?
Indonesian: Apa yang membawamu kesini?

English: Airon sent you? And I see you have all three pieces of the key. Then there is no time to waste.
Indonesian: Airon mengirimmu? Aku lihat kamu memiliki ketiga bagian kunci. Tidak ada waktu untuk disia-siakan.

English: I can reforge the key for you, but I require a lot of life source to do so.
Indonesian: Aku dapat reforge kunci untuk kamu, tetapi aku membutuhkan banyak sumber kehidupan untuk melakukannya.

English: Ever since the Red Meteonyker has been wreaking havoc in his chamber, the armies of Shade have swarmed this place. Cyclops X are everywhere, and the entrance is now kept by undead guardians.
Indonesian: Sejak Red Meteonyker membuat kekacauan di kamarnya, pasukan Shade telah mengerumuni tempat ini. Cyclops X ada di mana-mana, dan pintu masuknya sekarang dijaga oleh penjaga mayat hidup.

English: Weaken the armies of the Cyclops X and defeat their lieutenant to obtain one of their life gems and bring it to me.
Indonesian: Lemahkan pasukan Cyclops X dan kalahkan letnan mereka untuk mendapatkan salah satu permata kehidupan mereka dan membawanya kepadaku.

English: Now stand back as I forge the key.
Indonesian: Sekarang mundurlah, aku akan menempa kuncinya.

English: This is no time to play games. Go now and finish the task. We must hurry!
Indonesian: Ini bukan waktunya untuk bermain-main. Pergi sekarang dan selesaikan tugas. Kita harus cepat!

English: I can't believe it. You achieved the impossible.
Indonesian: Aku tidak percaya. Kamu mencapai hal yang mustahil.

English: Why are you still here? You must defeat the Red Meteonyker!
Indonesian: Kenapa kamu masih disini? Anda harus mengalahkan Red Meteonyker!

English: I would say your victory calls for a celebration, but the armies of Shade are still here. There is a lot left to do in this forsaken place.
Indonesian: Aku akan mengatakan kemenanganmu membutuhkan perayaan, tetapi pasukan Shade masih di sini. Masih banyak yang harus dilakukan di tempat yang ditinggalkan ini.

English: You are a lot more powerful than I thought you were. I am sure the other guardians are proud of your victory. I know I am. Thank you.
Indonesian: Kamu jauh lebih kuat dari yang aku kira. Aku yakin para guardian lainnya juga bangga dengan kemenanganmu. Terima kasih.

English: The Red Meteonyker
Indonesian: The Red Meteonyker

English: Here it is. The key has been reforged just as planned. Quickly now, go and defeat the Red Meteonyker before it's too late! You must fight through the hoard of undead guardians. Good luck.
Indonesian: Ini dia. Kuncinya telah ditempa ulang seperti yang direncanakan. Cepat sekarang, pergi dan kalahkan Red Meteonyker sebelum terlambat! Kamu harus berjuang melalui timbunan penjaga mayat hidup. Semoga beruntung.

English: I can't believe it. You achieved the impossible.
Indonesian: Aku tidak percaya. Kamu mencapai hal yang mustahil.

English: Quickly now, go and defeat the Red Meteonyker before it's too late! You must fight through the hoard of undead guardians. Good luck.
Indonesian: Cepat sekarang, pergi dan kalahkan Red Meteonyker sebelum terlambat! Kamu harus berjuang melalui kerumunan undead guardian. Semoga beruntung.

English: Defeat the Red Meteonyker!
Indonesian: Defeat the Red Meteonyker!

English: Master
Indonesian: Master

English: Master Grade (1)
Indonesian: Master Grade (1)

English: Reach level 70
Indonesian: Reach level 70

English: Do you really think you’re the strongest? You’re wrong. You can be stronger! Listen... What if I told you that you could... relive certain moments of your life? It would be crazy, wouldn’t it?
Indonesian: Apakah Anda benar-benar berpikir Anda yang terkuat? Anda salah. Anda bisa menjadi lebih kuat! Dengar... Bagaimana jika aku memberitahumu bahwa kamu bisa... menghidupkan kembali momen-momen tertentu dalam hidupmu? Itu akan gila, bukan?

English: I have a proposal for you. I take a few levels from you, of course temporarily, and you will accomplish a task for me. What do you have to gain? Everything!
Indonesian: Saya punya proposal untuk Anda. Saya mengambil beberapa level dari Anda, tentu saja untuk sementara, dan Anda akan menyelesaikan tugas untuk saya. Apa yang harus Anda dapatkan? Semuanya!

English: I’m bringing you down to level 60, and when you get to level 70, come back to me! I’ll give you back your previous levels with a little gift.
Indonesian: Saya menurunkan Anda ke level 60, dan saat Anda mencapai level 70, kembalilah ke saya! Saya akan mengembalikan level Anda sebelumnya dengan hadiah kecil.

English: Be careful though, your experience will be halved for the duration of this short mission!
Indonesian: Berhati-hatilah, pengalaman Anda akan berkurang setengahnya selama durasi misi singkat ini!

English: Obviously, if you change your mind, you can abandon the quest at any time through your quest window and I will give you back your levels, of course!
Indonesian: Jelas, jika Anda berubah pikiran, Anda dapat meninggalkan pencarian kapan saja melalui jendela pencarian Anda dan saya akan mengembalikan level Anda, tentunya!

English: So, what do you think?
Indonesian: Jadi apa yang kamu pikirkan?

English: Perfect! I've taken your levels, come back to me when you reach the goal of our arrangement!
Indonesian: Sempurna! Aku telah mengambil levelmu, kembalilah kepadaku ketika kamu telah mencapai tujuan dari kesepakatan kita!

English: Oh I see... you’re probably too weak.
Indonesian: Oh begitu... mungkin kamu terlalu lemah.

English: Wonderful! So I give you back your levels, and the little gift with it! Thank you for your help and see you soon!
Indonesian: Luar biasa! Jadi aku mengembalikan levelmu, dan juga hadiah kecil bersamanya! Terima kasih atas bantuanmu dan sampai jumpa lagi!

English: You haven’t been able to complete our arrangement? Too bad, others will!
Indonesian: Kamu belum bisa menyelesaikan perjanjian kita? Sayang sekali, orang lainlah yang akan melakukannya!

English: Master Grade (2)
Indonesian: Master Grade (2)

English: Here you are again!? The last time was too easy... What if we put it back but a notch up?
Indonesian: Kamu kembali lagi!? Terakhir kali masih terlalu mudah .. Bagaimana jika kita memasangnya kembali tetapi dengan sedikit tambahan?

English: Like last time, I take your levels and you go back up! As simple as that!
Indonesian: Seperti terakhir kali, aku mengambil levelmu dan kamu naik kembali! Sesederhana itu!

English: And like last time, if you want to resume your previous progression, you can cancel the quest, you will resume the progression of the latter by resuming the quest!
Indonesian: Dan seperti sebelumnya, jika kamu ingin melanjutkan perkembangan sebelumnya, kamu dapat membatalkan pencarian, kamu akan melanjutkan perkembangan terakhir dengan melanjutkan pencarian!

English: This time, it will be from level 70 to 80! So, shall we go?
Indonesian: Kali ini, dari level 70 hingga 80! Jadi, akankah kita pergi?

English: Great! Then I’ll wait here!
Indonesian: Bagus! Kalau begitu aku akan menunggu di sini!

English: No problem, just come back!
Indonesian: Tidak masalah, tinggal kembali saja!

English: Great! I expected no less from you. Here’s your reward.
Indonesian: Bagus! Aku tidak salah berharap darimu. Ini hadiahmu.

English: Reach level 80
Indonesian: Mencapai level 80

English: Master Grade (3)
Indonesian: Master Grade (3)

English: The last time you finished your task in no time. What do you think? Let’s go back?
Indonesian: Terakhir kali kamu menyelesaikan tugasmu dalam waktu singkat. Bagaimana menurutmu? Apa kita kembali?

English: The rules are not changing, so what are we waiting for?
Indonesian: Aturannya tidak berubah, jadi tunggu apa lagi?

English: This time, it will be from level 80 to 90! So, shall we go?
Indonesian: Kali ini, dari level 80 hingga 90! Jadi, akankah kita pergi?

English: Reach level 90
Indonesian: Mencapai level 90

English: Master Grade (4)
Indonesian: Master Grade (4)

English: We’re almost done, don’t worry. But for now, let’s keep going?
Indonesian: Kita sudah hampir selesai, jangan khawatir. Tapi untuk saat ini, mari kita lanjutkan?

English: And yes, as usual, same rules!
Indonesian: Dan ya, seperti biasa, aturan yang sama!

English: This time, it will be from level 90 to 100! So, shall we go?
Indonesian: Kali ini, dari level 90 hingga 100! Jadi, akankah kita pergi?

English: Reach level 100
Indonesian: Mencapai level 100

English: Master Grade (5)
Indonesian: Master Grade (5)

English: One more and then it’s the last!
Indonesian: Satu lagi dan ini yang terakhir!

English: This time, it will be from level 100 to 110! So, shall we go?
Indonesian: Kali ini, dari level 100 hingga 110! Jadi, akankah kita pergi?

English: Reach level 110
Indonesian: Mencapai level 110

English: Master Grade (6)
Indonesian: Master Grade (6)

English: Here we are! This is one of the last missions I have for you at the moment. Are you still motivated?
Indonesian: Ini dia! Ini adalah misi terakhir yang kumiliki untukmu saat ini. Apakah kamu masih termotivasi?

English: This time, it will be from level 110 to 120! So, shall we go?
Indonesian: Kali ini, dari level 110 hingga 120! Jadi, akankah kita pergi?

English: Reach level 120
Indonesian: Mencapai level 120

English: Clockworks War
Indonesian: Clockworks War

English: Christmas Spirit
Indonesian: Christmas Spirit
