English: It’s almost Christmas, as you know. And I forgot to prepare my snowman...
Indonesian: Seperti yang kamu tahu, saat ini sudah mendekati Natal. Dan aku lupa menyiapkan manusia saljuku..

English: Can you get me $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$ snowballs and $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ carrots before midnight ?
Indonesian: Apa kamu bisa mencarikan $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$ bola salju dan $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ wortel untukku sebelum tengah malam?

English: You can find the snowballs on the ground, but I think all the monsters picked them up... So you’ll have to eliminate a few to get them back.
Indonesian: Kamu dapat menemukan bola salju di tanah, tetapi kupikir semua monster telah mengambilnya .. Jadi, kamu harus menghilangkan beberapa untuk mendapatkannya kembali.

English: If you’re not interested in the Christmas spirit, it’s useless.
Indonesian: Jika kamu tidak tertarik dengan semangat Natal, maka percuma saja.

English: You did it! Thanks to you Christmas is saved! Unless the monsters destroy the snowmen and take back the carrots...
Indonesian: Kamu berhasil! Berkatmu, Natal telah terselamatkan! Kecuali jika para monster menghancurkan manusia-manusia salju dan mengambil kembali wortel-wortelnya...

English: Well, I guess picking up snow and carrots is too hard for you, huh...
Indonesian: Yah, kurasa memungut salju dan wortel terlalu sulit untukmu, huh..

English: The polar bear asked me to bring back $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$ snowballs and $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ carrots by midnight.
Indonesian: Si beruang kutub memintaku untuk membawa pulang $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$ bola salju dan $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ wortel sebelum tengah malam.

English: Welcome hero! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ from the Forsaken Tower. Could you please slay 50 $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?
Indonesian: Selamat datang pahlawan! Request lain telah masuk untuk $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ dari Forsaken Tower. Bisakah kamu mengambil 50 $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, dan mengembalikannya kepadaku?

English: Well done, we'll have plenty of $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$s to fulfill all the requests!
Indonesian: Bagus sekali, kami akan memiliki banyak $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ untuk memenuhi semua request!

English: You haven't defeated the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ yet? That's okay, just return once you have.
Indonesian: Kamu masih belum dikalahkan $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Tidak apa-apa, kembalikan saja setelah kamu memilikinya.

English: Welcome back hero! There are reports of a new threat in the Forsaken Tower. Please seek out and get rid of the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$.
Indonesian: Selamat datang kembali pahlawan! Ada laporan ancaman baru di Forsaken Tower. Silakan cari dan singkirkan $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$.

English: Thank you hero, the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ threat has been eliminated.
Indonesian: Terima kasih pahlawan, ancaman $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ telah dihilangkan.

English: You weren't able to kill the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ yet? That's alright, please return after you've won against the giant!
Indonesian: Anda belum bisa membunuh $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$? Tidak apa-apa, mohon segera kembali setelah Anda menang melawan para giant!

English: The Tower is filled with dangerous masquerpets. I understand if you do not wish to take the risk.
Indonesian: Menara dipenuhi dengan masquerpets berbahaya. Saya mengerti jika Anda tidak ingin mengambil risiko.

Indonesian: Curiosity Killed the Cat (1)

Indonesian: Gullah Gullah Island! (1)

Indonesian: Abraxas Antitoxin (1)

Indonesian: Bird Assassins (1)

Indonesian: Bead of the Black Magician (1)

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Catsy.
Indonesian: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ dijatuhkan dari semua jenis Catsy.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Harpy.
Indonesian: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ dijatuhkan dari semua jenis Harpy.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Gullah.
Indonesian: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ dijatuhkan dari semua jenis Gullah.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Abraxas.
Indonesian: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ dijatuhkan dari semua jenis Abraxas.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Hague.
Indonesian: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ dijatuhkan dari semua jenis Hague.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Tengu.
Indonesian: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ dijatuhkan dari semua jenis Tengu.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Asterius.
Indonesian: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ dijatuhkan dari semua jenis Asterius.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Dantalian.
Indonesian: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ dijatuhkan dari semua jenis Dantalian.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Gannessa.
Indonesian: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ dijatuhkan dari semua jenis Gannessa.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Asuras.
Indonesian: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ dijatuhkan dari semua jenis Asuras.

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the first floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Indonesian: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ terlihat di lantai pertama Forsaken Tower.

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the second floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Indonesian: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ terlihat di lantai dua Forsaken Tower.

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the third floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Indonesian: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ terlihat di lantai tiga Forsaken Tower.

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the fourth floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Indonesian: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ telah terlihat di lantai empat Forsaken Tower.

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the fifth floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Indonesian: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ telah terlihat di lantai lima Forsaken Tower.

English: Clockworks War (Medium)
Indonesian: Clockworks War (Medium)

English: Clockworks War (Hard)
Indonesian: Clockworks War (Hard)

English: Meteonyker
Indonesian: Meteonyker

English: Meteonyker (Medium)
Indonesian: Meteonyker (Medium)

English: Meteonyker (Hard)
Indonesian: Meteonyker (Hard)

English: Forsaken Tower Daily Quests
Indonesian: Forsaken Tower Daily Quests

English: Dungeon Card Reward
Indonesian: Dungeon Card Reward

English: Weapon Piercing Box (D)
Indonesian: Weapon Piercing Box (D)

English: Weapon Piercing Box (C)
Indonesian: Weapon Piercing Box (C)

English: Weapon Piercing Box (B)
Indonesian: Weapon Piercing Box (B)

English: Weapon Piercing Box (A)
Indonesian: Weapon Piercing Box (A)

English: Welcome hero! Another request has come in to clear out the boss masquerpets within Madrigal's dungeons. Could you please slay 5 dungeon bosses, and return to me once you are done?
Indonesian: Selamat datang pahlawan! Permintaan lain telah datang untuk membersihkan boss masquerpets di Madrigal's dungeons. Bisakah kamu membunuh 5 bos dungeon, dan kembali padaku setelah kamu selesai?

English: Welcome hero! Another request has come in to clear out the boss masquerpets within Madrigal's dungeons. Could you please slay 20 dungeon bosses on Hard or higher difficulty, and return to me once you are done?
Indonesian: Selamat datang pahlawan! Permintaan lain telah datang untuk membersihkan boss masquerpets di Madrigal's dungeons. Bisakah kamu membunuh 20 bos dungeon pada tingkat kesulitan Hard atau lebih tinggi, dan kembali kepadaku setelah kamu selesai?

English: Welcome hero! Another request has come in to clear out the boss masquerpets within Madrigal's dungeons. Could you please slay 35 dungeon bosses on Extra Hard or higher difficulty, and return to me once you are done?
Indonesian: Selamat datang pahlawan! Permintaan lain telah datang untuk membersihkan boss masquerpets di Madrigal's dungeons. Bisakah kamu membunuh 30 bos dungeon pada tingkat kesulitan Extra Hard atau lebih tinggi, dan kembali kepadaku setelah kamu selesai?

English: Welcome hero! Another request has come in to clear out the boss masquerpets within Madrigal's dungeons. Could you please slay 50 dungeon bosses on Nightmare or higher difficulty, and return to me once you are done?
Indonesian: Selamat datang pahlawan! Permintaan lain telah datang untuk membersihkan boss masquerpets di Madrigal's dungeons. Bisakah kamu membunuh 50 bos dungeon pada tingkat kesulitan Nightmare atau lebih tinggi, dan kembali kepadaku setelah kamu selesai?

English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon 5 times, and return to me for a reward.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan jiwa dari bos masquerpet di akhir dungeon mana pun sebanyak 5 kali, dan kembalikan kepadaku untuk mendapatkan hadiah.

English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon on Hard or higher difficulty 20 times, and return to me for a reward.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan jiwa dari bos masquerpet di akhir dungeon mana pun pada tingkat kesulitan Hard atau lebih tinggi sebanyak 20 kali, dan kembalikan kepadaku untuk mendapatkan hadiah.

English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon on Extra Hard or higher difficulty 35 times, and return to me for a reward.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan jiwa dari bos masquerpet di akhir dungeon mana pun pada tingkat kesulitan Extra Hard atau lebih tinggi sebanyak 35 kali, dan kembalikan kepadaku untuk mendapatkan hadiah.

English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon on Nightmare or higher difficulty 50 times, and return to me for a reward.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan jiwa dari bos masquerpet di akhir dungeon mana pun pada tingkat Nightmare atau lebih tinggi sebanyak 50 kali, dan kembalikan kepadaku untuk mendapatkan hadiah.

English: The dungeons are filled with dangerous masquerpets. I understand if you do not wish to take the risk.
Indonesian: Dungeons dipenuhi dengan dangerous masquerpets. Aku mengerti jika kamu tidak ingin mengambil risiko.

English: The threat from within the dungeons has been reduced thanks to you, hero. Please accept a weapon piercing card as thanks for your efforts!
Indonesian: Ancaman dari dalam dungeon telah mengurangi berkatmu, Pahlawan. Mohon terima weapon piercing card sebagai ucapan terima kasih atas usahamu!

English: You haven't defeated the bosses yet? That's okay, just return once you have.
Indonesian: Kamu belum mengalahkan bosnya? Tidak apa-apa, kembalikan saja setelah kamu punya.

English: Collect souls from 5 dungeon bosses on any difficulty.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan jiwa dari 5 bos dungeon pada tingkat kesulitan apa pun.

English: Collect souls from 20 dungeon bosses on Hard or higher difficulty.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan jiwa dari 20 bos dungeon pada tingkat kesulitan yang lebih tinggi.

English: Collect souls from 35 dungeon bosses on Extra Hard or higher difficulty.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan jiwa dari 35 bos dungeon pada tingkat kesulitan Extra Hard atau lebih tinggi.

English: Collect souls from 50 dungeon bosses on Nightmare difficulty.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan jiwa dari 50 bos dungeon pada tingkat kesulitan Nightmare.

English: Daily Quests
Indonesian: Daily Quests

English: Saving Private Leo
Indonesian: Selamatkan Private Leo

English: Private Leo has been trapped in the dungeon and sent an SOS sign!\nPlease save Private Leo!
Indonesian: Private Leo telah terjebak di dungeon dan mengirimkan tanda SOS!\nTolong selamatkan Private Leo!

English: Private Leo seems to be injured so please hurry!
Indonesian: Private Leo sepertinya terluka jadi tolong cepat!

English: I have misjudged you! I’ll look for another person, now begone!
Indonesian: Aku telah salah menilaimu! Aku akan mencari orang lain, sekarang pergilah!

English: I've heard Private Leo has been successfully rescued! Please accept this reward!
Indonesian: Aku dengar Private Leo berhasil diselamatkan! Terimalah hadiah ini!

English: Has Private Leo been rescued yet?
Indonesian: Apakah Private Leo sudah diselamatkan?

English: Visit dungeon NPC to learn all about Event
Indonesian: Kunjungi NPC dungeon untuk mempelajari semua tentang Event

English: Rescue the missing childrens
Indonesian: Menyelamatkan anak-anak yang hilang

English: The children from the town have gone missing... Please rescue them from the monsters!
Indonesian: Anak-anak dari kota hilang... Tolong selamatkan mereka dari monster!

English: I need you to save $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ childrens in any dungeon, before midnight.
Indonesian: Aku ingin kamu menyelamatkan $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ anak-anak di dungeon mana pun, sebelum tengah malam.

English: You can find childrens in any dungeon. They will be in a cage and you will just have to get the key from the boss to save them!
Indonesian: Kamu dapat menemukan anak-anak di dungeon mana pun. Mereka akan berada di dalam kurungan dan kamu hanya perlu mendapatkan kunci dari bos untuk menyelamatkan mereka!

English: If I'm right, children's lives don't matter to you? No problem.
Indonesian: Jika saya benar, kehidupan anak-anak tidak penting bagimu? Tidak masalah.

English: You saved the childrens! Thank you very much, you're my hero!
Indonesian: Kamu menyelamatkan anak-anak! Terima kasih banyak, kamu adalah pahlawanku!

English: Someone else saved them. You were too slow and incompetent.
Indonesian: Orang lain menyelamatkan mereka. Kamu terlalu lambat dan tidak kompeten.

English: I need to rescue $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ childrens in any dungeon by midnight.
Indonesian: Aku harus menyelamatkan $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ anak-anak di dungeon mana pun pada tengah malam.

English: Make Monster Shaved Ice
Indonesian: Buat Monster Shaved Ice

English: It's definitely hot today.\nThere's a special food that can blow this heat away, do you want to know?
Indonesian: Hari ini pasti panas.\nAda makanan spesial yang bisa menghilangkan rasa panas ini, mau tahu?

English: Don't be surprised! It's Monster Shaved Ice!\nIt's a special recipe by me with monster ingredients.\nIf you want know how it tastes, go find the ingredients before the ice melts!
Indonesian: Jangan kaget! Ini Monster Shaved Ice!\nIni resep spesial buatanku dengan bahan-bahan monster.\nKalau mau tahu rasanya, cari bahannya sebelum esnya mencair!

English: You're not curious? You must not be too hot...
Indonesian: Kamu tidak penasaran? Kamu tidak boleh terlalu kepanasan...

English: Here you go! Hurry up and try it before it melts!
Indonesian: Ini dia! Segera dicoba sebelum meleleh!

English: Oh why are you so late? Your ice already melted and it can't be used...
Indonesian: Oh kenapa kamu terlambat sekali? Esmu sudah meleleh dan tidak dapat digunakan...

English: Are you still collecting?\nIf the ice melts, we can't make the shaved ice so hurry up!
Indonesian: Apakah kamu masih mengoleksi?\nKalau esnya mencair, kita tidak bisa membuat es serutnya, jadi cepatlah!

English: Defeat the monsters before the ice metls and return to Sotta\n(Can redo the quest if failed)
Indonesian: Kalahkan monster sebelum es mencair dan kembali ke Sotta\n(Dapat mengulang quest jika gagal)

English: Coral Island
Indonesian: Coral Island

English: Clouds Over Coral Island
Indonesian: Awan Di Atas Coral Island

English: Hero, the clouds over the island to the southeast have finally cleared!
Indonesian: Pahlawan, awan di atas pulau di sebelah tenggara akhirnya cerah!

English: For the longest time we have been unable to travel to the famed Coral Island. I wonder who or what caused the clouds to dissipate?
Indonesian: Untuk waktu yang lama kami tidak dapat melakukan perjalanan ke Coral Island yang terkenal. Aku bertanya-tanya siapa atau apa yang menyebabkan awan menghilang?

English: Regardless of the reason, perhaps you should go pay a visit to the island and see what's new.
Indonesian: Apa pun alasannya, mungkin kamu harus berkunjung ke pulau itu dan melihat apa yang baru.

English: Many years ago a skilled blacksmith from Darken City named BoBu traveled through the fog in search for rare materials. Go seek out Coral Island and see if BoBu managed to survive.
Indonesian: Bertahun-tahun yang lalu seorang pandai besi terampil dari Darken City bernama BoBu melakukan perjalanan melalui kabut untuk mencari bahan langka. Pergilah mencari Coral Island dan lihat apakah BoBu berhasil bertahan.

English: I understand hero, Coral Island has been uncharted territory for many years... Come back to me if you change your mind.
Indonesian: Aku mengerti pahlawan, Coral Island telah menjadi wilayah yang belum dipetakan selama bertahun-tahun... Kembalilah kepadaku jika berubah pikiran.

English: Hello there traveler, I didn't expect to see one of you so soon after the clouds around Coral Island were lifted...
Indonesian: Hello traveler, aku tidak menyangka akan bertemu salah satu dari kalian secepat ini setelah awan di sekitar Coral Island terangkat...

English: Go seek out Coral Island and see if BoBu managed to survive.
Indonesian: Pergilah mencari Coral Island dan lihat apakah BoBu berhasil bertahan.

English: Find Your Bearings
Indonesian: Temukan Arahmu

English: Long ago I sailed into the mist that surrounded this island, hoping to discover something new and untouched in the land of Madrigal.
Indonesian: Dahulu kala aku berlayar menuju kabut yang mengelilingi pulau ini, berharap menemukan sesuatu yang baru dan belum tersentuh di negeri Madrigal.

English: I found Coral Island nestled deep into the clouds, but something kept me from ever leaving.
Indonesian: Aku menemukan Coral Island terletak jauh di balik awan, namun ada sesuatu yang menghalangiku untuk pergi.

English: The mist that covered the island held some magic that prevented those who arrived from escaping.
Indonesian: Kabut yang menutupi pulau itu menyimpan sihir yang mencegah mereka yang datang untuk melarikan diri.

English: With Coral Island open to all, we may begin seeing more travelers arrive over time. For now, go introduce yourself to Sunny Pang. Sunny Pang will help you in your adventures around the island.
Indonesian: Dengan terbukanya Coral Island untuk semua orang, kita mungkin mulai melihat lebih banyak wisatawan datang seiring berjalannya waktu. Untuk saat ini, perkenalkan dirimu pada Sunny Pang. Sunny Pang akan membantumu dalam petualangan mengelilingi pulau.

English: Take your time, the island has a lot to offer. Come back to me when you are ready.
Indonesian: Luangkan waktumu, pulau ini memiliki banyak hal yang ditawarkan. Kembalilah padaku ketika kamu sudah siap.

English: Wow, it's a real adventure! It's been so long since we've had anyone come visit Coral Island. I wasn't sure this day would ever come!
Indonesian: Wow, ini benar-benar petualangan! Sudah lama sekali tidak ada orang yang datang mengunjungi Coral Island. Aku tidak yakin hari ini akan datang!

English: Introduce yourself to Sunny Pang.
Indonesian: Perkenalkan dirimu pada Sunny Pang.

English: An Island Shrouded in Mystery
Indonesian: Sebuah Pulau yang Terselubung Misteri

English: Those who call Coral Island their home have been unable to explore the world due to a curse placed on the island many years ago.
Indonesian: Mereka yang menyebut Coral Island sebagai rumah mereka tidak dapat menjelajahi dunia karena kutukan yang menimpa pulau tersebut beberapa tahun yang lalu.

English: The cause of the cursed mist that has kept the Coral Island inhabitants trapped is unknown.
Indonesian: Belum diketahui penyebab kabut terkutuk yang membuat penduduk Coral Island terjebak.

English: However with the mist cleared from around the island, we can finally welcome fresh new faces to help us defend our small village!
Indonesian: Namun dengan hilangnya kabut di sekitar pulau, kami akhirnya dapat menyambut wajah-wajah baru yang segar untuk membantu kami mempertahankan desa kecil kami!

English: Coral Island is a dangerous place. To prove you are an adventurer capable of surviving the dangers here, I want you to go explore the island and take down 200 of any kind of Atrox.
Indonesian: Coral Island adalah tempat yang berbahaya. Untuk membuktikan bahwa kamu adalah seorang petualang yang mampu bertahan dari bahaya di sini, aku ingin kamu menjelajahi pulau dan mengalahkan 200 jenis Atrox apa pun.

English: We didn't expect everyone that arrived to be strong enough for this place. Perhaps you can return to Darken City.
Indonesian: Kami tidak berharap semua orang yang datang cukup kuat untuk tempat ini. Mungkin kamu bisa kembali ke Darken City.

English: I am impressed! Atrox are dangerous beasts known to cut down most creatures that approach them. You have proven yourself.
Indonesian: Aku terkesan! Atrox adalah binatang berbahaya yang dikenal suka membunuh sebagian besar makhluk yang mendekatinya. Kamu telah membuktikan dirimu sendiri.

English: Atrox are dangerous foes, you'll need to successfully defeat more of them to prove yourself to me.
Indonesian: Atrox adalah musuh yang berbahaya, kamu harus berhasil mengalahkan lebih banyak dari mereka untuk membuktikan diri kepadaku.

English: Defeat 200 of any kind of Atrox, then return to Sunny Pang.
Indonesian: Kalahkan 200 Atrox jenis apa pun, lalu kembali ke Sunny Pang.

English: Clear the Paths
Indonesian: Kosongkan Jalannya

English: Word has been going around the village about a strong new visitor that can hold their own against the ferocities of Coral Island.
Indonesian: Kabar telah beredar di desa tentang pengunjung baru yang kuat yang mampu bertahan melawan keganasan Coral Island.

English: The number of Tigars on the island have exploded recently, and we're not sure why. It's hardly safe to walk along the paths of Coral Island anymore.
Indonesian: Jumlah Tigar di pulau itu membludak baru-baru ini, dan kami tidak yakin alasannya. Hampir tidak aman lagi untuk berjalan di sepanjang jalan Coral Island.

English: If you are willing to help us, go hunt enough Tigars to keep our paths safe for a while. Around 300 should do.
Indonesian: Jika kamu bersedia membantu kami, pergilah berburu Tigars secukupnya agar jalan kami tetap aman untuk sementara waktu. Sekitar 300 sudah cukup.

English: Perhaps no one is powerful enough to defeat the Tigars.
Indonesian: Mungkin tidak ada seorang pun yang cukup kuat untuk mengalahkan Tigars.

English: Incredible, thank you for your efforts! We can safely travel around the land paths of the island again.
Indonesian: Luar biasa, terima kasih atas usahamu! Kita dapat dengan aman melakukan perjalanan melalui jalur darat di pulau itu lagi.

English: Tigars hide in the grass, waiting to strike their prey. In just one NaNosecond they pounce to attack.
Indonesian: Tigar bersembunyi di rerumputan, menunggu untuk menyerang mangsanya. Hanya dalam satu NaNodetik mereka menerkam untuk menyerang.

English: Defeat 300 of any kind of Tigar, then return to Talus.
Indonesian: Kalahkan 300 Tigar jenis apa pun, lalu kembali ke Talus.

English: Pirates and Their Pet
Indonesian: Bajak Laut dan Petnya

English: Your reputation continues to grow in our little village, hero!
Indonesian: Reputasimu terus berkembang di desa kecil kami, Pahlawan!

English: The Meral pirates of Coral Island have managed to tame a Lord Tigar. Those thieves have threatened to come rob and destroy our homes.
Indonesian: The Meral pirates of Coral Island have managed to tame a Lord Tigar. Those thieves have threatened to come rob and destroy our homes.

English: Defeat the pirates and their gigantic pet before they destroy everything we've built!
Indonesian: Kalahkan bajak laut dan pet raksasa mereka sebelum mereka menghancurkan semua yang kita bangun!

English: I wouldn't want to be eaten by a Lord Tigar either. Understandable.
Indonesian: I wouldn't want to be eaten by a Lord Tigar either. Understandable.

English: I knew you could do it, hero! For now we can rest, knowing that our village is safe from the Meral pirates and their Lord Tigar!
Indonesian: I knew you could do it, hero! For now we can rest, knowing that our village is safe from the Meral pirates and their Lord Tigar!

English: Merals and their pet Tigar are terribly powerful. You'll need to be strong to defeat them.
Indonesian: Merals dan petnya, Tigar, sangat kuat. Kamu harus kuat untuk mengalahkan mereka.

English: Collect 30 Pristine Pirate Lens from any kind of Meral, and a Gigantic Feline Fang from a Lord Tigar.
Indonesian: Collect 30 Pristine Pirate Lens from any kind of Meral, and a Gigantic Feline Fang from a Lord Tigar.

English: King of the Pirates!
Indonesian: Raja Bajak Laut!

English: Woaw, welcome to Coral Island hero! Let me tell you a story of legend, if you don't mind.
Indonesian: Wow, selamat datang di pahlawan Coral Island! Izinkan aku menceritakan sebuah kisah legenda, jika kamu tidak keberatan.

English: Long ago, a huge Meral was once blessed by Shade. The Meral grew twisted and grotesque, but filled with dark power.
Indonesian: Dahulu kala, sebuah Meral pernah diberkati oleh Shade. Meral itu menjadi bengkok dan aneh, tetapi dipenuhi dengan kekuatan gelap.

English: Soon the Overlord Meral became the King of the Pirates of Coral Island, ruling with an iron hook.
Indonesian: Soon the Overlord Meral became the King of the Pirates of Coral Island, ruling with an iron hook.

English: Wehehehe, if you defeated that Overlord Meral maybe YOU could become King of the Pirates!
Indonesian: Wehehehe, if you defeated that Overlord Meral maybe YOU could become King of the Pirates!

English: I guess we will never know if the legend of the Meral King is true.
Indonesian: Aku kira kita tidak akan pernah tahu apakah legenda Meral King itu benar adanya.

English: Woah woah woah! You defeated the King of the Pirates? And that stone...
Indonesian: Wah wah wah! Kamu mengalahkan Raja Bajak Laut? Dan batu itu...

English: It seems this one piece of stone is filled with purple magic... this is definitely the work of Shade.
Indonesian: Sepertinya bongkahan batu ini dipenuhi dengan purple magic... ini pasti hasil karya Shade.

English: Fufufu, the only thing that bothers me is that there is legend of a second piece of magic stone hidden on this island. Maybe one day the two of us will discover where it's hiding!
Indonesian: Fufufu, satu-satunya hal yang menggangguku adalah ada legenda batu ajaib kedua yang tersembunyi di pulau ini. Mungkin suatu hari nanti kita berdua akan mengetahui di mana persembunyiannya!

English: To find out if the legend is true, you'll need to defeat the Overlord Meral.
Indonesian: To find out if the legend is true, you'll need to defeat the Overlord Meral.

English: Defeat the Overlord Meral to collect the Purple Pirate Insignia.
Indonesian: Defeat the Overlord Meral to collect the Purple Pirate Insignia.

English: Island Delicacies
Indonesian: Island Delicacies

English: Ha! You have really made a name for yourself here on Coral Island, hero. Everyone has told me of the amazing feats you've accomplished.
Indonesian: Ha! Kamu benar-benar telah membuat nama untuk dirimu sendiri di Coral Island, Pahlawan. Semua orang memberi tahuku tentang prestasi luar biasa yang telah kamu capai.

English: If you want to prove yourself further, help us defeat the legion of Naga that have taken over the island.
Indonesian: Jika kamu ingin membuktikan diri lebih jauh, bantu kami mengalahkan legiun Naga yang telah menguasai pulau itu.

English: To safely take on the Naga, first you'll need to gather bait made of their favorite foods. You can make bait from any type of Kingster or Creper! Meet up with Pau Pau and he'll prepare everything.
Indonesian: Untuk menghadapi Naga dengan aman, pertama-tama kamu harus mengumpulkan umpan yang terbuat dari makanan favoritnya. Kamu bisa membuat umpan dari jenis Kingster atau Creper apa pun! Temui Pau Pau dan dia akan mempersiapkan segalanya.

English: Everyone's adventure comes to a close one day. That's alright, hero.
Indonesian: Petualangan semua orang akan berakhir suatu hari nanti. Tidak apa-apa, Pahlawan.

English: Woaw, nice job hero! We can make plenty of bait with all this to lower the guard of the Naga! For now, take a rest. We'll make a plan of attack later.
Indonesian: Wow, pekerjaan yang bagus, pahlawan! Kita bisa membuat banyak umpan dengan semua ini untuk menurunkan pertahanan Naga! Untuk saat ini, istirahatlah. Kami akan membuat rencana penyerangan nanti.

English: Keep fighting Kingster or Creper until you've found enough bait.
Indonesian: Terus lawan Kingster atau Creper sampai kamu menemukan umpan yang cukup.

English: Defeat any kind of Kingster or Creper until you've made 200 Island Bait.
Indonesian: Kalahkan Kingster atau Creper jenis apa pun hingga kamu membuat 200 Island Bait.

English: Lizard People
Indonesian: Manusia Kadal

English: I hope you're feeling rested after making all that bait with Pau Pau!
Indonesian: Aku harap beristirahat setelah melakukan semua umpan dengan Pau Pau!

English: It's time to go on the offensive and take down as many of the Naga as we can.
Indonesian: Saatnya menyerang dan mengalahkan Naga sebanyak yang kita bisa.

English: Okay hero, go out there and defeat the Naga before they come eat us!
Indonesian: Baiklah Pahlawan, pergilah ke sana dan kalahkan Naga itu sebelum mereka memakan kita!

English: The Naga are ferocious, there's no shame in saying no.
Indonesian: Naga itu ganas, tidak ada salahnya untuk mengatakan tidak.

English: Incredible! Truly amazing! You've conquered the Naga, and nearly all of Coral Island!
Indonesian: Menakjubkan! Sungguh menakjubkan! Kamu telah menaklukkan Naga, dan hampir seluruh Coral Island!

English: Hopefully soon our village can sleep without keeping one eye open.
Indonesian: Semoga segera desa kami bisa tidur tanpa membuka satu mata pun.

English: Keep going! You need to defeat more Naga.
Indonesian: Terus berlanjut! Kamu perlu mengalahkan lebih banyak Naga.

English: Collect evidence of defeating at least 1000 Small Naga, Naga, or Captain Naga. After that, defeat the Lord Naga and Overlord Naga.
Indonesian: Collect evidence of defeating at least 1000 Small Naga, Naga, or Captain Naga. After that, defeat the Lord Naga and Overlord Naga.

English: Mission Improbable
Indonesian: Misi Mustahil

English: Hahaha! I cannot thank you enough for all that you have done for our village, hero! Only the most powerful of masquerpets remain a threat to our village now.
Indonesian: Ha ha ha! Aku sangat berterima kasih atas semua yang telah kamu lakukan untuk desa kami, Pahlawan! Hanya masquerpet terkuat yang masih menjadi ancaman bagi desa kami saat ini.

English: We rarely see the Dorian and Okean creatures approach the village. However with so many other Island evils defeated, I fear they may leave their lair to take advantage of the situation!
Indonesian: Jarang kita melihat makhluk Dorian dan Okean mendekati desa. Namun dengan begitu banyak kejahatan Pulau lainnya yang dikalahkan, aku khawatir mereka akan meninggalkan sarangnya untuk mengambil keuntungan dari situasi ini!

English: Go seek out where the Dorian and Okean live. We'll need as much information as we can get if we expect to defeat them!
Indonesian: Carilah tempat tinggal Dorian dan Okean. Kita memerlukan informasi sebanyak-banyaknya jika ingin mengalahkan mereka!

English: What!? You can't possibly be scared of a few more masquerpets after all we've been through together!
Indonesian: Apa!? Kamu tidak mungkin takut dengan beberapa masquerpet lagi setelah semua yang kita lalui bersama!

English: Well done, hero! With this information we have a chance to defeat the Dorian and Okean before they can attack!
Indonesian: Bagus sekali, pahlawan! Dengan informasi ini kita mempunyai kesempatan untuk mengalahkan Dorian dan Okean sebelum mereka menyerang!

English: Keep searching, the Dorian and Okean make their homes in the waters of Coral Island.
Indonesian: Terus mencari, suku Dorian dan Okean menetap di perairan Coral Island.

English: Search for where the Dorian and Okean live.
Indonesian: Cari tempat tinggal Dorian dan Okean.

English: Surprise Attack!
Indonesian: Serangan Mendadak!

English: HOOWAH! I'm trembling with excitement!
Indonesian: HOOAH! Aku gemetar karena gembira!

English: With the information you've brought back, our village has a real chance to take down the Dorian and Okean before they get to us!
Indonesian: Dengan informasi yang kamu bawa, desa kami punya peluang nyata untuk mengalahkan Dorian dan Okean sebelum mereka sampai ke tangan kami!

English: Go ahead and defeat as many Dorian and Okean as you can find, including their leaders! We trust you to take down the leaders, we'll be helping with the smaller ones in the back.
Indonesian: Silakan dan kalahkan sebanyak mungkin Dorian dan Okean, termasuk pemimpin mereka! Kami percaya akan menjatuhkan para pemimpin, kami akan membantu yang lebih kecil di belakang.

English: If we wait too much longer the Dorian and Okean will attack the village!
Indonesian: Jika kita menunggu terlalu lama, Dorian dan Okean akan menyerang desa!

English: It's been done, hero. We've defeated the Dorian and Okean, and can now rest easy.
Indonesian: Sudah selesai, Pahlawan. Kami telah mengalahkan Dorian dan Okean, dan sekarang bisa tenang.

English: We're doomed... without your help we will never defeat the Dorian and Okean in time!
Indonesian: Kami ditakdirkan... tanpa bantuanmu kami tidak akan pernah mengalahkan Dorian dan Okean tepat pada waktunya!

English: Collect trophies from any defeated Dorian and Okean, and defeat at least one Lord or Overlord of each!
Indonesian: Collect trophies from any defeated Dorian and Okean, and defeat at least one Lord or Overlord of each!

English: Inky Darkness
Indonesian: Inky Darkness

English: I hope you are ready for our final challenge hero... According to legend, once every few hundred years the Sea King will release spawn onto Coral Island.
Indonesian: Aku harap kamu siap untuk tantangan terakhir kami pahlawan... Menurut legenda, setiap beberapa ratus tahun sekali Sea King akan bertelur ke Coral Island.

English: A strange darkness has began to fill the waters of Coral Island, so it seems as if the legend is true.
Indonesian: Kegelapan yang aneh mulai memenuhi perairan Coral Island, jadi sepertinya legenda itu benar adanya.

English: Please help us stave off the spawn of the Sea King!
Indonesian: Tolong bantu kami mencegah telur Sea King!

English: Thank you! Find where the Sea King has released their spawn, and defeat as many as you can. Let BoBu know once you've finished!
Indonesian: Terima kasih! Temukan di mana Sea King melepaskan telurnya, dan kalahkan sebanyak mungkin. Beritahu BoBu setelah kamu selesai!

English: Soon the inky darkness will overflow Coral Island, and we will be engulfed...
Indonesian: Sebentar lagi kegelapan pekat akan membanjiri Coral Island, dan kita akan ditelan...

English: Hohoho! You really do have a mysterious power within you, don't you hero?
Indonesian: Hohoho! Kamu benar-benar memiliki kekuatan misterius di dalam dirimu kan, pahlawan?

English: Will we become faceless like those that failed before us?
Indonesian: Akankah kita menjadi tidak berwajah seperti orang-orang yang gagal sebelum kita?

English: Defeat 500 of any type of Kraken.
Indonesian: Kalahkan 500 Kraken jenis apa pun.

English: The Sea King Returns
Indonesian: The Sea King Returns

English: The great Sea King of Coral Island has finally returned to wreck havoc upon the land.
Indonesian: Sea King of Coral Island yang agung akhirnya kembali membuat kekacauan di daratan.

English: The locals told me that getting near the beast could cause mortals to lose their mind...
Indonesian: Penduduk setempat mengatakan kepada aku bahwa mendekati binatang itu dapat menyebabkan manusia kehilangan akal sehatnya...

English: This battle will take all the strength we can muster. If you make it out alive, go back to Darken City, and let the mayor know about all that happened here.
Indonesian: Pertarungan ini akan membutuhkan seluruh kekuatan yang bisa kita kumpulkan. Jika kamu berhasil keluar hidup-hidup, kembalilah ke Darken City, dan beri tahu walikota tentang semua yang terjadi di sini.

English: The only path forward to end the curse of the Sea King is to slay the beast in its lair. Go forth and do the deed, for Coral Island!
Indonesian: Satu-satunya jalan untuk mengakhiri kutukan Sea King adalah dengan membunuh binatang itu di sarangnya. Majulah dan lakukan perbuatanmu, demi Coral Island!

English: Those who lose their mind to the Sea King are said to become faceless.
Indonesian: Mereka yang kehilangan akal sehatnya karena Sea King dikatakan tidak berwajah.

English: Welcome back from Coral Island, hero! And what a story to tell, it's true that Coral Island is a fascinating place.
Indonesian: Selamat datang kembali dari Coral Island, Pahlawan! Dan sungguh menarik untuk diceritakan, memang benar bahwa Coral Island adalah tempat yang menakjubkan.

English: BoBu and the Coral Island villagers sent something by mail for you as a way to say thanks. Perhaps they were too shy to give it to you themselves!
Indonesian: BoBu dan penduduk desa Coral Island mengirimkan sesuatu melalui pos untukmu sebagai cara untuk mengucapkan terima kasih. Mungkin mereka terlalu malu untuk memberikannya sendiri!

English: The Sea King consumes all who look into the void.
Indonesian: Sea King menghabisi semua orang yang melihat ke dalam kehampaan.

English: Ultimate Crafting
Indonesian: Ultimate Crafting

English: Orbs of Power
Indonesian: Orbs of Power

English: Your arrival has come at a critical time, hero. Bring me Ultima, and in return I shall grant you the key to ultimate power.
Indonesian: Kedatanganmu datang pada saat yang kritis, Pahlawan. Bawakan aku Ultima, dan sebagai imbalannya aku akan memberimu kunci kekuatan tertinggi.

English: Collect Ultima from the giant creatures that live on Coral Island, or from chests of plunder deep in The Wilds.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan Ultima dari makhluk raksasa yang hidup di Coral Island, atau dari chests of plunder jauh di dalam The Wilds.

English: Without Ultima I cannot grant the ultimate power you seek.
Indonesian: Tanpa Ultima saya tidak bisa memberikan kekuatan tertinggi yang kamu cari.

English: Well done, hero... I bestow upon you the power of the Ultimate Orb. Combine this with Shining Oricalkum and obtain ultimate power!
Indonesian: Bagus sekali, Pahlawan... Aku menganugerahkan kepadamu kekuatan Ultimate Orb. Gabungkan ini dengan Shining Oricalkum dan dapatkan kekuatan tertinggi!

English: I need more Ultima to complete the ritual.
Indonesian: Aku membutuhkan lebih banyak Ultima untuk menyelesaikan ritualnya.

English: Collect ten Ultima from the giants of Coral Island and treasure chests in The Wilds.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan sepuluh Ultima dari raksasa Coral Island dan treasure chest di The Wilds.

English: New Hero
Indonesian: Pahlawan Baru

English: Your will and ability have proven you to be a master in both thought and deed. Now that you've shown your true strength, it is time for your final task.
Indonesian: Kehendak dan kemampuanmu telah membuktikan bahwa kamu ahli dalam pikiran dan perbuatan. Sekarang setelah menunjukkan kekuatanmu yang sebenarnya, sekarang saatnya untuk tugas terakhirmu.

English: I need you to reach level 125 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!
Indonesian: Aku ingin kamu mencapai level 125 dan membawa $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Hanya Pahlawan sejati yang bisa melakukan itu!

English: Reach level 125 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Indonesian: Capai level 125 dan dapatkan $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.

English: New Year's Hunt
Indonesian: Perburuan Tahun Baru

English: Celebrating 2024, let's hunt 2024 monsters!\nWhat do you say?"
Indonesian: Merayakan tahun 2024, ayo berburu monster 2024!\nApa yang kamu katakan?"

English: "Great! I know you'll make it for sure!\nHere's to a new year full of adventures in 2024!!!"
Indonesian: "Bagus! Aku tahu kamu pasti berhasil!\nIni tahun baru yang penuh petualangan di tahun 2024!!!"

English: "It's a shame, because I've got the best New Year's gift ever…"
Indonesian: "Sayang sekali, karena aku mendapat hadiah Tahun Baru terbaik yang pernah ada..."

English: "You've done great~ Here's your New Year's gift~\nLet's see how lucky you are this year!!!"
Indonesian: "Kamu melakukannya dengan baik~ Ini hadiah Tahun Barumu~\nMari kita lihat betapa beruntungnya kamu tahun ini!!!"

English: "Are you still a long way off? We're running out of time! Please hurry up!"
Indonesian: "Apakah perjalananmu masih jauh? Kita kehabisan waktu! Tolong cepat!"

English: Defeat the monsters and return to Auxilior.
Indonesian: Kalahkan monster dan kembali ke Auxilior.

English: Collecting Candy Shells
Indonesian: Collecting Candy Shells

English: Madrigal is being polluted by discarded candy shells everywhere!! We need your help!!
Indonesian: Madrigal is being polluted by discarded candy shells everywhere!! We need your help!!

English: Thank you so much!! I won't forget your help!!
Indonesian: Thank you so much!! I won't forget your help!!

English: I have a special gift for you, but it's a shame...
Indonesian: I have a special gift for you, but it's a shame...

English: I'm so proud to see Madrigal cleaned up~!
Indonesian: I'm so proud to see Madrigal cleaned up~!

English: Hang in there!!
Indonesian: Hang in there!!

English: Collect the candy shells and return to Auxilior.
Indonesian: Collect the candy shells and return to Auxilior.

English: Spring Monster Ball
Indonesian: Spring Monster Ball

English: Hello Adventurer! Would you like to take a suggestion about hunting a stronger monster?
Indonesian: Hello Adventurer! Would you like to take a suggestion about hunting a stronger monster?

English: Great! Show me what you can do first!
Indonesian: Great! Show me what you can do first!

English: That's too bad, please join us next time!
Indonesian: That's too bad, please join us next time!

English: Thank you. Here is your Monster Ball. Please be cautious!\nNo one knows what kind of powerful monster will come out.
Indonesian: Thank you. Here is your Monster Ball. Please be cautious!\nNo one knows what kind of powerful monster will come out.

English: Are we there yet? We don't have much time.
Indonesian: Are we there yet? We don't have much time.

English: Complete all 3 missions.
Indonesian: Complete all 3 missions.

English: Couple Ring Hunt
Indonesian: Couple Ring Hunt

English: If you bring me the coupling, I will give you something really good. Go get it.
Indonesian: If you bring me the coupling, I will give you something really good. Go get it.

English: Thanks for granting my request. I've heard through the grapevine that there's been a lot of frauds playing with fake couple rings lately, so you'd better be careful.
Indonesian: Thanks for granting my request. I've heard through the grapevine that there's been a lot of frauds playing with fake couple rings lately, so you'd better be careful.

English: What? Where in the world is such a couple ring? So you're saying I'm lying? If you don't believe me, get off!
Indonesian: What? Where in the world is such a couple ring? So you're saying I'm lying? If you don't believe me, get off!

English: Did you manage to get the couple ring already? This is a fake! Didn't I warn you not to get scammed. But I'm giving it to you for your efforts, so take it.
Indonesian: Did you manage to get the couple ring already? This is a fake! Didn't I warn you not to get scammed. But I'm giving it to you for your efforts, so take it.

English: Still haven't found the coupling? Hmm...well, that could be... I mean, where would a legendary couple ring be so easy to find?
Indonesian: Still haven't found the coupling? Hmm...well, that could be... I mean, where would a legendary couple ring be so easy to find?

English: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!
Indonesian: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!

English: Roll your dice
Indonesian: Roll your dice

English: Complete all missions.
Indonesian: Complete all missions.

English: Couple Daily Quests
Indonesian: Couple Daily Quests

English: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!
Indonesian: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!

English: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Nyangnyangs in northern Flaris, then return to me.
Indonesian: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Nyangnyangs in northern Flaris, then return to me.

English: I can feel these charms emitting love waves. Soon everyone will know how special your love is!
Indonesian: I can feel these charms emitting love waves. Soon everyone will know how special your love is!

English: I'm sorry, were you unable to find the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Perhaps they only appear for those truly in love.
Indonesian: I'm sorry, were you unable to find the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Perhaps they only appear for those truly in love.

English: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!
Indonesian: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!

English: Kill Demian Thieves
Indonesian: Kill Demian Thieves

English: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please work together to defeat the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?
Indonesian: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please work together to defeat the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal. Check your map for hints for where they may be hiding!
Indonesian: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal. Check your map for hints for where they may be hiding!

English: The power of your love have vanquished the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ threat, thank you!
Indonesian: The power of your love have vanquished the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ threat, thank you!

English: Were you unable to find and defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ yet? Track them down to prove your love is true!
Indonesian: Were you unable to find and defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ yet? Track them down to prove your love is true!

English: Find Love Fish
Indonesian: Find Love Fish

English: Have you heard of the legendary $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Legend has it that lovers who obtain the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ will be together forever.
Indonesian: Have you heard of the legendary $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Legend has it that lovers who obtain the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ will be together forever.

English: Wonderful! The $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ is said to swim near Zaoma's Refuge in the middle of the Leren Mountains.
Indonesian: Wonderful! The $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ is said to swim near Zaoma's Refuge in the middle of the Leren Mountains.

English: You've found the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$! Surely your love will be blessed to last forever.
Indonesian: You've found the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$! Surely your love will be blessed to last forever.

English: I don't see the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. If you have trouble finding it, search near Zaoma in the Leren Mountains.
Indonesian: I don't see the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. If you have trouble finding it, search near Zaoma in the Leren Mountains.

English: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!
Indonesian: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!

English: Kill Giggleboxes
Indonesian: Kill Giggleboxes

English: Kill Trangfoma
Indonesian: Kill Trangfoma

English: Kill Doridoma
Indonesian: Kill Doridoma

English: Kill Scorpicon
Indonesian: Kill Scorpicon

English: Kill Tombstone Bearer
Indonesian: Kill Tombstone Bearer

English: Kill Cardpuppets
Indonesian: Kill Cardpuppets

English: Kill Steam Walkers
Indonesian: Kill Steam Walkers

English: Kill Nutty Wheels
Indonesian: Kill Nutty Wheels

English: Kill Fefern
Indonesian: Kill Fefern

English: Kill Wagsaac
Indonesian: Kill Wagsaac

English: Kill Prankster
Indonesian: Kill Prankster

English: Collect Whispering Leaves from Risem
Indonesian: Collect Whispering Leaves from Risem

English: In their spare time, Risems collect leaves that whisper sweet nothings. Spread love around Madrigal by bringing these $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me!
Indonesian: In their spare time, Risems collect leaves that whisper sweet nothings. Spread love around Madrigal by bringing these $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me!

English: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Risems in Darken, then return to me.
Indonesian: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Risems in Darken, then return to me.

English: Can you hear the leaves speak? Soon everyone will know how special your love is!
Indonesian: Can you hear the leaves speak? Soon everyone will know how special your love is!

English: A Date on Mars!
Indonesian: A Date on Mars!

English: What could be more romantic than frolicking near the Bangs of Northern Flaris? A picnic outside of Mars Mine sounds outstanding!
Indonesian: What could be more romantic than frolicking near the Bangs of Northern Flaris? A picnic outside of Mars Mine sounds outstanding!

English: Wonderful, then the date is set. Enjoy your time sightseeing at the Mars Mine!
Indonesian: Wonderful, then the date is set. Enjoy your time sightseeing at the Mars Mine!

English: Not a fan of Bangs? Well, there's always the Nyangnyangs.
Indonesian: Not a fan of Bangs? Well, there's always the Nyangnyangs.

English: How was the date? Hopefully the Bangs weren't too distracting.
Indonesian: How was the date? Hopefully the Bangs weren't too distracting.

English: Oh, so the Bangs were too distracting after all. Maybe you need to take a cold bath?
Indonesian: Oh, so the Bangs were too distracting after all. Maybe you need to take a cold bath?

English: Go on a romantic date outside the entrance of Mars Mine!
Indonesian: Go on a romantic date outside the entrance of Mars Mine!

English: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please slay the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?
Indonesian: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please slay the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal.
Indonesian: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal.

English: Some days we don't feel productive. I understand.
Indonesian: Some days we don't feel productive. I understand.

English: Collect Rainbow Flowers
Indonesian: Collect Rainbow Flowers

English: Welcome! We require flowers blessed by lovers. Could you please collect Rainbow Flowers, and return to me once you are done?
Indonesian: Welcome! We require flowers blessed by lovers. Could you please collect Rainbow Flowers, and return to me once you are done?

English: Wonderful! The rare flowers grow near the large tree in Saint Morning where no one flies.
Indonesian: Wonderful! The rare flowers grow near the large tree in Saint Morning where no one flies.

English: These flowers are perfect. With your help I can now bless all of Madrigal with love!
Indonesian: These flowers are perfect. With your help I can now bless all of Madrigal with love!

English: Oh no, that's not right. The flowers are in Saint Morning. If you get lost, remember to check your map!
Indonesian: Oh no, that's not right. The flowers are in Saint Morning. If you get lost, remember to check your map!

English: Head to the Plateau of Silence in Saint Morning, and retrieve the Wild Rainbow Flowers.
Indonesian: Head to the Plateau of Silence in Saint Morning, and retrieve the Wild Rainbow Flowers.

English: Collect Heart Charms from Nyangnyang
Indonesian: Collect Heart Charms from Nyangnyang

English: Nyangnyangs possess charms bursting with the power of love. With a few of these charms, you can show Madrigal how strong your love is!
Indonesian: Nyangnyangs possess charms bursting with the power of love. With a few of these charms, you can show Madrigal how strong your love is!

English: The Mystery of the Shady Eye
Indonesian: The Mystery of the Shady Eye

English: The Mystery of the Shady Eye (2)
Indonesian: The Mystery of the Shady Eye (2)

English: The Cursed Wing of Destiny
Indonesian: The Cursed Wing of Destiny

English: The Cursed Wing of Destiny (2)
Indonesian: The Cursed Wing of Destiny (2)

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the sixth floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Indonesian: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the sixth floor of the Forsaken Tower.

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the seventh floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Indonesian: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the seventh floor of the Forsaken Tower.

English: Disarming the Maleficars
Indonesian: Disarming the Maleficars

English: Disarming the Maleficars (2)
Indonesian: Disarming the Maleficars (2)

English: Stealing gems from the cursed guardian
Indonesian: Stealing gems from the cursed guardian

English: Stealing gems from the cursed guardian (2)
Indonesian: Stealing gems from the cursed guardian (2)

English: Herbology Class
Indonesian: Herbology Class

English: You can gather herbs with a hoe. Want to learn how to gather herbs?
Indonesian: You can gather herbs with a hoe. Want to learn how to gather herbs?

English: Good. Then go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Indonesian: Good. Then go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: There you go. It's easier than you think, isn't it? Just remember, the most important thing is to do 'a lot'.
Indonesian: There you go. It's easier than you think, isn't it? Just remember, the most important thing is to do 'a lot'.

English: Woodcutting Class
Indonesian: Woodcutting Class

English: You can chop trees with an axe. Would you like to learn woodcutting?
Indonesian: You can chop trees with an axe. Would you like to learn woodcutting?

English: Good. Then go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Indonesian: Good. Then go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Mining Class
Indonesian: Mining Class

English: You can dig up ores with a pickaxe. Would you like to learn mining?
Indonesian: You can dig up ores with a pickaxe. Would you like to learn mining?

English: Good. Then go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Indonesian: Good. Then go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Fishing Class
Indonesian: Fishing Class

English: Once you get to know thrill of fishing, it's hard to get away from it. What do you say, learn?
Indonesian: Once you get to know thrill of fishing, it's hard to get away from it. What do you say, learn?

English: Good. Then go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.
Indonesian: Good. Then go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.

English: Alchemy Class
Indonesian: Alchemy Class

English: Once you learn the alchemy, you can brew your own buff potion to carry with. Want to learn?
Indonesian: Once you learn the alchemy, you can brew your own buff potion to carry with. Want to learn?

English: Good. Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.
Indonesian: Good. Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.

English: Cooking Class
Indonesian: Cooking Class

English: Food is the basic of survival. Why don't you cook on your own?
Indonesian: Food is the basic of survival. Why don't you cook on your own?

English: Good. Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.
Indonesian: Good. Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.

English: Carpentry Class
Indonesian: Carpentry Class

English: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?
Indonesian: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?

English: Okay, try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.
Indonesian: Okay, try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.

English: Smithing Class
Indonesian: Smithing Class

English: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?
Indonesian: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?

English: Okay, try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.
Indonesian: Okay, try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.

English: Destroy the pumpkins 1
Indonesian: Destroy the pumpkins 1

English: Complete the mission.
Indonesian: Complete the mission.

English: Destroy the pumpkins 2
Indonesian: Destroy the pumpkins 2

English: Complete the mission.
Indonesian: Complete the mission.

English: Thanksgiving Turkey
Indonesian: Thanksgiving Turkey

English: Help the mayor cook his turkey for thanksgiving.\nHunt monsters (Lv. -10 to Lv. +10 from your level) to earn [Event] Turkeys.
Indonesian: Help the mayor cook his turkey for thanksgiving.\nHunt monsters (Lv. -10 to Lv. +10 from your level) to earn [Event] Turkeys.

English: Hello, adventurer! I'm planning to cook a turkey for the village. Do you have a moment to help?
Indonesian: Hello, adventurer! I'm planning to cook a turkey for the village. Do you have a moment to help?

English: Great! Actually, I tried to cook it myself, but while I left the ingredients outside, monsters stole them all! Can you help me get them back?
Indonesian: Great! Actually, I tried to cook it myself, but while I left the ingredients outside, monsters stole them all! Can you help me get them back?

English: That's a shame. I'll try to figure something out on my own.
Indonesian: That's a shame. I'll try to figure something out on my own.

English: Thank you so much! I can finish cooking in time. Happy Thanksgiving!
Indonesian: Thank you so much! I can finish cooking in time. Happy Thanksgiving!

English: Are you done yet? The villagers are eagerly waiting!
Indonesian: Are you done yet? The villagers are eagerly waiting!

English: Go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Indonesian: Go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Indonesian: Go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Indonesian: Go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.
Indonesian: Go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.

English: Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.
Indonesian: Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.

English: Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.
Indonesian: Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.

English: Try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.
Indonesian: Try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.

English: Try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.
Indonesian: Try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.

English: Hero Grade (2)
Indonesian: Hero Grade (2)

English: I need you to reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!
Indonesian: I need you to reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!

English: Reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Indonesian: Reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.

English: Hero Grade (3)
Indonesian: Hero Grade (3)

English: I need you to reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!
Indonesian: I need you to reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!

English: Reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Indonesian: Reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.

English: Rumble from the Depths
Indonesian: Rumble from the Depths

English: (H-Hiii…!) T-tremors... w-waves... taller than a Clockworks... (Gulp) A... a deafening noise... Wh-what’s going on?!
Indonesian: (H-Hiii…!) T-tremors... w-waves... taller than a Clockworks... (Gulp) A... a deafening noise... Wh-what’s going on?!

English: What?! You’re not aware??! But where have you been?! Honestly… We can never count on you to keep an eye on our precious world…
Indonesian: What?! You’re not aware??! But where have you been?! Honestly… We can never count on you to keep an eye on our precious world…

English: Well… listen. It doesn’t matter, I’ll need you. I have no idea what happened, or even where exactly… (hesitation) But I feel like the deafening noise came from the Krakens side.
Indonesian: Well… listen. It doesn’t matter, I’ll need you. I have no idea what happened, or even where exactly… (hesitation) But I feel like the deafening noise came from the Krakens side.

English: I would have gone myself, but you see… (looking away) I still have a lot to do, and there are other adventurers I need to take care of… (coughs) And don’t think I’m scared, okay! It has nothing to do with that, absolutely nothing!
Indonesian: I would have gone myself, but you see… (looking away) I still have a lot to do, and there are other adventurers I need to take care of… (coughs) And don’t think I’m scared, okay! It has nothing to do with that, absolutely nothing!

English: Find the location of the events and see what’s happening there
Indonesian: Find the location of the events and see what’s happening there

English: Ah! Finally, someone reliable! I knew I could count on you. Go quickly, check near the Krakens side, and come back to tell me what you find. I’m sure you’ll do an excellent job! But… be careful, alright? That rumble wasn’t normal...
Indonesian: Ah! Finally, someone reliable! I knew I could count on you. Go quickly, check near the Krakens side, and come back to tell me what you find. I’m sure you’ll do an excellent job! But… be careful, alright? That rumble wasn’t normal...

English: What?! You’re not going?! Really… We can’t count on anyone… Fine, do as you wish, but remember that this world needs protectors, not cowards. And don’t come complaining if things get worse without you!
Indonesian: What?! You’re not going?! Really… We can’t count on anyone… Fine, do as you wish, but remember that this world needs protectors, not cowards. And don’t come complaining if things get worse without you!

English: Starfish… coral… and all kinds of little sea things coming together to form… a portal?! This is insane… How could this be possible?!
Indonesian: Starfish… coral… and all kinds of little sea things coming together to form… a portal?! This is insane… How could this be possible?!

English: You’re back already? But… don’t tell me you haven’t checked out the source of that noise yet! We need to know what’s happening on the Krakens side. Go on, get moving! The world’s not going to protect itself, you know!
Indonesian: You’re back already? But… don’t tell me you haven’t checked out the source of that noise yet! We need to know what’s happening on the Krakens side. Go on, get moving! The world’s not going to protect itself, you know!

English: Magic water stone of Herneos
Indonesian: Magic water stone of Herneos

English: Hmm… If what you’re telling me is true, it would correspond to a well-known legend of Madrigal… Once upon a time, in the Old World, Herneos was a prosperous city where everyone dreamed of living, a true underwater paradise with magnificent architecture.
Indonesian: Hmm… If what you’re telling me is true, it would correspond to a well-known legend of Madrigal… Once upon a time, in the Old World, Herneos was a prosperous city where everyone dreamed of living, a true underwater paradise with magnificent architecture.

English: But one day, Shade pierced the glass bubble that protected Herneos from the depths of the ocean, and the city sank… along with its inhabitants. Since then, despite numerous searches, we have never found this lost city. But if you’re telling me a portal has opened…
Indonesian: But one day, Shade pierced the glass bubble that protected Herneos from the depths of the ocean, and the city sank… along with its inhabitants. Since then, despite numerous searches, we have never found this lost city. But if you’re telling me a portal has opened…

English: I’m afraid Shade has finally found a way to return to the city of Herneos… For what purpose? I have no idea, but we need to ensure it is indeed the city of Herneos…
Indonesian: I’m afraid Shade has finally found a way to return to the city of Herneos… For what purpose? I have no idea, but we need to ensure it is indeed the city of Herneos…

English: Bring back a magical water stone from the discovered location and have it analyzed by Dr. Estly
Indonesian: Bring back a magical water stone from the discovered location and have it analyzed by Dr. Estly

English: Ah, thank you! I knew you’d understand the urgency. If this really is a magical water stone from Herneos, then Shade’s reach might be spreading in ways we never expected… Please, bring back a stone as soon as you can. And be careful Herneos may be more dangerous now than we imagine.
Indonesian: Ah, thank you! I knew you’d understand the urgency. If this really is a magical water stone from Herneos, then Shade’s reach might be spreading in ways we never expected… Please, bring back a stone as soon as you can. And be careful Herneos may be more dangerous now than we imagine.

English: What?! You’re not interested in helping with this? You don’t understand this isn’t just some small errand! Herneos could be the key to untold mysteries… and maybe even threats. But fine, if you can’t be bothered, I’ll just have to find someone else…
Indonesian: What?! You’re not interested in helping with this? You don’t understand this isn’t just some small errand! Herneos could be the key to untold mysteries… and maybe even threats. But fine, if you can’t be bothered, I’ll just have to find someone else…

English: Ah, you've returned with the magical water stone! Thank you! I'll begin the analysis right away to confirm its origin.
Indonesian: Ah, you've returned with the magical water stone! Thank you! I'll begin the analysis right away to confirm its origin.

English: Back so soon? You don’t have the magical water stone yet? We’re counting on that stone to prove if it’s truly from Herneos. Shade’s power might be stronger than we thought, so time is crucial. Please, return as soon as you have it!
Indonesian: Back so soon? You don’t have the magical water stone yet? We’re counting on that stone to prove if it’s truly from Herneos. Shade’s power might be stronger than we thought, so time is crucial. Please, return as soon as you have it!

English: Under Shade's Command
Indonesian: Under Shade's Command

English: What?! Monsters? Whole hordes?! Listen… Shade must already be at work, and if she’s there, she won’t waste any time.
Indonesian: What?! Monsters? Whole hordes?! Listen… Shade must already be at work, and if she’s there, she won’t waste any time.

English: I’ll need you to return there. Observe, fight, assess their strengths… If these creatures are really under Shade’s control, we need to know what awaits us.
Indonesian: I’ll need you to return there. Observe, fight, assess their strengths… If these creatures are really under Shade’s control, we need to know what awaits us.

English: When you’ve dealt with the monsters, return to see Dr. Estly. He should have finished the analysis of the water by then, and we’ll finally know if this submerged city is indeed Herneos…
Indonesian: When you’ve dealt with the monsters, return to see Dr. Estly. He should have finished the analysis of the water by then, and we’ll finally know if this submerged city is indeed Herneos…

English: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,2$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,3$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,3$s and return talk to Sovann.
Indonesian: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,2$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,3$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,3$s and return talk to Sovann.

English: Excellent! I knew I could count on you. The creatures under Shade’s command won’t go down easily, but with your skills, I’m confident you can handle them. Go, and show them that we won’t back down! Once you've dealt with them, check back with Sovann.
Indonesian: Excellent! I knew I could count on you. The creatures under Shade’s command won’t go down easily, but with your skills, I’m confident you can handle them. Go, and show them that we won’t back down! Once you've dealt with them, check back with Sovann.

English: What?! You’re refusing?! Don’t you see how serious this is? Shade’s forces won’t stop they’ll only get stronger if we ignore them. Fine, if you’re not willing to help, I’ll find someone who is up to the challenge. But don’t forget you might regret standing by if Shade succeeds.
Indonesian: What?! You’re refusing?! Don’t you see how serious this is? Shade’s forces won’t stop they’ll only get stronger if we ignore them. Fine, if you’re not willing to help, I’ll find someone who is up to the challenge. But don’t forget you might regret standing by if Shade succeeds.

English: You’re back again? But… have you not dealt with those monsters yet? We need to know what we’re up against! Shade’s forces are growing stronger every moment you delay. Go back and finish the job! Time is of the essence, and the fate of Herneos depends on it!
Indonesian: You’re back again? But… have you not dealt with those monsters yet? We need to know what we’re up against! Shade’s forces are growing stronger every moment you delay. Go back and finish the job! Time is of the essence, and the fate of Herneos depends on it!

English: You did it! I knew you could handle those monsters! Thank you for stepping up when we needed it the most.
Indonesian: You did it! I knew you could handle those monsters! Thank you for stepping up when we needed it the most.

English: Seeking the Truth of Herneos
Indonesian: Seeking the Truth of Herneos

English: I’m afraid I don’t have the knowledge necessary to interpret the results correctly.
Indonesian: I’m afraid I don’t have the knowledge necessary to interpret the results correctly.

English: Listen, take this sample and bring it to Martinyc the historian of Flarine. Only she has the archives and the skills to compare and tell you what’s going on! If this water is really connected to Herneos, she’ll know.
Indonesian: Listen, take this sample and bring it to Martinyc the historian of Flarine. Only she has the archives and the skills to compare and tell you what’s going on! If this water is really connected to Herneos, she’ll know.

English: Take the analysis result to Martinyc the historian of Flarine
Indonesian: Take the analysis result to Martinyc the historian of Flarine

English: Thank you! I knew you’d understand the importance of this. Martinyc is our best hope for interpreting these results. Take the sample to her right away, and let’s hope she can shed some light on this mystery! The fate of Herneos could depend on it!
Indonesian: Thank you! I knew you’d understand the importance of this. Martinyc is our best hope for interpreting these results. Take the sample to her right away, and let’s hope she can shed some light on this mystery! The fate of Herneos could depend on it!

English: What? You’re turning this down? This is vital information that could unlock the secrets of Herneos! If you won’t help now, I don’t know what we’ll do. Fine, but don’t forget that knowledge is power, and you might regret passing on this opportunity!
Indonesian: What? You’re turning this down? This is vital information that could unlock the secrets of Herneos! If you won’t help now, I don’t know what we’ll do. Fine, but don’t forget that knowledge is power, and you might regret passing on this opportunity!

English: You’re back? But… have you not delivered the sample to Martinyc yet? We need her expertise to understand what the analysis reveals! Time is running out, and if this water is connected to Herneos, we need to act quickly. Go now, before it’s too late!
Indonesian: You’re back? But… have you not delivered the sample to Martinyc yet? We need her expertise to understand what the analysis reveals! Time is running out, and if this water is connected to Herneos, we need to act quickly. Go now, before it’s too late!

English: Trophies from the Depths
Indonesian: Trophies from the Depths

English: Hello, who are you?... Oh, you must be the adventurer Estly told me about! Nice to meet you. How can I assist you?
Indonesian: Hello, who are you?... Oh, you must be the adventurer Estly told me about! Nice to meet you. How can I assist you?

English: Oh, you want me to interpret the results of this analysis to check, using the archives, if this water is indeed from the city of Herneos?
Indonesian: Oh, you want me to interpret the results of this analysis to check, using the archives, if this water is indeed from the city of Herneos?

English: (Smirking) But nothing comes for free, you know! I heard there are all-new monsters, never seen before, over there…
Indonesian: (Smirking) But nothing comes for free, you know! I heard there are all-new monsters, never seen before, over there…

English: While I compare the results, could you bring me samples or souvenirs from each creature? That would allow me to enrich our archives on these strange appearances.
Indonesian: While I compare the results, could you bring me samples or souvenirs from each creature? That would allow me to enrich our archives on these strange appearances.

English: Bring back $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,2$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,3$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,3$
Indonesian: Bring back $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,2$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,3$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,3$

English: Ah, wonderful! I knew you’d be up for the task. These new creatures are unlike anything we've documented, so any samples you bring will be invaluable. While you’re collecting them, I’ll start the comparison. Come back once you have the items, and we’ll see what these archives reveal about Herneos.
Indonesian: Ah, wonderful! I knew you’d be up for the task. These new creatures are unlike anything we've documented, so any samples you bring will be invaluable. While you’re collecting them, I’ll start the comparison. Come back once you have the items, and we’ll see what these archives reveal about Herneos.

English: Really? You’re refusing? (Sighs) I suppose not everyone appreciates the importance of history… But fine, go ahead just remember that these discoveries are rare. Who knows if you'll get another chance to contribute to our knowledge of Herneos.
Indonesian: Really? You’re refusing? (Sighs) I suppose not everyone appreciates the importance of history… But fine, go ahead just remember that these discoveries are rare. Who knows if you'll get another chance to contribute to our knowledge of Herneos.

English: Ohhh, thank you for these souvenirs! I can finally… continue my collection... uh, enrich the city archives! (clears throat) Yes, of course, the archives!
Indonesian: Ohhh, thank you for these souvenirs! I can finally… continue my collection... uh, enrich the city archives! (clears throat) Yes, of course, the archives!

English: Ah, you’re back? But… I don’t see any of the samples I asked for. These souvenirs from the creatures are essential to my research, you know! Please, gather them quickly and return. The archives await your findings!
Indonesian: Ah, you’re back? But… I don’t see any of the samples I asked for. These souvenirs from the creatures are essential to my research, you know! Please, gather them quickly and return. The archives await your findings!

English: Unveiling Herneos
Indonesian: Unveiling Herneos

English: Ah, yes, the analysis results… So, according to our archives, the water you retrieved matches 100% with that of the city of Herneos! It is indeed it You should quickly go announce this news to Sovann !
Indonesian: Ah, yes, the analysis results… So, according to our archives, the water you retrieved matches 100% with that of the city of Herneos! It is indeed it You should quickly go announce this news to Sovann !

English: Go tell Sovann it is indeed Herneos
Indonesian: Go tell Sovann it is indeed Herneos

English: Fantastic! Thank you so much for delivering the news. Sovann will be thrilled or perhaps a bit anxious to hear it. Go quickly and let him know that Herneos has indeed resurfaced. We might be on the brink of something monumental!
Indonesian: Fantastic! Thank you so much for delivering the news. Sovann will be thrilled or perhaps a bit anxious to hear it. Go quickly and let him know that Herneos has indeed resurfaced. We might be on the brink of something monumental!

English: Wait… you’re not going to tell him? This is crucial information! Herneos is real, and Sovann needs to know. Fine, if you won’t go, but don’t say I didn’t warn you… Discoveries like this don’t come every day, and neither does the chance to be part of history.
Indonesian: Wait… you’re not going to tell him? This is crucial information! Herneos is real, and Sovann needs to know. Fine, if you won’t go, but don’t say I didn’t warn you… Discoveries like this don’t come every day, and neither does the chance to be part of history.

English: What?? It’s really the lost city of Herneos?! (in awe) It’s incredible to see this iconic city again!
Indonesian: What?? It’s really the lost city of Herneos?! (in awe) It’s incredible to see this iconic city again!

English: Oh, you’re back… but you still haven’t told Sovann? This is monumental news... Herneos has been confirmed! Please, don’t delay any longer. Sovann must hear this right away; the implications are too important to keep to ourselves!
Indonesian: Oh, you’re back… but you still haven’t told Sovann? This is monumental news... Herneos has been confirmed! Please, don’t delay any longer. Sovann must hear this right away; the implications are too important to keep to ourselves!

English: Herneos: The Golden Legacy
Indonesian: Herneos: The Golden Legacy

English: Listen, you should check if the treasure is still there! What treasure?! The treasure of Herneos, of course! You can’t miss it: gold, jewels, valuable items... a true legend!
Indonesian: Listen, you should check if the treasure is still there! What treasure?! The treasure of Herneos, of course! You can’t miss it: gold, jewels, valuable items... a true legend!

English: So, what are you waiting for? Hurry before Shade gets her hands on it!
Indonesian: So, what are you waiting for? Hurry before Shade gets her hands on it!

English: Check if the treasure is still there
