Indonesian: Check if the treasure is still there

English: Yes! I knew you wouldn’t pass up a chance like this. The treasure of Herneos is the stuff of legends if it’s still there, it could be a discovery of a lifetime! Go quickly, and make sure you get there before Shade does. Good luck!
Indonesian: Yes! I knew you wouldn’t pass up a chance like this. The treasure of Herneos is the stuff of legends if it’s still there, it could be a discovery of a lifetime! Go quickly, and make sure you get there before Shade does. Good luck!

English: You’re… refusing? Are you serious?! This is the legendary treasure of Herneos! Opportunities like this don’t come around twice, you know. Fine, but don’t say I didn’t give you the chance to be part of something unforgettable.
Indonesian: You’re… refusing? Are you serious?! This is the legendary treasure of Herneos! Opportunities like this don’t come around twice, you know. Fine, but don’t say I didn’t give you the chance to be part of something unforgettable.

English: The treasure is still there?! Great news! But… it’s possible that all is not lost, if we act quickly. Very quickly.
Indonesian: The treasure is still there?! Great news! But… it’s possible that all is not lost, if we act quickly. Very quickly.

English: Cutting Shade's Power
Indonesian: Cutting Shade's Power

English: I know it’s a lot to ask, but… could you start by eliminating the two generals of Shade’s army that you spotted in Herneos? (determined look) That should slow down Shade’s advance and considerably weaken her right hand.
Indonesian: I know it’s a lot to ask, but… could you start by eliminating the two generals of Shade’s army that you spotted in Herneos? (determined look) That should slow down Shade’s advance and considerably weaken her right hand.

English: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ & $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$ the two generals of Shade at Herneos
Indonesian: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ & $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$ the two generals of Shade at Herneos

English: Thank you! With Shade’s generals out of the way, we might actually stand a chance. I know it won’t be easy, but you’re the only one who can do it. Go now, and show them that we won’t let Herneos fall under Shade’s control!
Indonesian: Thank you! With Shade’s generals out of the way, we might actually stand a chance. I know it won’t be easy, but you’re the only one who can do it. Go now, and show them that we won’t let Herneos fall under Shade’s control!

English: What?! You’re backing out now? This is no time for hesitation! Shade’s forces are closing in, and without your help, we may not be able to hold them back. But fine, if you won’t act, we’ll have to hope someone else is up for the challenge…
Indonesian: What?! You’re backing out now? This is no time for hesitation! Shade’s forces are closing in, and without your help, we may not be able to hold them back. But fine, if you won’t act, we’ll have to hope someone else is up for the challenge…

English: What?! You did it already?! (beaming smile) I can’t believe it! It’s incredible to count on you. You’re our true savior!
Indonesian: What?! You did it already?! (beaming smile) I can’t believe it! It’s incredible to count on you. You’re our true savior!

English: You’re back... but the two generals of Shade are still standing? Every moment they’re left unchecked, Herneos is at greater risk. We’re counting on you to stop them. There’s no time to lose!
Indonesian: You’re back... but the two generals of Shade are still standing? Every moment they’re left unchecked, Herneos is at greater risk. We’re counting on you to stop them. There’s no time to lose!

English: The Final Battle for Herneos
Indonesian: The Final Battle for Herneos

English: Now that you’ve weakened the boss by taking out the two generals of Shade’s army, it would be wise for you to face her right hand before he regains his full power.
Indonesian: Now that you’ve weakened the boss by taking out the two generals of Shade’s army, it would be wise for you to face her right hand before he regains his full power.

English: Me, go with you?!? (nervous laugh) Oh no, no… they always say not to change a winning team, and our way of teaming up is simply perfect, don’t you think?
Indonesian: Me, go with you?!? (nervous laugh) Oh no, no… they always say not to change a winning team, and our way of teaming up is simply perfect, don’t you think?

English: And if you succeed, don’t forget to stop by the mayor of Flarine, he will surely reward you generously for this achievement!
Indonesian: And if you succeed, don’t forget to stop by the mayor of Flarine, he will surely reward you generously for this achievement!

English: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ and return back to me.
Indonesian: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ and return back to me.

English: Amazing! I knew I could count on you to see this through. Facing Shade’s right hand won’t be easy, but if anyone can do it, it’s you. Just remember if you succeed, don’t forget to see the mayor in Flarine. I’m sure he’ll have a worthy reward for you. Good luck, hero!
Indonesian: Amazing! I knew I could count on you to see this through. Facing Shade’s right hand won’t be easy, but if anyone can do it, it’s you. Just remember if you succeed, don’t forget to see the mayor in Flarine. I’m sure he’ll have a worthy reward for you. Good luck, hero!

English: What?! You’re refusing? After all we’ve done to get this far? This is the final step! If you don’t finish this, Shade’s influence will only grow stronger. But… if you won’t go, we’ll just have to hope someone else has the courage. I only hope it’s not too late.
Indonesian: What?! You’re refusing? After all we’ve done to get this far? This is the final step! If you don’t finish this, Shade’s influence will only grow stronger. But… if you won’t go, we’ll just have to hope someone else has the courage. I only hope it’s not too late.

English: Back already? But Shade’s right hand is still out there, gathering strength! This is our final chance to stop her influence from spreading through Herneos. Please finish what you started. All of Madrigal is depending on you!
Indonesian: Back already? But Shade’s right hand is still out there, gathering strength! This is our final chance to stop her influence from spreading through Herneos. Please finish what you started. All of Madrigal is depending on you!

English: You did it! You've defeated Shade’s right hand! This is a monumental victory for Madrigal that will be remembered for ages. You’ve truly saved Herneos and brought hope back to our people.
Indonesian: You did it! You've defeated Shade’s right hand! This is a monumental victory for Madrigal that will be remembered for ages. You’ve truly saved Herneos and brought hope back to our people.

English: Gratitude of the Mayor
Indonesian: Gratitude of the Mayor

English: (Incredulous look) You did it… You really defeated Shade’s right hand?! (sigh of relief) I can’t believe it, this is incredible!
Indonesian: (Incredulous look) You did it… You really defeated Shade’s right hand?! (sigh of relief) I can’t believe it, this is incredible!

English: Thanks to you, we finally have real hope to repel the darkness threatening Madrigal. You accomplished the impossible, where so many others would have failed.
Indonesian: Thanks to you, we finally have real hope to repel the darkness threatening Madrigal. You accomplished the impossible, where so many others would have failed.

English: Take this… It’s a well-deserved reward. As the Mayor of Flaris, I thank you from the bottom of my heart for your courage and bravery!
Indonesian: Take this… It’s a well-deserved reward. As the Mayor of Flaris, I thank you from the bottom of my heart for your courage and bravery!

English: I don’t know what Shade is planning next, but with you by our side, I’m sure we can face any danger. Thank you… really, thank you from the bottom of my heart, hero.
Indonesian: I don’t know what Shade is planning next, but with you by our side, I’m sure we can face any danger. Thank you… really, thank you from the bottom of my heart, hero.

English: Rumor has it that the mayor of Flarine is eager to personally reward you for your recent achievement! You should definitely pay him a visit
Indonesian: Rumor has it that the mayor of Flarine is eager to personally reward you for your recent achievement! You should definitely pay him a visit

English: Herneos: Ruins of Glory
Indonesian: Herneos: Ruins of Glory

English: It may take a little time, though, so while I work, you might want to head back and speak with Captain Sovann. I’m sure he’ll have more for you to do in the meantime.
Indonesian: It may take a little time, though, so while I work, you might want to head back and speak with Captain Sovann. I’m sure he’ll have more for you to do in the meantime.

English: Ah, you’re back! Did you manage to deliver the magical water stone to Dr. Estly? And what did you find along the way? Any signs of Shade’s forces?
Indonesian: Ah, you’re back! Did you manage to deliver the magical water stone to Dr. Estly? And what did you find along the way? Any signs of Shade’s forces?

English: Thank you for reporting back to me. If Shade is behind these creatures, we need to assess the situation carefully. Go now and prepare yourself I fear this may only be the beginning.
Indonesian: Thank you for reporting back to me. If Shade is behind these creatures, we need to assess the situation carefully. Go now and prepare yourself I fear this may only be the beginning.

English: Go back to Sovann and report that you have delivered the magical water stone to Dr. Estly and encountered Shade's forces along the way.
Indonesian: Go back to Sovann and report that you have delivered the magical water stone to Dr. Estly and encountered Shade's forces along the way.

English: Reporting Back to Sovann
Indonesian: Reporting Back to Sovann

English: You didn’t deliver the message yet? We need to be fully aware of what’s happening in Herneos. Hurry back and let Sovann know what you encountered.
Indonesian: You didn’t deliver the message yet? We need to be fully aware of what’s happening in Herneos. Hurry back and let Sovann know what you encountered.

English: Very well! You’re truly dedicated to uncovering the mysteries of Herneos. Report back to Sovann with the details it’s crucial he knows about Shade’s forces. Thank you for stepping up; your bravery will be invaluable in this journey!
Indonesian: Very well! You’re truly dedicated to uncovering the mysteries of Herneos. Report back to Sovann with the details it’s crucial he knows about Shade’s forces. Thank you for stepping up; your bravery will be invaluable in this journey!

English: What?! You’re turning back now? Reporting this information to Sovann is essential if we’re to understand Shade’s reach! But fine, if you’re not willing… Just remember, this discovery could change everything. Don’t let this chance slip by.
Indonesian: What?! You’re turning back now? Reporting this information to Sovann is essential if we’re to understand Shade’s reach! But fine, if you’re not willing… Just remember, this discovery could change everything. Don’t let this chance slip by.

English: Return to Dr. Estly
Indonesian: Return to Dr. Estly

English: Now, go see Dr. Estly; he should have finished the analysis of the water by now. We’re one step closer to uncovering the truth about Herneos!
Indonesian: Now, go see Dr. Estly; he should have finished the analysis of the water by now. We’re one step closer to uncovering the truth about Herneos!

English: Excellent! The analysis should reveal invaluable information about Herneos. Head to Dr. Estly right away, and let’s finally uncover the secrets that lie within this legendary city!
Indonesian: Excellent! The analysis should reveal invaluable information about Herneos. Head to Dr. Estly right away, and let’s finally uncover the secrets that lie within this legendary city!

English: Really? You’re choosing not to follow up on this? Dr. Estly’s analysis could be the key to understanding Herneos and possibly even stopping Shade. But if you won’t go, we’ll have to hope someone else steps up to the task.
Indonesian: Really? You’re choosing not to follow up on this? Dr. Estly’s analysis could be the key to understanding Herneos and possibly even stopping Shade. But if you won’t go, we’ll have to hope someone else steps up to the task.

English: You haven’t visited Dr. Estly yet? The analysis of the water might hold crucial answers about Herneos! Time is ticking, and we need that information to understand what Shade might be planning. Please, head to him as soon as possible.
Indonesian: You haven’t visited Dr. Estly yet? The analysis of the water might hold crucial answers about Herneos! Time is ticking, and we need that information to understand what Shade might be planning. Please, head to him as soon as possible.

English: The analysis is complete, but... (annoyed look)
Indonesian: The analysis is complete, but... (annoyed look)

English: It’s time to return to Dr. Estly. The analysis should be complete by now, and with it, we might finally learn the truth about Herneos. Head back to her as soon as you can!
Indonesian: It’s time to return to Dr. Estly. The analysis should be complete by now, and with it, we might finally learn the truth about Herneos. Head back to her as soon as you can!

English: A rumor says a great reward awaits you... Go speak to the mayor of Flarine!
Indonesian: A rumor says a great reward awaits you... Go speak to the mayor of Flarine!

English: That's awesome! Hurry and go see the mayor!
Indonesian: That's awesome! Hurry and go see the mayor!

English: What do you mean, no?! You've already done everything.. You just need to claim your reward from the mayor of Flarine!
Indonesian: What do you mean, no?! You've already done everything.. You just need to claim your reward from the mayor of Flarine!

English: Do you think you could bring me a magical water stone from there? With an analysis of the stone, we can confirm if it truly originates from Herneos, as magical water stones can only be found in that legendary city.
Indonesian: Do you think you could bring me a magical water stone from there? With an analysis of the stone, we can confirm if it truly originates from Herneos, as magical water stones can only be found in that legendary city.

English: Christmas Invasion 1
Indonesian: Christmas Invasion 1

English: Christmas Invasion 2
Indonesian: Christmas Invasion 2

English: Christmas Invasion 3
Indonesian: Christmas Invasion 3

English: Year of the Snake 2025
Indonesian: Year of the Snake 2025

English: A Taste of Inspiration
Indonesian: A Taste of Inspiration

English: Oh, hello there, young adventurer! What a pleasure to meet you! Say, could you do me a favor?
Indonesian: Oh, hello there, young adventurer! What a pleasure to meet you! Say, could you do me a favor?

English: There's a novelist in our lovely town whose work I deeply admire, but it seems he's feeling a bit down lately, which is delaying his next masterpiece.
Indonesian: There's a novelist in our lovely town whose work I deeply admire, but it seems he's feeling a bit down lately, which is delaying his next masterpiece.

English: Would you be so kind as to deliver this to him on my behalf? I believe it might lift his spirits!
Indonesian: Would you be so kind as to deliver this to him on my behalf? I believe it might lift his spirits!

English: Oh, wonderful! I knew I could count on you! This small gesture might be just what he needs to find inspiration again. Please, deliver it to him as soon as you can, and let me know how he reacts! Thank you, brave adventurer!
Indonesian: Oh, wonderful! I knew I could count on you! This small gesture might be just what he needs to find inspiration again. Please, deliver it to him as soon as you can, and let me know how he reacts! Thank you, brave adventurer!

English: Oh… I see. That’s unfortunate. I was really hoping you could help… but I understand. If you ever change your mind, please let me know. His words have brought joy to so many, and it pains me to see him struggling.
Indonesian: Oh… I see. That’s unfortunate. I was really hoping you could help… but I understand. If you ever change your mind, please let me know. His words have brought joy to so many, and it pains me to see him struggling.

English: Huh? What’s this...?" (opens the package, raises an eyebrow, then bursts into laughter)
Indonesian: Huh? What’s this...?" (opens the package, raises an eyebrow, then bursts into laughter)

English: Two pizzas and… milk? Haha! She really knows me too well! Just the sight of this is enough to bring back my motivation! There’s nothing like a good meal to get the creative juices flowing!
Indonesian: Two pizzas and… milk? Haha! She really knows me too well! Just the sight of this is enough to bring back my motivation! There’s nothing like a good meal to get the creative juices flowing!

English: (takes a more serious but grateful tone)
Indonesian: (takes a more serious but grateful tone)

English: Thank you, adventurer. I was feeling stuck, but this… this reminds me that sometimes, the simplest joys are the best remedy. I owe you one! Now, time to get back to writing!
Indonesian: Thank you, adventurer. I was feeling stuck, but this… this reminds me that sometimes, the simplest joys are the best remedy. I owe you one! Now, time to get back to writing!

English: Oh, adventurer! You haven’t delivered the gift yet? The poor novelist must still be struggling with his writer’s block... Please, don’t keep him waiting too long! A little kindness can go a long way, and I know this will cheer him up!
Indonesian: Oh, adventurer! You haven’t delivered the gift yet? The poor novelist must still be struggling with his writer’s block... Please, don’t keep him waiting too long! A little kindness can go a long way, and I know this will cheer him up!

English: Deliver a special gift to the novelist to lift his spirits and help him continue writing.
Indonesian: Deliver a special gift to the novelist to lift his spirits and help him continue writing.

English: The Call of the Lawolf
Indonesian: The Call of the Lawolf

English: You know, adventurer, now that my spirits are lifted, I can finally get back to writing!
Indonesian: You know, adventurer, now that my spirits are lifted, I can finally get back to writing!

English: But there’s one problem… I need inspiration for my next chapter, and I want to write about Lawolfs.
Indonesian: But there’s one problem… I need inspiration for my next chapter, and I want to write about Lawolfs.

English: The problem is, I don’t know enough about them! Would you be willing to gather some information on these creatures for me?
Indonesian: The problem is, I don’t know enough about them! Would you be willing to gather some information on these creatures for me?

English: Ah, fantastic! I knew I could count on you! Lawolfs are fascinating creatures, but I need accurate details to make my story truly come to life.
Indonesian: Ah, fantastic! I knew I could count on you! Lawolfs are fascinating creatures, but I need accurate details to make my story truly come to life.

English: Go observe them, take notes, and bring me everything you learn! I can't wait to hear what you find!
Indonesian: Go observe them, take notes, and bring me everything you learn! I can't wait to hear what you find!

English: Oh… I see. That’s disappointing, but I suppose I’ll have to manage without it. I just hope my story won’t end up being full of mistakes… If you change your mind, let me know!
Indonesian: Oh… I see. That’s disappointing, but I suppose I’ll have to manage without it. I just hope my story won’t end up being full of mistakes… If you change your mind, let me know!

English: Ah, you’re back! Let’s see what you’ve got… Hmm… Interesting! So that’s how they behave? And their fur… I never would have imagined! This is exactly what I needed!
Indonesian: Ah, you’re back! Let’s see what you’ve got… Hmm… Interesting! So that’s how they behave? And their fur… I never would have imagined! This is exactly what I needed!

English: Thank you, adventurer, you’ve been an invaluable help. Now, it’s time to turn these notes into an unforgettable story!
Indonesian: Thank you, adventurer, you’ve been an invaluable help. Now, it’s time to turn these notes into an unforgettable story!

English: Still no news on the Lawolfs? I don’t mean to rush you, but I’m eager to continue my novel! The more I wait, the more my ideas fade… Please, if you have time, I’d really appreciate your help!
Indonesian: Still no news on the Lawolfs? I don’t mean to rush you, but I’m eager to continue my novel! The more I wait, the more my ideas fade… Please, if you have time, I’d really appreciate your help!

English: Defeat 5 Young Lawolfs and bring back your findings to the novelist.
Indonesian: Defeat 5 Young Lawolfs and bring back your findings to the novelist.

English: Scars of the Battlefield
Indonesian: Scars of the Battlefield

English: Adventurer! I just had a stroke of genius! My story is missing something… something raw, something real! A true relic of battle, a War Scar! I know it’s risky, but imagine the credibility it would add to my novel!
Indonesian: Adventurer! I just had a stroke of genius! My story is missing something… something raw, something real! A true relic of battle, a War Scar! I know it’s risky, but imagine the credibility it would add to my novel!

English: If you could bring me a piece of one, my story would be legendary! What do you say?
Indonesian: If you could bring me a piece of one, my story would be legendary! What do you say?

English: You will? Incredible! I knew you had the heart of a true adventurer! Be careful, though, War Scars are not easily found, and I fear the journey won’t be safe. But if anyone can do it, it’s you! Good luck, and may fate be on your side!
Indonesian: You will? Incredible! I knew you had the heart of a true adventurer! Be careful, though, War Scars are not easily found, and I fear the journey won’t be safe. But if anyone can do it, it’s you! Good luck, and may fate be on your side!

English: Oh… I see. I can’t blame you; this is not an easy task. But what a shame… my story will lack that raw authenticity. If you ever change your mind, please let me know. Some risks are worth taking for the sake of greatness!
Indonesian: Oh… I see. I can’t blame you; this is not an easy task. But what a shame… my story will lack that raw authenticity. If you ever change your mind, please let me know. Some risks are worth taking for the sake of greatness!

English: You did it! You actually did it! Let me see… This… This is incredible! The texture, the scars of battle engraved upon it… This is exactly what I needed! You have no idea what this means for my novel! Thank you, adventurer, this will be the heart of my greatest story yet!
Indonesian: You did it! You actually did it! Let me see… This… This is incredible! The texture, the scars of battle engraved upon it… This is exactly what I needed! You have no idea what this means for my novel! Thank you, adventurer, this will be the heart of my greatest story yet!

English: Still no sign of a War Scar? I know it’s dangerous, but I can’t get this idea out of my head! Without it, my novel will feel… incomplete. If you find the courage, please, I’d be forever grateful!
Indonesian: Still no sign of a War Scar? I know it’s dangerous, but I can’t get this idea out of my head! Without it, my novel will feel… incomplete. If you find the courage, please, I’d be forever grateful!

English: Retrieve a War Scar to add authenticity to the novelist’s story.
Indonesian: Retrieve a War Scar to add authenticity to the novelist’s story.

English: The Writer’s Legacy
Indonesian: The Writer’s Legacy

English: Adventurer, your help has been invaluable! Thanks to you, my novel is shaping up to be something truly extraordinary. But before I finish, I need one last piece of inspiration… something legendary.
Indonesian: Adventurer, your help has been invaluable! Thanks to you, my novel is shaping up to be something truly extraordinary. But before I finish, I need one last piece of inspiration… something legendary.

English: At the Fountain of the Departed, there is said to be a copy of the Book of Techniques, an ancient manuscript filled with lost knowledge. If you could retrieve an example of it for me, I promise to help you take the next step in your own journey. What do you say?
Indonesian: At the Fountain of the Departed, there is said to be a copy of the Book of Techniques, an ancient manuscript filled with lost knowledge. If you could retrieve an example of it for me, I promise to help you take the next step in your own journey. What do you say?

English: You will? That’s incredible! This book holds secrets that could bring my story to life like never before! But be careful, such knowledge does not rest unguarded. I have no doubt you’ll succeed, though. Return to me as soon as you find it!
Indonesian: You will? That’s incredible! This book holds secrets that could bring my story to life like never before! But be careful, such knowledge does not rest unguarded. I have no doubt you’ll succeed, though. Return to me as soon as you find it!

English: Oh… I see. I won’t lie, I had high hopes. This book could be the key to my masterpiece… But I understand. If you change your mind, the offer still stands. And remember, I could help you in ways no ordinary teacher could.
Indonesian: Oh… I see. I won’t lie, I had high hopes. This book could be the key to my masterpiece… But I understand. If you change your mind, the offer still stands. And remember, I could help you in ways no ordinary teacher could.

English: You found it? Let me see… This is… astonishing! The pages, the ink, the wisdom held within… It’s more than I ever imagined! With this, my novel will be remembered for generations! And as promised, I will help you take your next step. You’ve done so much for me it’s only fair that I return the favor!
Indonesian: You found it? Let me see… This is… astonishing! The pages, the ink, the wisdom held within… It’s more than I ever imagined! With this, my novel will be remembered for generations! And as promised, I will help you take your next step. You’ve done so much for me it’s only fair that I return the favor!

English: Still no sign of the Book of Techniques? I understand, it must be difficult to retrieve. But I assure you, this is no ordinary task. If you succeed, both of our fates could change forever. I believe in you, adventurer!
Indonesian: Still no sign of the Book of Techniques? I understand, it must be difficult to retrieve. But I assure you, this is no ordinary task. If you succeed, both of our fates could change forever. I believe in you, adventurer!

English: Find a copy of the Book of Techniques at the Fountain of the Departed for the novelist’s final chapter.
Indonesian: Find a copy of the Book of Techniques at the Fountain of the Departed for the novelist’s final chapter.

English: Wisdom’s Legacy
Indonesian: Wisdom’s Legacy

English: Adventurer, I can’t thank you enough! This book… it was exactly what I needed. I’ve taken all the notes I require, but such a treasure should not be wasted. There’s someone who would truly appreciate it, our town’s historian.
Indonesian: Adventurer, I can’t thank you enough! This book… it was exactly what I needed. I’ve taken all the notes I require, but such a treasure should not be wasted. There’s someone who would truly appreciate it, our town’s historian.

English: She has dedicated her life to preserving knowledge, and this book deserves a place in her archives. If you deliver it to her, I’m sure she’ll reward you well enough to take your next step… your first specialization. What do you say?
Indonesian: She has dedicated her life to preserving knowledge, and this book deserves a place in her archives. If you deliver it to her, I’m sure she’ll reward you well enough to take your next step… your first specialization. What do you say?

English: Thank you! I knew you would understand the importance of preserving knowledge. The historian will be thrilled to receive such a rare manuscript. Go, adventurer, and take this final step toward your destiny!
Indonesian: Thank you! I knew you would understand the importance of preserving knowledge. The historian will be thrilled to receive such a rare manuscript. Go, adventurer, and take this final step toward your destiny!

English: Oh… I see. That’s unfortunate. This book holds so much wisdom, it would be a shame to let it go to waste. If you ever change your mind, please reconsider. This could be the final key to unlocking your future.
Indonesian: Oh… I see. That’s unfortunate. This book holds so much wisdom, it would be a shame to let it go to waste. If you ever change your mind, please reconsider. This could be the final key to unlocking your future.

English: (She carefully flips through the pages, completely fascinated.)
Indonesian: (She carefully flips through the pages, completely fascinated.)

English: I will make a faithful copy to ensure this wisdom is never lost. You have done a great service to history today." She closes the book and looks at you with a grateful smile. "And of course, I won’t let your efforts go unrewarded.
Indonesian: I will make a faithful copy to ensure this wisdom is never lost. You have done a great service to history today." She closes the book and looks at you with a grateful smile. "And of course, I won’t let your efforts go unrewarded.

English: Take this, consider it a token of my gratitude. With it, you should have everything you need to take the next step in your journey. May your path be filled with knowledge and greatness!
Indonesian: Take this, consider it a token of my gratitude. With it, you should have everything you need to take the next step in your journey. May your path be filled with knowledge and greatness!

English: The book is still with you? Hmm… I don’t mean to rush, but knowledge like this should not be kept hidden for too long. The historian is waiting, and so is your destiny. When you're ready, make sure it reaches the right hands.
Indonesian: The book is still with you? Hmm… I don’t mean to rush, but knowledge like this should not be kept hidden for too long. The historian is waiting, and so is your destiny. When you're ready, make sure it reaches the right hands.

English: Deliver the Book of Techniques to the historian so its knowledge can be preserved, and claim your reward.
Indonesian: Deliver the Book of Techniques to the historian so its knowledge can be preserved, and claim your reward.

English: Spring Point Collection 1
Indonesian: Spring Point Collection 1

English: Spring Point Collection 2
Indonesian: Spring Point Collection 2

English: Spring Point Collection 3
Indonesian: Spring Point Collection 3

English: Spring Point Collection 4
Indonesian: Spring Point Collection 4

English: Help launch of an expedition
Indonesian: Help launch of an expedition

English: Have you heard? An expedition is being organized to discover a new continent!\n[Historian] Martinyc has found the coordinates of a possible new continent, and we are setting out to explore it.\nCan you help us in gathering supplies?
Indonesian: Have you heard? An expedition is being organized to discover a new continent!\n[Historian] Martinyc has found the coordinates of a possible new continent, and we are setting out to explore it.\nCan you help us in gathering supplies?

English: How fortunate we are to have an adventurer like you! Actually... The monsters stole everything. We'll find the supplies when we've beaten them all!
Indonesian: How fortunate we are to have an adventurer like you! Actually... The monsters stole everything. We'll find the supplies when we've beaten them all!

English: Too bad... Come back when you can.
Indonesian: Too bad... Come back when you can.

English: Thanks to you, the expedition will set off without a hitch! Thank you!
Indonesian: Thanks to you, the expedition will set off without a hitch! Thank you!

English: Uh... Are we there yet? No, no, no... I didn't mean to push you, but... I'd appreciate it if you could find them soon!
Indonesian: Uh... Are we there yet? No, no, no... I didn't mean to push you, but... I'd appreciate it if you could find them soon!

English: Hunt monsters (within 10Lv range from your level) to earn [Event] Supplies
Indonesian: Hunt monsters (within 10Lv range from your level) to earn [Event] Supplies

English: Looks like you're a new comer. Did you pick up the items one-by-one? I'll give you a newcomer's pet for you.
Indonesian: Looks like you're a new comer. Did you pick up the items one-by-one? I'll give you a newcomer's pet for you.

English: Find Easter Eggs
Indonesian: Find Easter Eggs

English: What is Lifestyle?
Indonesian: What is Lifestyle?

English: Welcome. There are times when you want to achieve different type of strengths. Do you wish to try something new that’s not related to hunting monsters?
Indonesian: Welcome. There are times when you want to achieve different type of strengths. Do you wish to try something new that’s not related to hunting monsters?

English: Good choice. I have something to give you so speak to me again.
Indonesian: Good choice. I have something to give you so speak to me again.

English: Currently I have 8 techniques to teach you. If you follow my lead you’ll soon learn them. This will help you when you try them out.
Indonesian: Currently I have 8 techniques to teach you. If you follow my lead you’ll soon learn them. This will help you when you try them out.

English: Come back when you change your mind.
Indonesian: Come back when you change your mind.

English: Android Box Event 1
Indonesian: Android Box Event 1

English: Android Box Event 2
Indonesian: Android Box Event 2

English: Complete the mission.
Indonesian: Complete the mission.

English: Complete the mission.
Indonesian: Complete the mission.

English: 3rd Anniversary Lucky Roulette!!
Indonesian: 3rd Anniversary Lucky Roulette!!

English: 3rd Anniversary Egg Upgrade 1
Indonesian: 3rd Anniversary Egg Upgrade 1

English: Happy to be with you for 3 years!\nKeep up the good work, this is my gift!
Indonesian: Happy to be with you for 3 years!\nKeep up the good work, this is my gift!

English: Nurture it with care!
Indonesian: Nurture it with care!

English: 3rd Anniversary Egg Upgrade 2
Indonesian: 3rd Anniversary Egg Upgrade 2

English: Whole New Substance
Indonesian: Whole New Substance

English: Thanks to your efforts, the expedition was launched without a hitch—and now they've sent word back that they've discovered a new substance. So, I ask you—would you be willing to lend your strength to further this research?
Indonesian: Thanks to your efforts, the expedition was launched without a hitch—and now they've sent word back that they've discovered a new substance. So, I ask you—would you be willing to lend your strength to further this research?

English: A shipment of experimental materials was en route here, but the escort grew careless—and monsters struck once again. You'll likely find them as you drive those beasts back where they came from.
Indonesian: A shipment of experimental materials was en route here, but the escort grew careless—and monsters struck once again. You'll likely find them as you drive those beasts back where they came from.

English: Too bad... Come back when you can.
Indonesian: Too bad... Come back when you can.

English: With this, we can proceed with the experiments without delay. You have my deepest thanks. This may very well allow us to craft equipment superior to what you currently wear. Rest assured, I’ll make you the first to benefit from it.
Indonesian: With this, we can proceed with the experiments without delay. You have my deepest thanks. This may very well allow us to craft equipment superior to what you currently wear. Rest assured, I’ll make you the first to benefit from it.

English: Hm... still gathering? No rush, of course—but I must admit, I expected someone like you to have completed it by now!
Indonesian: Hm... still gathering? No rush, of course—but I must admit, I expected someone like you to have completed it by now!

English: Hunt monsters (Lv. -10) to earn 3 Experiment Material Boxes
Indonesian: Hunt monsters (Lv. -10) to earn 3 Experiment Material Boxes

English: Revolutionary’s Secret Journal
Indonesian: Revolutionary’s Secret Journal

English: Ugh... C-can you do me a favor...?
Indonesian: Ugh... C-can you do me a favor...?

English: Thank you... I’ll stay hidden and recover. I’m counting on you.
Indonesian: Thank you... I’ll stay hidden and recover. I’m counting on you.

English: Ugh... I see... If you're busy, I understand...
Indonesian: Ugh... I see... If you're busy, I understand...

English: Be careful. Many are after the Secret Journal.
Indonesian: Be careful. Many are after the Secret Journal.

English: Uncover the secrets within the Revolutionary Journal, and great rewards await you.
Indonesian: Uncover the secrets within the Revolutionary Journal, and great rewards await you.

English: Monster Hunt!
Indonesian: Monster Hunt!

English: Looking to get stronger, are you?
Indonesian: Looking to get stronger, are you?

English: Do me a favor and clear out the monsters nearby while you’re at it. I’ll see what I can do for you—just give it your all.
Indonesian: Do me a favor and clear out the monsters nearby while you’re at it. I’ll see what I can do for you—just give it your all.

English: Still not finished? Don’t keep me waiting past today.
Indonesian: Still not finished? Don’t keep me waiting past today.

English: A time will come when you’ll need real strength. Come back to me if you’re desperate enough. Time’s not exactly on your side.
Indonesian: A time will come when you’ll need real strength. Come back to me if you’re desperate enough. Time’s not exactly on your side.

English: Make good use of what you gain.
Indonesian: Make good use of what you gain.

English: Gather materials for Smiths!
Indonesian: Gather materials for Smiths!

English: I’ll let you in on a little secret… Soon, stronger weapons and armor will be unveiled. The blacksmiths are still getting the hang of the new techniques, so the release has been delayed. But if you could gather the materials they need for practice, I reckon it might speed things up. What do you say—care to lend a hand?
Indonesian: I’ll let you in on a little secret… Soon, stronger weapons and armor will be unveiled. The blacksmiths are still getting the hang of the new techniques, so the release has been delayed. But if you could gather the materials they need for practice, I reckon it might speed things up. What do you say—care to lend a hand?

English: Take a look at the reward I’ve prepared. Once you see it, you’ll realize it’s well worth your effort! The materials can be found from nearby monsters, so I’ll be counting on you.
Indonesian: Take a look at the reward I’ve prepared. Once you see it, you’ll realize it’s well worth your effort! The materials can be found from nearby monsters, so I’ll be counting on you.

English: Ah… turning down such a fine opportunity, are you? A real shame—I thought you’d jump at the chance.
Indonesian: Ah… turning down such a fine opportunity, are you? A real shame—I thought you’d jump at the chance.

English: Already gathered everything? …Oh, not yet? Very well—come back once you have them all.
Indonesian: Already gathered everything? …Oh, not yet? Very well—come back once you have them all.

English: Splendid! This should be more than enough for the blacksmiths to continue their research. You’ve done well.
Indonesian: Splendid! This should be more than enough for the blacksmiths to continue their research. You’ve done well.

English: 3rd Job Change
Indonesian: 3rd Job Change

English: Chapter 1 Expedition
Indonesian: Chapter 1 Expedition

English: A Hand of Compassion
Indonesian: A Hand of Compassion

English: I have a funny story and a favor to ask. Want to hear it?
Indonesian: I have a funny story and a favor to ask. Want to hear it?

English: I don’t know if you’re aware, but there are many races in this world. For some reason, I’m especially drawn to beastfolk, so I’ve been looking for information about them.
Indonesian: I don’t know if you’re aware, but there are many races in this world. For some reason, I’m especially drawn to beastfolk, so I’ve been looking for information about them.

English: I found some clues, secured funding, formed an expedition, and sent them to a rumored location. But… I still haven’t heard anything back.
Indonesian: I found some clues, secured funding, formed an expedition, and sent them to a rumored location. But… I still haven’t heard anything back.

English: There should have been at least a letter by now. My investors keep nagging me to take responsibility, but the mayor of Saint City, who invested the most, hasn’t said a single word. Isn’t it obvious he knows something? Could you ask him about the expedition for me?
Indonesian: There should have been at least a letter by now. My investors keep nagging me to take responsibility, but the mayor of Saint City, who invested the most, hasn’t said a single word. Isn’t it obvious he knows something? Could you ask him about the expedition for me?

English: Thank you! You know where to find him.
Indonesian: Thank you! You know where to find him.

English: Come back if you change your mind. I’ll be waiting.
Indonesian: Come back if you change your mind. I’ll be waiting.

English: Did you ask him? I’d go myself, but… I’m too afraid to face him.
Indonesian: Did you ask him? I’d go myself, but… I’m too afraid to face him.

English: Oh, a great adventurer. What brings you here?
Indonesian: Oh, a great adventurer. What brings you here?

English: Meet with the Mayor of Saint City
Indonesian: Meet with the Mayor of Saint City

English: The Truth of the Expedition
Indonesian: The Truth of the Expedition

English: Ah, I see. Did the Strange Collector send you?
Indonesian: Ah, I see. Did the Strange Collector send you?

English: I have nothing to tell you about that. Just go back.
Indonesian: I have nothing to tell you about that. Just go back.

English: Hmm? If not, then why did you come to me?
Indonesian: Hmm? If not, then why did you come to me?

English: Even for you, I have nothing more to say.
Indonesian: Even for you, I have nothing more to say.

English: Hmm? Do I know anything about the mayor?
Indonesian: Hmm? Do I know anything about the mayor?

English: Meet with Helgar
Indonesian: Meet with Helgar

English: Trapped in the Maze
Indonesian: Trapped in the Maze

English: Well… I don’t know much, but lately the mayor of Flaris has been visiting his house quite often. Why don’t you try talking to Flarine?
Indonesian: Well… I don’t know much, but lately the mayor of Flaris has been visiting his house quite often. Why don’t you try talking to Flarine?

English: You know the way, right?
Indonesian: You know the way, right?

English: You’re the one asking, and yet… If it’s nothing important, could you step aside?
Indonesian: You’re the one asking, and yet… If it’s nothing important, could you step aside?

English: That’s all I know. Go see Flarine.
Indonesian: That’s all I know. Go see Flarine.

English: Hmm? It’s been a while. What brings you here?
Indonesian: Hmm? It’s been a while. What brings you here?

English: Meet with the Mayor of Flarine
Indonesian: Meet with the Mayor of Flarine

English: Friend’s Testimony
Indonesian: Friend’s Testimony

English: Actually… something like this was found in western Flaris.
Indonesian: Actually… something like this was found in western Flaris.

English: Look at this Saint City logo. I thought I should let him know, so I brought it to him.
Indonesian: Look at this Saint City logo. I thought I should let him know, so I brought it to him.

English: But more pieces like this keep turning up, so I’ve been visiting him often.
Indonesian: But more pieces like this keep turning up, so I’ve been visiting him often.

English: He was shocked when he saw it, took it away, and told me not to speak of it to anyone. Do you want this?
Indonesian: He was shocked when he saw it, took it away, and told me not to speak of it to anyone. Do you want this?

English: As far as I know, these pieces came from the central region of the Leren Mountains. Fortunately for him, powerful masquerpets wander the area, keeping people away and stopping any rumors from spreading. But that shouldn’t be a problem for you.
Indonesian: As far as I know, these pieces came from the central region of the Leren Mountains. Fortunately for him, powerful masquerpets wander the area, keeping people away and stopping any rumors from spreading. But that shouldn’t be a problem for you.

English: Hmm? You don’t need it? Well, I can’t give you this piece, but if you need another one, feel free to ask.
Indonesian: Hmm? You don’t need it? Well, I can’t give you this piece, but if you need another one, feel free to ask.

English: I’ve already told you where it is, haven’t I? Someone like you shouldn’t have any trouble handling the monsters there and finding what you need.
Indonesian: I’ve already told you where it is, haven’t I? Someone like you shouldn’t have any trouble handling the monsters there and finding what you need.

English: Wait… this is…! How did you get this?
Indonesian: Wait… this is…! How did you get this?

English: Find “Fragment of ???”
Indonesian: Find “Fragment of ???”

English: His True Intention
Indonesian: His True Intention

English: Now that you’ve come this far, I have no choice but to tell you everything. Are you ready? That fragment is from the ship the expedition used when they set sail.
Indonesian: Now that you’ve come this far, I have no choice but to tell you everything. Are you ready? That fragment is from the ship the expedition used when they set sail.

English: How do I know that from a single piece of debris? Because I was involved in everything—from its design to its construction. But so far, all we’ve found are scattered fragments like this.
Indonesian: How do I know that from a single piece of debris? Because I was involved in everything—from its design to its construction. But so far, all we’ve found are scattered fragments like this.

English: I’ve done my best to stop the news from spreading, but there’s only so much I can do. At this point, I have no one left to turn to but you. Could you help find more clues about the expedition?
Indonesian: I’ve done my best to stop the news from spreading, but there’s only so much I can do. At this point, I have no one left to turn to but you. Could you help find more clues about the expedition?

English: Thank you. The expedition followed the Darkon 1 mountain range. Start searching from there.
Indonesian: Thank you. The expedition followed the Darkon 1 mountain range. Start searching from there.

English: So even my last hope is fading. If you change your mind, please come back.
Indonesian: So even my last hope is fading. If you change your mind, please come back.

English: Have you found anything? Oh… this is getting serious.
Indonesian: Have you found anything? Oh… this is getting serious.

English: Welcome, adventurer. Hmm? What is this?
Indonesian: Welcome, adventurer. Hmm? What is this?

English: Bring “Fragment of a Fallen Ship” to the Darken Mayor
Indonesian: Bring “Fragment of a Fallen Ship” to the Darken Mayor

English: Seeking the Witness… 1
Indonesian: Seeking the Witness… 1

English: Well… I don’t know anything about this shipwreck, but there is someone who might.
Indonesian: Well… I don’t know anything about this shipwreck, but there is someone who might.

English: A High-Dwarpet named Liekyen might know something. You should go see him.
Indonesian: A High-Dwarpet named Liekyen might know something. You should go see him.

English: Of course, you can search elsewhere first if you prefer.
Indonesian: Of course, you can search elsewhere first if you prefer.

English: You haven’t gone yet? That’s really all I can think of.
Indonesian: You haven’t gone yet? That’s really all I can think of.

English: A shipwreck? Ah… you mean that one.
Indonesian: A shipwreck? Ah… you mean that one.

English: Meet with Liekyen
Indonesian: Meet with Liekyen

English: Seeking the Witness… 2
Indonesian: Seeking the Witness… 2

English: It was deep in the mountains. I saw a shadow and thought it was a monster… but it turned out to be a ship falling from the sky.
Indonesian: It was deep in the mountains. I saw a shadow and thought it was a monster… but it turned out to be a ship falling from the sky.

English: There was no one on board, even when I searched it the first time. Not a single body. I checked around to see if there was anything useful, but all I found was a book full of strange codes. Curious what it says?
Indonesian: There was no one on board, even when I searched it the first time. Not a single body. I checked around to see if there was anything useful, but all I found was a book full of strange codes. Curious what it says?

English: I couldn’t make heads or tails of it, so I handed it over to Inisis. If you’re interested, go talk to her.
Indonesian: I couldn’t make heads or tails of it, so I handed it over to Inisis. If you’re interested, go talk to her.

English: Not curious? Well, that’s your choice.
Indonesian: Not curious? Well, that’s your choice.

English: Inisis knows the details. If she finishes deciphering it, could you come back and tell me what she found?
Indonesian: Inisis knows the details. If she finishes deciphering it, could you come back and tell me what she found?

English: Ah, you’ve come for the logbook?
Indonesian: Ah, you’ve come for the logbook?

English: Meet with Inisis
Indonesian: Meet with Inisis

English: Searching for Clues… 1
Indonesian: Searching for Clues… 1

English: It turned out to be just a simple sailing logbook. There’s nothing special written in it. Are you still looking for more clues?
Indonesian: It turned out to be just a simple sailing logbook. There’s nothing special written in it. Are you still looking for more clues?

English: Actually, after reading it, Amadolka decided to search the Darken mountains again to see if anything else turns up. You should meet him before heading back to Saint City.
Indonesian: Actually, after reading it, Amadolka decided to search the Darken mountains again to see if anything else turns up. You should meet him before heading back to Saint City.

English: If you’re too busy, I understand. Take care of yourself.
Indonesian: If you’re too busy, I understand. Take care of yourself.

English: You haven’t left yet?
Indonesian: You haven’t left yet?

English: Inisis sent you?
Indonesian: Inisis sent you?

English: Meet with Amadolka
Indonesian: Meet with Amadolka

English: Searching for Clues… 2
Indonesian: Searching for Clues… 2

English: That sharp woman… How did she know to send you without me saying anything? Do you really need this?
Indonesian: That sharp woman… How did she know to send you without me saying anything? Do you really need this?

English: Sigh… Fine, take it. You can find it right next to me. I tried to analyze that material at Erons Factory, but I couldn’t even figure out what it’s made of.
Indonesian: Sigh… Fine, take it. You can find it right next to me. I tried to analyze that material at Erons Factory, but I couldn’t even figure out what it’s made of.

English: If you manage to discover anything, let me know. I guess I owe you one now.
Indonesian: If you manage to discover anything, let me know. I guess I owe you one now.

English: So I can keep this? Tch… the more I look at it, the more uneasy I feel. Just take it and go.
Indonesian: So I can keep this? Tch… the more I look at it, the more uneasy I feel. Just take it and go.

English: This logbook…!
Indonesian: This logbook…!

English: Find “Trace of the New Continent”
Indonesian: Find “Trace of the New Continent”

English: The Gear Begins to Turn Again
Indonesian: The Gear Begins to Turn Again

English: So that’s how it was… What on earth happened to the crew of that ship? For now, let me examine this strange material.
Indonesian: So that’s how it was… What on earth happened to the crew of that ship? For now, let me examine this strange material.

English: I can use it to calm the investors. With this logbook, we might even be able to send a follow-up expedition. Hmm… Could you show the logbook and this material to the Strange Collector?
Indonesian: I can use it to calm the investors. With this logbook, we might even be able to send a follow-up expedition. Hmm… Could you show the logbook and this material to the Strange Collector?

English: He should be the first to know. Thank you.
Indonesian: He should be the first to know. Thank you.

English: Well, if you change your mind, you can come back anytime.
Indonesian: Well, if you change your mind, you can come back anytime.

English: Have you shown it to him yet? Don’t worry, I’m not rushing you.
Indonesian: Have you shown it to him yet? Don’t worry, I’m not rushing you.

English: Welcome back. How did it go? I knew it—my research wasn’t wrong after all. I truly owe you. It’s not much, but please accept this as my thanks. Things are going to get busy from here on…
Indonesian: Welcome back. How did it go? I knew it—my research wasn’t wrong after all. I truly owe you. It’s not much, but please accept this as my thanks. Things are going to get busy from here on…

English: Meet with the Strange Collector
Indonesian: Meet with the Strange Collector

English: Chapter 2 Eillun Town
Indonesian: Chapter 2 Eillun Town

English: Reignited Passion
Indonesian: Reignited Passion

English: Adventurer, you’ve come at the perfect time. We’re preparing a second expedition based on the logbook you found.
Indonesian: Adventurer, you’ve come at the perfect time. We’re preparing a second expedition based on the logbook you found.

English: This time, we plan to send a scouting party before the main group. Would you be willing to be part of that team?
Indonesian: This time, we plan to send a scouting party before the main group. Would you be willing to be part of that team?

English: Go see the mayor of Saint City.
Indonesian: Go see the mayor of Saint City.

English: I don’t think anyone is better suited for this than you. But there’s still some time before we depart, so you can decide at your own pace.
Indonesian: I don’t think anyone is better suited for this than you. But there’s still some time before we depart, so you can decide at your own pace.

English: You know where the mayor is, right?
Indonesian: You know where the mayor is, right?

English: Welcome, adventurer.
Indonesian: Welcome, adventurer.

English: Scout Party
Indonesian: Scout Party

English: Thanks to what you brought back, I convinced the other investors, and we’ve decided to organize a second expedition. But considering the first expedition vanished and their ship crashed…
Indonesian: Thanks to what you brought back, I convinced the other investors, and we’ve decided to organize a second expedition. But considering the first expedition vanished and their ship crashed…

English: If we send another group out without understanding what happened, we risk the same disaster. That’s why we plan to send a scouting team first to investigate. Will you take on that role?
Indonesian: If we send another group out without understanding what happened, we risk the same disaster. That’s why we plan to send a scouting team first to investigate. Will you take on that role?

English: After reviewing the logbook, it seems we need to go even farther north, beyond the Gouthan Mountains of Darkon. It looks like there’s some kind of docking point there, so if you arrive safely, you should be able to land.
Indonesian: After reviewing the logbook, it seems we need to go even farther north, beyond the Gouthan Mountains of Darkon. It looks like there’s some kind of docking point there, so if you arrive safely, you should be able to land.

English: No matter how I look at it, you’re the only one fit for this job. I’ll be waiting for your answer.
Indonesian: No matter how I look at it, you’re the only one fit for this job. I’ll be waiting for your answer.

English: Good luck, adventurer. May your flight be a safe one.
Indonesian: Good luck, adventurer. May your flight be a safe one.

English: Finally… I’m saved! I survived!
Indonesian: Finally… I’m saved! I survived!

English: Meet with [Expedition] Beck
Indonesian: Meet with [Expedition] Beck

English: Straggler
Indonesian: Straggler

English: Good to meet you. I’m Beck from Saint City. I… well, I was part of the expedition. Beasts attacked us, and I got separated from the others.
Indonesian: Good to meet you. I’m Beck from Saint City. I… well, I was part of the expedition. Beasts attacked us, and I got separated from the others.

English: Our captain didn’t even check if everyone was on board before taking off. When the attack started, I just happened to be wasting time in the forest. Thanks to that, I survived.
Indonesian: Our captain didn’t even check if everyone was on board before taking off. When the attack started, I just happened to be wasting time in the forest. Thanks to that, I survived.

English: A second expedition? That’s a relief. I’ll join them and go home as soon as they arrive. But… could I ask you for a favor?
Indonesian: A second expedition? That’s a relief. I’ll join them and go home as soon as they arrive. But… could I ask you for a favor?

English: I lost my serial number chain while fleeing from those beasts. I searched where I dropped it, but it was gone. It might still be somewhere nearby. Could you go and look for it? Please, I’m counting on you.
Indonesian: I lost my serial number chain while fleeing from those beasts. I searched where I dropped it, but it was gone. It might still be somewhere nearby. Could you go and look for it? Please, I’m counting on you.

English: If you change your mind, please come back.
Indonesian: If you change your mind, please come back.

English: Those creatures went that way!
Indonesian: Those creatures went that way!

English: I can’t thank you enough for your help. While you were gone, some beastmen—different from the ones that attacked me—showed up. They gave me food and pointed out a place before leaving. Eat something, then head over there.
Indonesian: I can’t thank you enough for your help. While you were gone, some beastmen—different from the ones that attacked me—showed up. They gave me food and pointed out a place before leaving. Eat something, then head over there.

English: Gather 10 Abandoned Serial Number Chains
Indonesian: Gather 10 Abandoned Serial Number Chains

English: Proficiency Test
Indonesian: Proficiency Test

English: Oy! Halt! Who are you? …That’s quite a story. Suspicious. Are you a Lycan spy? If not, prove it.
Indonesian: Oy! Halt! Who are you? …That’s quite a story. Suspicious. Are you a Lycan spy? If not, prove it.

English: Defeat 20 Hundur Sharpfoots, and then I’ll believe you.
Indonesian: Defeat 20 Hundur Sharpfoots, and then I’ll believe you.

English: Hmph! I knew it. You must be a spy!
Indonesian: Hmph! I knew it. You must be a spy!

English: What? You can’t even handle that? Pathetic. There’s no way I can let you into the village like this.
Indonesian: What? You can’t even handle that? Pathetic. There’s no way I can let you into the village like this.

English: (Hmm… seems stronger than me…)
Indonesian: (Hmm… seems stronger than me…)

English: Kill 20 Hundur Sharpfoots
Indonesian: Kill 20 Hundur Sharpfoots

English: Territorial Cats
Indonesian: Territorial Cats

English: That’s still not enough to convince me. I don’t even know who you really are. If you want to live alongside our village, you’ll need to prove yourself with your strength. Then at least we can rely on each other.
Indonesian: That’s still not enough to convince me. I don’t even know who you really are. If you want to live alongside our village, you’ll need to prove yourself with your strength. Then at least we can rely on each other.

English: If you’re serious about proving yourself, defeat Captain Hundur Sharpfoot and bring me proof.
Indonesian: If you’re serious about proving yourself, defeat Captain Hundur Sharpfoot and bring me proof.

English: At your current level, it might be difficult. I understand.
Indonesian: At your current level, it might be difficult. I understand.

English: Still not done? When exactly do you plan to enter the village?
Indonesian: Still not done? When exactly do you plan to enter the village?

English: (Seriously…?) You’re struggling with just those? Hah… well, I guess you tried. Go on, someone will guide you inside.
Indonesian: (Seriously…?) You’re struggling with just those? Hah… well, I guess you tried. Go on, someone will guide you inside.

English: Kill 11 Captain Hundur Sharpfoots and bring 1 Piece of Hundur Bone
Indonesian: Kill 11 Captain Hundur Sharpfoots and bring 1 Piece of Hundur Bone

English: New Town Life?
Indonesian: New Town Life?

English: Welcome, stranger. You’re now in Eillun Town, the refuge of the Myurangs. Wait, you defeated Captain Hundur Sharpfoot? Ah, so you fell for his trick. I only sent him out for training because he’s always slacking off.
Indonesian: Welcome, stranger. You’re now in Eillun Town, the refuge of the Myurangs. Wait, you defeated Captain Hundur Sharpfoot? Ah, so you fell for his trick. I only sent him out for training because he’s always slacking off.

English: Don’t worry, I’ll give him a much harsher assignment next time. To stay in this village, you’ll need the captain’s approval. He’s strict, so expect more tests.
Indonesian: Don’t worry, I’ll give him a much harsher assignment next time. To stay in this village, you’ll need the captain’s approval. He’s strict, so expect more tests.

English: You can find him over there. Go talk to him yourself.
Indonesian: You can find him over there. Go talk to him yourself.

English: What will he ask you to do? No idea.
Indonesian: What will he ask you to do? No idea.

English: Just know that without his approval, you won’t be able to do much in this village.
Indonesian: Just know that without his approval, you won’t be able to do much in this village.

English: Who are you?
Indonesian: Siapa kamu?

English: Meet with [Captain] Baron
Indonesian: Meet with [Captain] Baron

English: Captain’s Test 1
Indonesian: Captain’s Test 1

English: A hairless outsider in our village… What were the guards doing? So, you want to stay here? We’re at war with the Lycans. For all I know, you might be one of their spies. I can’t allow you to stay without proof.
Indonesian: A hairless outsider in our village… What were the guards doing? So, you want to stay here? We’re at war with the Lycans. For all I know, you might be one of their spies. I can’t allow you to stay without proof.

English: Kill 25 Small Samosets. That’ll at least get us talking.
Indonesian: Kill 25 Small Samosets. That’ll at least get us talking.

English: If you can’t handle something that simple, I can’t let you in.
Indonesian: If you can’t handle something that simple, I can’t let you in.

English: If you finish quickly, you’ll be able to use the village facilities sooner.
Indonesian: If you finish quickly, you’ll be able to use the village facilities sooner.

English: Already done? Alright. I can say you’re not one of those dog spies.
Indonesian: Already done? Alright. I can say you’re not one of those dog spies.

English: Kill 25 Small Samosets
Indonesian: Kill 25 Small Samosets

English: Captain’s Test 2
Indonesian: Captain’s Test 2

English: But staying in town is a different matter. We’ve received reports that the enemies you defeated are gathering in one place.
Indonesian: But staying in town is a different matter. We’ve received reports that the enemies you defeated are gathering in one place.

English: I’ll tell you where. Go there and take them out before they can plan anything.
Indonesian: I’ll tell you where. Go there and take them out before they can plan anything.

English: It’s your choice, but if you want to stay, you’ll have to deal with them eventually.
Indonesian: It’s your choice, but if you want to stay, you’ll have to deal with them eventually.

English: We need to crush them before they attack the village. That’s what matters.
Indonesian: We need to crush them before they attack the village. That’s what matters.

English: Impressive. I underestimated you. My apologies.
Indonesian: Impressive. I underestimated you. My apologies.

English: Kill 15 Samosets
Indonesian: Kill 15 Samosets

English: Captain’s Test 3
Indonesian: Captain’s Test 3

English: There are even more reinforcements gathering. Sadly, our troops are tied up elsewhere and can’t handle them right now. This is the last task—teach them a lesson.
Indonesian: There are even more reinforcements gathering. Sadly, our troops are tied up elsewhere and can’t handle them right now. This is the last task—teach them a lesson.

English: Defeat Captain Samoset and bring back proof. Then I’ll grant you permission to stay.
Indonesian: Defeat Captain Samoset and bring back proof. Then I’ll grant you permission to stay.

English: You’d better decide before they launch an attack.
Indonesian: You’d better decide before they launch an attack.

English: Still not finished? Hmm…
Indonesian: Still not finished? Hmm…

English: Well done. I’ll issue your residency permit.
Indonesian: Well done. I’ll issue your residency permit.

English: Kill 10 Captain Samosets and bring 1 Piece of Samoset Bone
Indonesian: Kill 10 Captain Samosets and bring 1 Piece of Samoset Bone

English: Where Did the Expedition Go 1
Indonesian: Where Did the Expedition Go 1

English: So, what brought you all the way here? Hmm… I don’t remember seeing anything like that. I rarely leave the forest, so I wouldn’t know.
Indonesian: So, what brought you all the way here? Hmm… I don’t remember seeing anything like that. I rarely leave the forest, so I wouldn’t know.

English: Wait… yes, there were reports of several loud explosions from the east. I’m not sure if it’s related, but do you want to check it out?
Indonesian: Wait… yes, there were reports of several loud explosions from the east. I’m not sure if it’s related, but do you want to check it out?

English: It’s not far, but it’s Lycan territory. We haven’t been able to investigate. If you find anything, bring it to me. I’ll help you examine it.
Indonesian: It’s not far, but it’s Lycan territory. We haven’t been able to investigate. If you find anything, bring it to me. I’ll help you examine it.

English: You might find other clues elsewhere too. Don’t worry if you want to follow your own leads.
Indonesian: You might find other clues elsewhere too. Don’t worry if you want to follow your own leads.

English: You should be fine, but stay careful.
Indonesian: You should be fine, but stay careful.

English: Did you find what you were looking for? You found this there?
Indonesian: Did you find what you were looking for? You found this there?

English: Search the forest and obtain “Unknown Fur Ball”
Indonesian: Search the forest and obtain “Unknown Fur Ball”

English: Where Did the Expedition Go 2
Indonesian: Where Did the Expedition Go 2

English: This is Kyouchish fur. Kyouchish are elite Lycan warriors.
Indonesian: This is Kyouchish fur. Kyouchish are elite Lycan warriors.

English: It seems they attacked and wiped out the remaining members of that expedition. Since their territory was invaded by that large group, they’re probably still on high alert around there.
Indonesian: It seems they attacked and wiped out the remaining members of that expedition. Since their territory was invaded by that large group, they’re probably still on high alert around there.

English: If you defeat some Small Kyouchish and bring back any written orders or notes, I’ll translate them for you.
Indonesian: If you defeat some Small Kyouchish and bring back any written orders or notes, I’ll translate them for you.

English: Do you have a better lead than this?
Indonesian: Do you have a better lead than this?

English: You remember the place, right?
Indonesian: You remember the place, right?

English: Ah, you got it. Let me see…
Indonesian: Ah, you got it. Let me see…

English: Kill 25 Small Kyouchish and get 1 Lycan Operation Plan
Indonesian: Kill 25 Small Kyouchish and get 1 Lycan Operation Plan

English: Investigation Begins
Indonesian: Investigation Begins

English: Hmm, this won’t take long. In the meantime, how about hunting some Kyouchish?
Indonesian: Hmm, this won’t take long. In the meantime, how about hunting some Kyouchish?

English: They’re near the enemy camp.
Indonesian: They’re near the enemy camp.

English: If you don’t feel like it, I won’t force you. Come back if you change your mind.
Indonesian: If you don’t feel like it, I won’t force you. Come back if you change your mind.

English: It’s best to finish this quickly. I’ll have the translation ready when you return.
Indonesian: It’s best to finish this quickly. I’ll have the translation ready when you return.

English: Back already? The translation’s done. Here, take it.
Indonesian: Back already? The translation’s done. Here, take it.

English: Kill 25 Kyouchish
Indonesian: Kill 25 Kyouchish

English: The Expedition Is…
Indonesian: The Expedition Is…

English: Did it say anything useful? Typical wolves—attack, pillage, and so on. Still, if it helps your search, that’s something.
Indonesian: Did it say anything useful? Typical wolves—attack, pillage, and so on. Still, if it helps your search, that’s something.

English: So now… you’re heading back? That’s something you’ll need to report.
Indonesian: So now… you’re heading back? That’s something you’ll need to report.

English: Well, returning can wait.
Indonesian: Well, returning can wait.

English: I’ll inform the villagers so you can use our village freely afterward. Safe travels.
Indonesian: I’ll inform the villagers so you can use our village freely afterward. Safe travels.

English: Oh, you’re back. How was the village?
Indonesian: Oh, you’re back. How was the village?

English: The Truth
Indonesian: The Truth

English: So… the others… I’m the only survivor… sniff… Are you going back to Saint City?
Indonesian: So… the others… I’m the only survivor… sniff… Are you going back to Saint City?

English: Please tell them I’m alive. I’ll join the second expedition when they arrive and return home. I don’t want to stay in this land any longer. I know it’s a lot to ask, but… could you avenge my fallen comrades before you leave for Madrigal?
Indonesian: Please tell them I’m alive. I’ll join the second expedition when they arrive and return home. I don’t want to stay in this land any longer. I know it’s a lot to ask, but… could you avenge my fallen comrades before you leave for Madrigal?

English: I heard a particularly loud howl. Everything went quiet afterward, so I’m sure that was their leader. Can you defeat him?
Indonesian: I heard a particularly loud howl. Everything went quiet afterward, so I’m sure that was their leader. Can you defeat him?

English: Oh… I see. I guess it can’t be helped. Never mind, then.
Indonesian: Oh… I see. I guess it can’t be helped. Never mind, then.

English: The howl came from that direction. I doubt it went far.
Indonesian: The howl came from that direction. I doubt it went far.

English: Ah, you’re back. So, was there really a new continent?
Indonesian: Ah, you’re back. So, was there really a new continent?

English: Kill 10 Captain Kyouchish
Indonesian: Kill 10 Captain Kyouchish

English: Report
Indonesian: Report

English: There was? Then… did you find any trace of the expedition? My gods… what a disaster. At least there’s one survivor. For now, we must keep this quiet.
Indonesian: There was? Then… did you find any trace of the expedition? My gods… what a disaster. At least there’s one survivor. For now, we must keep this quiet.

English: We can’t hide it forever, of course, but if we reveal it now, everything we’re planning will collapse. I’ll make an official announcement when we begin recruiting for the second expedition. Did you meet the Strange Collector?
Indonesian: We can’t hide it forever, of course, but if we reveal it now, everything we’re planning will collapse. I’ll make an official announcement when we begin recruiting for the second expedition. Did you meet the Strange Collector?

English: Please tell them I’m alive. I’ll join the second expedition when they arrive and return home. I don’t want to stay in this land any longer. I know it’s a lot to ask, but… could you avenge my fallen comrades before you leave for Madrigal?
Indonesian: Please tell them I’m alive. I’ll join the second expedition when they arrive and return home. I don’t want to stay in this land any longer. I know it’s a lot to ask, but… could you avenge my fallen comrades before you leave for Madrigal?

English: He’s waiting for you. You should go see him.
Indonesian: He’s waiting for you. You should go see him.

English: He’s your employer, after all. You’re probably exhausted from flying and fighting, but shouldn’t you visit him?
Indonesian: He’s your employer, after all. You’re probably exhausted from flying and fighting, but shouldn’t you visit him?

English: He’s still at his usual place. You know where that is.
Indonesian: He’s still at his usual place. You know where that is.

English: You’re back. Good. I can sense good news.
Indonesian: You’re back. Good. I can sense good news.

English: Back to the New World
Indonesian: Back to the New World

English: I was certain, but… to think my research really was correct. I’d love to visit that continent myself, but I need to stay here and handle preparations. Can you go ahead and investigate further?
Indonesian: I was certain, but… to think my research really was correct. I’d love to visit that continent myself, but I need to stay here and handle preparations. Can you go ahead and investigate further?

English: Thank you. I hope we meet again there soon.
Indonesian: Thank you. I hope we meet again there soon.

English: You know you’re the only one suited for this. If you change your mind, let me know. I’ll make it worth your while.
Indonesian: You know you’re the only one suited for this. If you change your mind, let me know. I’ll make it worth your while.

English: You’re still here… When do you think you’ll leave?
Indonesian: You’re still here… When do you think you’ll leave?

English: Back again? What’s going on this time?
Indonesian: Back again? What’s going on this time?

English: Chapter 3 Prelude
Indonesian: Chapter 3 Prelude

English: Meeting with Elders
Indonesian: Meeting with Elders

English: Oh? You want to know more about us?
Indonesian: Oh? You want to know more about us?

English: Then you should speak with the jarl or one of the elders. They’ve lived long and know our history well. However, it won’t be easy for an outsider to meet the jarl. I’ll introduce you to my superior, one of the elders. I’ll tell him in advance so you can go straight to him.
Indonesian: Then you should speak with the jarl or one of the elders. They’ve lived long and know our history well. However, it won’t be easy for an outsider to meet the jarl. I’ll introduce you to my superior, one of the elders. I’ll tell him in advance so you can go straight to him.

English: Well… you could try finding them on your own too.
Indonesian: Well… you could try finding them on your own too.

English: The elder is busy, so if you want to meet him quickly, you should hurry.
Indonesian: The elder is busy, so if you want to meet him quickly, you should hurry.

English: So, you’re the one the captain mentioned.
Indonesian: So, you’re the one the captain mentioned.

English: Meet with [Elder] Melak
Indonesian: Meet with [Elder] Melak

English: Help Muran!
Indonesian: Help Muran!

English: I don’t mind telling you about our village, but I have a favor to ask first.
Indonesian: I don’t mind telling you about our village, but I have a favor to ask first.

English: As you know, we Muran are at war with the Lycans, and we’re badly outnumbered. I’ve heard you’ve already defeated quite a few of them. While you’re here, I’d like you to support our young warriors.
Indonesian: As you know, we Muran are at war with the Lycans, and we’re badly outnumbered. I’ve heard you’ve already defeated quite a few of them. While you’re here, I’d like you to support our young warriors.

English: If you have more urgent matters, I understand. You can return when you’re free.
Indonesian: If you have more urgent matters, I understand. You can return when you’re free.

English: We can continue our talk afterwards.
Indonesian: We can continue our talk afterwards.

English: You’ve done an incredible job.
Indonesian: You’ve done an incredible job.

English: Complete 30 daily quests in Eillun Town
Indonesian: Complete 30 daily quests in Eillun Town

English: Where Is the Mole
Indonesian: Where Is the Mole

English: Thanks to you, life in the village—and even the war—has become a bit more manageable. I should answer your questions as thanks, but… I have one more thing to ask.
Indonesian: Thanks to you, life in the village—and even the war—has become a bit more manageable. I should answer your questions as thanks, but… I have one more thing to ask.

English: We suspect there’s a Lycan spy in a high position. Our operations keep getting sabotaged, and supplies for one squad were stolen. Can you investigate and, if possible, get them back?
Indonesian: We suspect there’s a Lycan spy in a high position. Our operations keep getting sabotaged, and supplies for one squad were stolen. Can you investigate and, if possible, get them back?

English: I hate to burden you, but there’s no one else I can trust with this.
Indonesian: I hate to burden you, but there’s no one else I can trust with this.

English: The last known location was here. If they’re acting as they usually do, they shouldn’t be far.
Indonesian: The last known location was here. If they’re acting as they usually do, they shouldn’t be far.

English: He… he was the spy?
Indonesian: He… he was the spy?

English: Get 50 Stolen Supplies and 1 Secret Letter
Indonesian: Get 50 Stolen Supplies and 1 Secret Letter

English: Hunt the Mole
Indonesian: Hunt the Mole

English: We had reports that he left the village in a hurry, but… to think a village elder would betray us. It’s tragic, but we don’t have enough soldiers to both defend the village and track him. Could you do it?
Indonesian: We had reports that he left the village in a hurry, but… to think a village elder would betray us. It’s tragic, but we don’t have enough soldiers to both defend the village and track him. Could you do it?

English: If possible, bring him back alive. If not… eliminate him. Smaller Kanonicus were carrying stolen supplies and a secret letter. He should still be nearby.
Indonesian: If possible, bring him back alive. If not… eliminate him. Smaller Kanonicus were carrying stolen supplies and a secret letter. He should still be nearby.

English: Right now, you’re the only one who can move freely. We’ll be waiting.
Indonesian: Right now, you’re the only one who can move freely. We’ll be waiting.

English: We must make an example of this traitor, or the village won’t be safe for long. Please, see it through.
Indonesian: We must make an example of this traitor, or the village won’t be safe for long. Please, see it through.

English: You did well. Here, I’ve compiled what you were looking for. Take your time reading it—you’ll learn plenty about our history.
Indonesian: You did well. Here, I’ve compiled what you were looking for. Take your time reading it—you’ll learn plenty about our history.

English: Kill [Elder] Traitus
Indonesian: Kill [Elder] Traitus
